All Daoists seeking immortality, agelessness, and the command of the myriad spirits shall take yellow silk as ground, inscribe in white, and enclose it in a yellow pouch worn at the collar, encircling the neck, or else upon the head. Cultivate virtue and practice the Dao, and the spirits shall come of themselves. All commoners shall take yellow stone, carve the talismanic script in white, and set it to guard the Center.

**From the *Scripture of the Five Designations of the Cavernous Mystery’s Natural Perfected Unity***
**Thus concludes Scroll Twenty-Six of the *Supreme Secret Essentials***

**Scroll Twenty-Seven of the *Supreme Secret Essentials*: The Chapter of Divine Talismans of the Highest Clarity**

By wearing this talisman, one may traverse perilous passes, cross mountains and seas, summon spirits and subdue ghosts, and command the sacred peaks. Wherever one goes, a thousand demons shall prostrate themselves, ten thousand spirits shall bind their forms, and hosts of immortals shall attend as guards, while one’s body radiates wondrous light.
*From the* Scripture of the Inner True Talismans of the Divine Tiger of the Cavernous Mystery

By wearing this talisman, one wields authority over heaven and earth, rebukes and commands the myriad spirits, rides the clouds and mounts the dragon, and holds office among the exalted immortals. When the jade tones resound, jade maidens shall attend at one’s side, golden perfected ones shall stand guard, a thousand demons shall lose their sight, and ten thousand ghosts shall vanish from form.
*From the* Scripture of the Golden Tiger True Talismans of the Cavernous Mystery

Wear the Three Primal True Talismans of the Supreme Ultimate Lord of the Dao, enclosing them in a brocade pouch and fastening them upon the head. Avoid treading upon defilement.
After five years of wearing the talisman, one shall meet the Perfected.
After nine years, one shall attain spirit communication and penetrating vision, able to sit or stand at will, and command the Six Jia spirits. Heaven shall grant twelve jade lads and twelve jade maidens, and one shall ride clouds and mount dragons to roam and feast in the Jade Palace.

Wear the Talisman of the Treasured Writ of the Supreme Lord, inscribed in cinnabar upon white silk and fastened to the right elbow. Keep it free from defilement.
After eight years of wearing it, the Three Ones shall all appear.

After the Three Ones manifest, inscribe the talisman upon gold foil with realgar on long white paper, and consume it at noon on one’s natal day, facing south. Upon completion, inscribe it again with cinnabar on white paper, and consume it at dusk on one’s natal day, facing the direction of one’s natal sign.

The Talisman of the Treasured Mandate of the Great One for Controlling the Three Hun and Seven Po should be inscribed in cinnabar on white paper during the month, day, and hour of one’s natal sign, and consumed facing north. If one does not know one’s birth month, day, or hour, even knowing one of these suffices; it may also be consumed at noon on a *wu-wu* day.

The Talisman of the Supreme Treasured Spirit for Summoning the Lord of the Dao should be inscribed in cinnabar on white paper and consumed at noon on the days of the Eight Nodes.

The Talisman of the Inner Spirit of the Lord of the Dao and the Great One comprises twelve sections, all being the primordial *qi* of the Supreme Lord’s original essence. Utmostly true and profoundly secret, it must not be transmitted recklessly.
There are also separate talismanic texts for the external oral instructions of the Great One.
*From the* Scripture of the Hidden Writ of the Supreme Elixir of the Cavernous Mystery

The Talisman of the Flying Mystery Born of Cloud Essence and Jade Radiance: for practice, inscribe in cinnabar on blue paper and consume it, or inscribe in cinnabar on blue silk and wear it.
The essence of the Five Auroras enables one to know the Five Auroras and ascend to the Golden Flower.
After seven years of practice, one shall share the same radiance as the constellations.

The Treasured Writ Talisman of the Nine Sources of the Yellow River: for practice, inscribe in ink on white paper and consume it, or inscribe in ink on white silk and wear it.
This is the *qi* of the Jade Essence of the Vast Waves, enabling one to know the inner names of the Nine Rivers, transform and divide one’s form, ascend to roam the Nine Sources, and descend to dwell among the water spirits.
After five years of practice, ten thousand transformations shall be instantly accomplished.

The Talisman for Protecting the Essence of the Dragon Embryo: for practice, inscribe in yellow on white paper and consume it, or inscribe in yellow on white silk and wear it.
This is the *qi* of the Nine Transformations of the Dragon Essence, enabling one to know the Dragon Embryo, transform one’s radiance and ascend the cliffs, roam above the Nine Mysteries, and sport below the Nine Peaks of Mount Yun.
After five years of practice, one shall transcend kalpas without limit.

The Talisman of the Seven Transformations for Dissolving Form: for practice, inscribe in blue on yellow paper and consume it, or inscribe in blue on yellow silk and wear it.
This is the essence of the primordial coagulation of thunder and lightning. This Dao is supremely wondrous, enabling one to divide one’s radiance and scatter one’s form, emit light in myriad transformations, and merge with the Perfected in darkness.

The Jade Talisman of the Seven Primal Radiant Spirits: for practice, inscribe in cinnabar on blue paper and consume it, or inscribe in cinnabar on yellow silk and wear it upon the body.
This is the essence of the Seven Stars, enabling one to transform, conceal, and ascend in radiance to the Jade Court.
*From the* Scripture of the Seven Turnings and Seven Transformations for Dancing in Heaven of the Cavernous Mystery

The Jade Talisman of Inner Vision and Illumination: inscribe in cinnabar on white paper and cast it into water, then face east and click the teeth three times.
After eight years of reciting the incantation, purple clouds shall cover one’s body, one’s eyes shall become bright and penetrating, one shall clearly behold the Nine Heavens, one’s body shall emit wondrous light, and one shall freely transform one’s radiance and soar through the Great Void.
This Dao is most wondrous; it is transmitted only to those who have already become Perfected Ones and is not practiced in the world.

The Jade Talisman of Flowing Auroras for Illuminating and Beholding the Cavernous Mystery: face east, inscribe in cinnabar on white paper, and click the teeth twelve times.
After nine years of reciting the incantation, one shall attain transcendence as a Highest Immortal, ascend to heaven in broad daylight, and roam and feast in the Jade Capital.

The Talisman of the Luminous Spirit of the Yellow *Qi* and Yang Essence: face east, inscribe in yellow on blue paper, and click the teeth twelve times.
After nine years of reciting the incantation, one shall attain transcendence as a Highest Immortal, ascend to heaven in broad daylight, and journey to the Imperial Chamber.

The Talisman of the Treasured Mandate for Enduring Calamity and Preserving Life through the Great Kalpa: when the Nine Yangs converge during the Great Kalpa and the floodwaters surge to the heavens, inscribe in blue on white silk and wear it upon the head. One shall float upon the clear waves, and no calamity shall be able to harm one, preserving one’s body and prolonging life. With long wear, one shall become an immortal.

The Talisman of the Treasured Mandate for Enduring Calamity and Preserving Life through the Lesser Kalpa: when the Lesser Yangs cycle during the Lesser Kalpa and water and fire cross in chaos, with ten thousand calamities arising together, inscribe in cinnabar on white silk and wear it upon the left elbow. One shall not sink when entering the abyss, nor burn when entering fire, and no harm shall be able to injure one, preserving one’s body and prolonging life to share the same lifespan as heaven. With long wear, one shall become an immortal.
*From the* Scripture of the Golden Root of the Azure Essentials of the Cavernous Mystery

**The Heavenly Lord of the Dao Receives the Jade Writ of the Nine Heavens from the Nine Heavens Venerable One**

On a *ren* or *gui* day, carve blue-green stone, inscribe the writ in ink, and bury it on the eastern side of the mountain where one resides. Face east, click the teeth nine times, and recite the incantation:
*"Subdue the ten thousand demons, attain spirit immortality. The Perfected Ones shall come to appear, and jade maidens shall guard one’s form."*

On a *jia* or *yi* day, carve red stone, inscribe the writ in blue, and bury it on the southern side of the mountain where one resides. Face south, click the teeth nine times, and recite the incantation:
*"Subdue the ten thousand demons, attain spirit immortality. The Perfected Ones shall come to appear, and jade maidens shall guard one’s form."*

On a *wu* or *ji* day, carve white stone, inscribe the writ in yellow, and bury it on the western side of the mountain where one resides. Face west, click the teeth nine times, and recite the incantation:
*"Subdue the ten thousand demons, attain spirit immortality. The Perfected Ones shall come to appear, and jade maidens shall guard one’s form."*

On a *geng* or *xin* day, carve black stone, inscribe the writ in white, and bury it on the northern side of the mountain where one resides. Face north, click the teeth nine times, and recite the incantation:

Subdue the ten thousand demons, attain spirit immortality. The Perfected Ones shall come to appear, and jade maidens shall guard one’s form. On a *bing* or *ding* day, carve yellow stone, inscribe the writ in red, and bury it at the center of the mountain where one resides. Face *ren*, click the teeth nine times, and recite the incantation:
*"Subdue the ten thousand demons, attain spirit immortality. The Perfected Ones shall come to appear, and jade maidens shall guard one’s form."*
The true secret shall become self-evident, and one shall ascend to heaven in broad daylight. Guard this closely and do not transmit it!

—From the *Dongzhen Sanjiu Suyu Yujing Zhenjue*

The *Tai Shang Jia Yi Ru Mu Jiu Qi Ban Fu* is inscribed in red and consumed at dawn on the day of *Lichun*, facing east. Additionally, on the *jia-yin* or *yi-mao* days of the first and second months, inscribe it in blue on paulownia wood, making it nine inches wide and one foot two inches long, and bury it at the eastern mountain where one resides, at a depth of nine feet. This is to be done on only one day. Following this method, bury it once every three years, not annually. Simply maintain visualization and ingestion, practicing in accordance with the seasonal nodes. After nine years, the Azure Emperor and the Lord of Mount Tai shall unfailingly respond and descend, overseeing and illuminating one’s form.

The *Tai Shang Bing Ding Ru Huo San Qi Ban Fu* is inscribed in red and consumed at noon on the day of *Lixia*, facing south. Additionally, on the *ding-si* or *bing-wu* days of the fourth and fifth months, inscribe it in red on paulownia wood, making it eight inches wide and one foot two inches long, and bury it at the southern mountain where one resides, at a depth of three feet. This is to be done on only one *bing* or *ding* day. Following this method, bury it once every three years, not annually. Simply maintain visualization and ingestion, practicing in accordance with the seasonal nodes. After nine years, the Vermilion Emperor and the Lord of Mount Huo shall unfailingly descend and appear before one’s form.

The *Tai Shang Geng Xin Ru Jin Qi Qi Ban Fu* is inscribed in red and consumed at dusk on the day of *Liqiu*, facing west. Additionally, on the *geng-shen* or *xin-you* days of the seventh and eighth months, inscribe it in red on paulownia wood, making it six inches wide and one foot two inches long, and bury it at the western mountain where one resides, at a depth of seven feet. This is to be done on only one *geng* or *xin* day. Following this method, bury it once every three years, not annually. Simply maintain visualization and ingestion, practicing in accordance with the seasonal nodes. After nine years, the White Emperor and the Lord of Mount Hua shall unfailingly descend and appear before one’s form.

The *Tai Shang Ren Gui Ru Shui Wu Qi Ban Fu* is inscribed in red and consumed at midnight on the day of *Lidong*, facing north. Additionally, on the *gui-hai* or *ren-zi* days of the tenth and eleventh months, inscribe it in red on paulownia wood, making it five inches wide and one foot two inches long, and bury it at the northern mountain where one resides, at a depth of five feet. This is to be done on only one *ren* or *gui* day. Following this method, bury it once every three years, not annually. Simply maintain visualization and ingestion, practicing in accordance with the seasonal nodes. After nine years, the Black Emperor and the Lord of Mount Heng shall unfailingly descend and appear before one’s form.

The *Tai Shang Wu Ji Ru Tu Yi Qi Ban Fu* is inscribed in red and consumed after noon on the day of the *Tai Sui*, facing the four seasons. Additionally, on the *wu-chen*, *ji-wei*, *wu-xu*, or *ji-chou* days of the third, sixth, ninth, and twelfth months, inscribe it in red on paulownia wood, making it three inches wide and one foot two inches long, and bury it at the center of the mountain where one resides, at a depth of one foot two inches. This is to be done on only four days in the four seasons. Following this method, bury it once every three years, not annually. Simply maintain visualization and ingestion, practicing daily. After nine years, the Yellow Emperor and the Lord of Mount Songgao shall unfailingly descend and appear before one’s form.

The *Tai Shang Jiu Yuan Qing Qi Ban Fu* is commonly inscribed in red on blue paper and consumed at dawn on the days of *Lichun* and the vernal equinox, facing east. Upon completion of the ritual, inscribe the talisman on paulownia wood, recording the year, month, day, and the practitioner’s details: "Disciple [Name], of [Commandery], [County], [Village], [Hamlet], [Mountain] Master, born in the year of [Stem-Branch], aged [X] years, born in the month of [X]," beneath the talisman. Weigh nine taels of blue stone, bind it with blue silk, attach the talisman, and cast it into eastward-flowing waters.

The *Tai Shang Dong Yuan Chi Qi Ban Fu* is commonly inscribed in red on blue paper and consumed at noon on the days of *Lixia* and the summer solstice, facing south. Upon completion of the ritual, inscribe the talisman on paulownia wood, recording the year, month, day, and the practitioner’s details as above. Weigh eight taels of red stone, bind it with red silk, attach the talisman, and cast it into southward-flowing waters.

The *Tai Shang Dong Yuan Bai Qi Ban Fu* is commonly inscribed in red on blue paper and consumed at dusk on the days of *Liqiu* and the autumnal equinox, facing west. Upon completion of the ritual, inscribe the talisman on paulownia wood, recording the year, month, day, and the practitioner’s details as above. Weigh six taels of white stone, bind it with white silk, attach the talisman, and cast it into westward-flowing waters.

The *Tai Shang Dong Chuan Xuan Qi Ban Fu* is inscribed in red on blue paper and consumed at midnight on the days of *Lidong* and the winter solstice, facing north. Upon completion of the ritual, inscribe the talisman on paulownia wood, recording the year, month, day, and the practitioner’s details as above. Weigh five taels of black stone, bind it with black silk, attach the talisman, and cast it into northward-flowing waters.

—From the *Dongzhen Jiu Chi Ban Fu Jing*

The *Feiling Yu Fu*, transmitted by the Perfected One of the Great Ultimate, when consumed for one year, unites one’s body with the spirits, enabling myriad transformations and free movement, while one’s form is concealed in the Jade Chamber. It possesses secret taboos that must not be recorded in writing. On the day of *Lichun*, face northeast and present the *Feiling Yu Fu*, first softly invoking the hidden names of the Eight Radiant Ones. The *Feiling Yu Fu*, when consumed for two years, enables one to ride the void and harness the dawn. It possesses secret names that must not be spoken to others.

On the day of the Spring Equinox, face east to consume the talisman, first softly invoking the hidden names of the Eight Radiant Ones. The *Feiling Yu Fu*, when consumed for three years, enables one to conceal oneself in the Mysterious Empyrean. On the day of *Lixia*, face southeast to consume the talisman, first softly invoking the hidden names of the Eight Radiant Ones. The *Feiling Yu Fu*, when consumed for four years, enables one to traverse the Mysterious Void, emerging from darkness and entering into nothingness. On the day of the Summer Solstice, face south to consume the talisman, first softly invoking the secret names of the Eight Radiant Ones. The *Feiling Yu Fu*, when consumed for five years, enables one to wander and feast in the Eight Palaces, entering and exiting the Void Chambers. On the day of *Liqiu*, face southwest to consume the talisman, first softly invoking the secret names of the Eight Radiant Ones. The *Feiling Yu Fu*, when consumed for six years, enables one to dissolve one’s form into myriad shapes and transform one’s body into a thousand. On the day of the Autumn Equinox, face west to consume the talisman, first softly invoking the secret names of the Eight Radiant Ones. The *Feiling Yu Fu*, when consumed for seven years, enables one to ascend and feast in the Grand Clarity, revolve through the Five Dawns, ride the dragons, and mount the void. On the day of *Lidong*, face northwest to consume the talisman, first softly invoking the hidden names of the Eight Radiant Ones. The *Feiling Yu Fu*, when consumed for eight years, enables one to ascend to the Jade Clarity and roam freely at will.

—From the *Dongzhen Yindi Bashu Jing*

The *Gaoshang Yuchen Mingmo Lingfan*, inscribed in white on blue-green silk, governs the Eastern Quarter. The Azure Emperor and the Great King of Demon-Spirits together vow to protect the Perfected Master of [such-and-such] Peak, whose body harmonizes with the Real and attains transcendence. They command the immortal officials and feathered chariots of the Eastern Peak to receive his person and ascend to the Purple Phoenix Terrace of the Jade Clarity Palace, as sure as the decree of the Nine Heavens.

The *Gaoshang Yuchen Mingmo Lingfan*, inscribed in black on crimson silk, governs the Southern Quarter. The Vermilion Emperor and the Great King of Demon-Spirits together vow to protect the Perfected Master of [such-and-such] Peak, whose body harmonizes with the Real and attains transcendence. They command the immortal officials and feathered chariots of the Southern Peak to receive his person and ascend to the Purple Phoenix Terrace of the Jade Clarity Palace, as sure as the decree of the Nine Heavens.

The *Gaoshang Yuchen Mingmo Lingfan*, inscribed in vermilion on white silk, governs the Western Quarter. The White Emperor and the Great King of Demon-Spirits together vow to protect the Perfected Master of [such-and-such] Peak, whose body harmonizes with the Real and attains transcendence. They command the immortal officials and feathered chariots of the Western Peak to receive his person and ascend to the Purple Phoenix Terrace of the Jade Clarity Palace, as sure as the decree of the Nine Heavens.

The *Gaoshang Yuchen Mingmo Lingfan*, inscribed in yellow on black silk, governs the Northern Quarter. The Black Emperor and the Great King of Demon-Spirits together vow to protect the Perfected Master of [such-and-such] Peak, whose body harmonizes with the Real and attains transcendence. They command the immortal officials and feathered chariots of the Northern Peak to receive his person and ascend to the Purple Phoenix Terrace of the Jade Clarity Palace, as sure as the decree of the Nine Heavens.

The *Gaoshang Yuchen Mingmo Lingfan*, inscribed in yellow on yellow silk, governs the Central Quarter. The Yellow Emperor and the Great King of Demon-Spirits together vow to protect the Perfected Master of [such-and-such] Peak, whose body harmonizes with the Real and attains transcendence. They command the immortal officials and feathered chariots of the Central Peak to receive his person and ascend to the Purple Phoenix Terrace of the Jade Clarity Palace, as sure as the decree of the Nine Heavens.

The *Qusu Jueci Xuanqiu Dazhen* inscribes hidden texts in vermilion on white silk to be worn on the body, empowering one to overawe the ghosts of the Six Heavens, command the spirits of the multitude, summon the talismans of the Five Emperors and the Five Peaks, call forth the hundred ghosts of rivers and marshes, subdue the tigers and leopards of the mountains with plain scriptures, and master the flood dragons of the hundred rivers, employing the decisive texts to restrain the myriad evils.

The *Jiutian Fengqi Xuanqiu Zhenshu* commands the *Moling Fan* to be inscribed continuously on nine-foot plain silk, then worn on the body. If one severs worldly ties and retreats into seclusion, inscribe it on five-colored silks and arrange the *Moling Fan* in the five directions to govern the myriad spirits, summon celestial demons, and attract immortal officials.

The *Qingjing Baoming Mifu*, inscribed in blue-green on white paper: men should first consume the *Baoming Fu*, then the *Huasheng Danxia Lingfu*. The *Huasheng Danxia Lingfu*, inscribed in vermilion on white paper. Women should first consume the *Danxia Lingfu*, then the *Qingjing Baoming Fu*.

The *Zhuming Baoshen Changcun Mifu*, inscribed in vermilion on white paper: men should consume it first, then the *Zhongyuan Huangjing Fu*. The *Zhongyuan Huangjing Fu*, inscribed in yellow on white paper. Women should consume it first, then the *Zhuming Baoshen Changcun Fu*.

The *Zhongyuan Duming Baohun Mifu*, inscribed in yellow on white paper: men should consume it first, then the *Jinguang Ziran Mifu*. The *Jinguang Ziran Mifu*, inscribed in white on white paper. Women should consume it first, then the *Zhongyuan Duming Baohun Fu*.

The *Suling Zhaoshen Baoming Mifu*, inscribed in white on white paper: men should consume it first, then the *Xuanyin Shengxing Shanghua Fu*. The *Xuanyin Shengxing Shanghua Mifu*, inscribed with qi on white paper. Women should consume it first, then the *Suling Zhaoshen Baoming Fu*.

The *Tongling Changming Mifu*, inscribed with qi on white paper: men should consume it first, then the *Feixian Tenghua Mifu*. The *Feixian Tenghua Mifu*, inscribed in blue-green on white paper. Women should consume it first, then the *Tongling Changming Mifu*.

—From the *Dongzhen Fengtai Qusu Jing*

The *Balian Jinye Huaxian Zhenfu*, inscribed in yellow on blue-green paper on the day of *Lichun* and cast into water for bathing, refines and transforms the entire body, summoning the mysterious radiance of the sun and moon and descending the Perfected Ones to the Jade Court. Wearing it inscribed in yellow on blue-green silk for eight years enables one to converse with the Perfected Ones, who descend with cloud chariots to ascend through the Golden Gate and receive refinement in the Pool of Golden Cold.

The *Balian Dantai Yufu*, inscribed in vermilion at noon on the day of *Lixia* on yellow paper and cast into water for bathing, refines and transforms both internally and externally, summoning the immortal roots from the yang essence, attracting the yellow qi to the Yellow Flower, revolving the sun and moon in mysterious reflection, and drawing the Perfected Ones to the Jade Palace. Wearing it inscribed in vermilion on yellow silk for eight years causes the Perfected Ones to descend and transmit it to the aspirant, enabling flight through the Great Void and ascent to the Palace of Cavernous Yang.

The *Ninefold Refined Dragon Radiance Talisman* is inscribed in blue-green on white paper at the *bushi* hour on the day of *Liqiu*, then cast into water for bathing. This refines and transforms the bones and marrow, summoning the mysterious radiance to the Purple Radiance, drawing the yang essence to the Flying Root, gathering the yellow qi within the Water Mother, and descending the Perfected Ones to the Purple Pavilion. If inscribed in blue-green on white silk and worn for eight years, a radiant halo like the full moon will appear above the head, enabling flight through the Great Void and ascent to the Hall of Vast Spirit.

The *Sun Soul Refined Essence Yin Talisman* is inscribed in black on blue-green paper at midnight on the day of *Lidong*, then cast into water for bathing. This refines and transforms the blood and essence throughout the body, drawing the solar essence to the Purple Radiance, descending the Flying Blossoms to the Eight Celestial Steeds, refining the Five Palaces in the Jade Pool, and transporting the aspirant’s body to the Palace of Vast Cold. If inscribed in black on blue-green silk and worn for eight years, the body will emit golden light, and a radiant halo will appear above the neck. The Perfected Ones will descend to transmit the true scripture, enabling flight through the Great Void and ascent to the Palace of Vast Cold.

*—Excerpted from the* Wondrous True Scripture of Yellow Qi and Yang Essence

The *Supreme Wondrous True Talisman of Mount Guishan* is inscribed in blue-green on purple silk. Wearing this talisman for nine years and meditating with eyes closed for a day and a night will cause one to behold the immortals of the Nine Heavens, riding dragons and soaring serpents, flying through the Purple Void to ascend to the Jade Court. Body and spirit will unite with the divine immortals, no longer mingling with the mortal world, and eternal peace will be attained.

**Eastern Radiance Perfected True Transforming Radiance Yang Rosy Cloud Talisman**
During the three months of spring, practice the Dao and meditate to summon the divine. Inscribe it in black on blue-green paper, face east to ingest it, and after a hundred days, one will commune with the spirits. After a thousand days, the gods will appear, granting vision across ten thousand miles and the ability to perceive the natural world while seated. Nine Jade Maidens of the Azure Realms will be commanded, bringing the sacred scriptures of the immortals from the Azure Palace. If inscribed in blue-green on yellow silk and placed at the eastern side of one’s sleeping mat, wrapped in blue-green brocade, after a hundred days the Azure Elder will descend to the chamber, accompanied by the divine officials of the Azure Emperor, who will guard the talisman-bearer with sacred texts. After nine years, azure rosy clouds will arrive to carry the aspirant in flight—this is the principle of spiritual resonance summoning divine descent, enabling one to attain immortality while seated.

**Southern Brilliance Eightfold Refined Cinnabar Radiance Fourfold Mysterious Talisman**
During the three months of summer, practice the Dao and meditate to summon the divine. Inscribe it in blue-green on red paper, face south to ingest it, and after a hundred days, one will commune with the spirits. After a thousand days, the gods will appear, and after ten thousand days, one will attain immortality. Eight Jade Maidens of the Great Cinnabar will be commanded, bringing the alchemical scriptures of the Fire Bell and the Register of Ascension. If inscribed in red on white silk and placed at the southern side of one’s sleeping mat, wrapped in red brocade, after a hundred days the Vermilion Elder will descend to the chamber, accompanied by the divine officials of the Vermilion Emperor, who will guard the talisman-bearer with sacred texts. After eight years, crimson rosy clouds will arrive to carry the aspirant’s body.

**Western Essence Luminous Spirit Transforming Radiance Supporting Script Talisman**
During the three months of autumn, practice the Dao and meditate to summon the divine. Inscribe it in yellow on white paper, face west to ingest it, and after a hundred days, one will commune with the spirits. After a thousand days, the gods will appear, and the Perfected Ones will descend to converse with the divine. Six Jade Maidens of the Great Simplicity will be commanded, bringing the golden essence and solar radiance of alchemical refinement. If inscribed in white on blue-green silk and placed at the western side of one’s sleeping mat, wrapped in white brocade, after a hundred days the White Elder will descend to the chamber, accompanied by the divine officials of the White Emperor, who will guard the talisman-bearer with sacred texts. After six years, clouds of the Three Simplicities will descend to cover the aspirant’s body.

**Northern Mystery Profound True Refined Radiance Whistling Wind Talisman**
During the three months of winter, practice the Dao and meditate to summon the divine. Inscribe it in white on *qi*-infused paper, face north to ingest it, and after a hundred days, one will commune with the spirits. After a thousand days, one will perceive the subtle and hidden, converse with the divine, and command Five Jade Maidens of the Great Mystery, who will bring the celestial charts of the Five Stars’ Consorts, the Lady of the Northern Dipper, and the sacred texts of the immortals. If inscribed in *qi*-script on crimson silk and placed at the northern side of one’s sleeping mat, wrapped in dark brocade, after a hundred days the Mysterious Elder will descend to the chamber, accompanied by the divine officials of the Dark Emperor, who will guard the talisman-bearer with sacred texts. After five years, mysterious clouds will descend to cover the aspirant’s body.

**Central Talisman for All Four Seasons**
During the four seasons, practice the Dao and meditate to summon the divine. Inscribe it in red on yellow paper, face the sovereign direction to ingest it, and after a hundred and twenty days, one will commune with the spirits and perceive omens of fortune and misfortune. After a thousand days, the celestial immortals will descend to converse with the divine. Twelve Jade Maidens of the Yellow Simplicity will be commanded, bringing the *Eightfold Intersecting True Mysterious Record*, the *Phoenix Robe of Flight*, and the *Sacred Scriptures of the Nine Heavens*. If inscribed in yellow on black silk and placed at the center of one’s sleeping mat, wrapped in yellow brocade, after a hundred days the Yellow Elder will arrive at the chamber, accompanied by the divine officials of the Yellow Emperor, who will guard the talisman-bearer with sacred texts. After twelve years, yellow clouds will descend to cover the aspirant’s form, and a jade chariot with feathered wheels will ascend the aspirant in flight to the Palace of Great Mystery.

*—Excerpted from the* Wondrous True Record of Mount Guishan

The *Supreme Register of the Celestial Inspection of the Great Record* is inscribed with a blue-green brush on nine-foot yellow silk and worn on the body. One must journey to the sacred peak of one’s destined life, offer sacrifices to the celestial immortals, report to the Nine Mysteries, and pledge to the Five Spirits. After wearing it for nine years, if the Dao has not yet descended, one should transcribe two copies, ascend the sacred peak according to the ritual, offer sacrifices to heaven, then burn them. The remaining ashes should be scattered into the azure mist, and one copy buried nine feet deep at the sacred peak of one’s destined life. This is called reporting above to the Nine Heavens, below to the Five Spirits, and in the middle to the myriad gods, ensuring eternal longevity.

The *Three Primordials Jade Register of the Mysterious Terrace in Purple Script* should be inscribed with a yellow brush on blue-green silk and offered in sacrifice at the sacred peak of one’s destined life. After wearing it for nine years, if one has not yet ascended, another copy should be transcribed and burned, its ashes scattered into the azure mist. Another copy should be buried three feet deep at the sacred peak of one’s destined life. Wearing this script while traveling in the eight directions, crossing the five sacred peaks, and traversing the sources of rivers will command the earth spirits and govern the myriad gods. After nine years, one will ride the chariot of the Three Primordials to ascend to the Palace of the Three Primordials. One must not defile it with impurity, offend the celestial immortals, or lightly invoke the divine, lest the seven generations of ancestors be punished and the master of the body lose their immortality.

From the *Dongzhen Sanyuan Yujian Bu Jing*:

The Most High Sage Emperor says: Within the Golden Towers lies a concealed scripture, its name inscribed in jade and gold, ascending in radiance to the Upper Clarity. Those who wear it shall have the Golden Tower engraved, their immortal names recorded on jade tablets. The four rivers, five peaks, and sacred mountains shall dispatch their spirits to escort and receive them. After nine years, they shall ride the flying clouds, commanding twelve jade maidens.

Inscribed in cinnabar on white silk.

The Most High Sage Emperor says: The Upper Clarity’s golden script and jade registers—those who know their words shall ascend to the Upper Clarity, their rank equal to the Four Perfected. Those who wear them shall have the Upper Clarity’s script engraved, their names inscribed on golden tablets. The immortals shall decree to the five peaks, and celestial officials shall come forth to welcome them.

Inscribed in azure on white silk.

The Most High Sage Emperor says: The Supreme Ultimate’s white tablets—those who know their text shall ascend to the Palace of the Supreme Ultimate, soaring within the Golden Towers. Those who wear them shall have the Supreme Ultimate’s script engraved upon the tablets, their names recorded among the immortals. The four extremities shall provide escort, and after nine years, they shall take flight.

Inscribed in azure on white silk.

The Most High Sage Emperor says: The *Fangzhu Xuansu Ziming* concealed script—those who know it shall ascend to the Palace of Fangzhu. Those who wear it shall have the *Fangzhu* script engraved, their names inscribed in the *Xuansu* purple register. After nine years of flight, the immortals shall guard and welcome them, and the five peaks shall record their names.

Inscribed in azure on white silk.

The Most High Sage Emperor says: The Great Clarity’s jade records and crimson concealed script—those who know them shall ascend to the Great Clarity, soaring to the Jasper Palace. Those who wear them shall have the Great Clarity’s script engraved, their names inscribed in the crimson register of the jade records. After nine years, they shall commune with the spirits and take flight, attended by twelve jade lads.

Inscribed in cinnabar on white silk.

The Great Simplicity’s jade slips inscribed in gold concealed script—those who know it shall ascend to the Palace of Great Simplicity and ascend to audience with the Three Primordial Lords. Those who wear it shall have the Great Simplicity’s script engraved upon the jade slips. After nine years, descending clouds shall bear them aloft, and they shall ascend to heaven in broad daylight.

Inscribed in yellow on white silk.

The Most High Sage Emperor says: In the Southern Culmen there is the cinnabar script and purple register of the supreme text—those who know it shall ascend in broad daylight to audience with the Supreme Primordial Lord of the Southern Culmen. Those who wear it shall have the Southern Culmen inscribe their names in the purple register. After nine years, the Three Primordials shall descend, bestowing upon them the script of perfection, and they shall ascend to heaven in broad daylight.

Inscribed in cinnabar on white silk.

The Most High Sage Emperor says: The Supreme Primordial’s Azure Palace bears the concealed script of blue-gold and vermilion—those who know it shall ascend to the Azure Palace, soaring to the Highest Clarity. Those who wear it shall behold the true form of the Supreme Primordial. After nine years, they shall descend to the chamber of omens, where the script of perfection shall be bestowed, and they shall attain immortality.

Inscribed in azure on white silk.

The Most High Sage Emperor says: The Vermilion Terrace of the Mystic Capital bears the concealed script of white jade and gold characters—those who know it shall ascend in broad daylight to the Mystic Capital. Those who wear it shall have their names engraved upon the Vermilion Terrace. After nine years, they shall traverse the void borne upon the luminous radiance.

Inscribed in yellow on white silk.

The Most High Sage Emperor says: The Three Primordials’ Palace bears the azure-inscribed concealed script of jade tablets—those who know it shall ascend in broad daylight to soar above the Palace of the Three Primordials. Those who wear it shall have their names engraved upon the jade tablets. After nine years, the Three Primordials shall visit their chamber, bestowing upon them the script of perfection, and they shall attain immortality and take flight.

Inscribed in azure on white silk.

The Most High Sage Emperor says: Within the Mystic Dipper there is the concealed script of the Mystic Register—those who know it shall ascend into the Mystic Dipper, soaring to the Palace of the Highest Clarity, where their names shall be engraved upon the Mystic Dipper. After nine years, divine beings shall descend, bestowing upon them the script of perfection, and they shall attain immortality.

Inscribed in black on white silk.

The Most High Sage Emperor says: The Five Peaks bear the cinnabar script of jade slips and the names inscribed in the purple register—those who know it shall ascend to heaven in broad daylight, soaring above the Five Peaks. Those who wear it shall be guarded by the immortals of the Five Peaks, and the Five Emperors shall engrave their names upon the slips of the Five Peaks. After nine years, they shall traverse the void in flight, ascending to the Azure Palace.

Inscribed in azure on white silk.

The Most High’s Six Jia Plain Memorials of Cinnabar Talismans

The Jiazi Plain Memorial Cinnabar Talisman: inscribed in vermilion on white silk and worn on the person. On a Jiazi day at dawn, inscribe it in vermilion while facing east, then ingest it with a prayer, visualizing the Straight Jia Jade Maiden holding the talisman before you.

The Jiawu Plain Memorial Cinnabar Talisman: inscribed in vermilion on white silk and worn on the person. On a Jiawu day at dawn, inscribe it in vermilion while facing east, then ingest it.

The Jiaxu Plain Memorial Cinnabar Talisman: inscribed in vermilion on white silk and worn on the person. On a Jiaxu day at dawn, inscribe it in vermilion while facing east, then ingest it.

The Jiachen Plain Memorial Cinnabar Talisman: inscribed in vermilion on white silk and worn on the person. On a Jiachen day at dawn, inscribe it in vermilion while facing east, then ingest it.

The Jiashen Plain Memorial Cinnabar Talisman: inscribed in vermilion on white silk and worn on the person. On a Jiashen day at dawn, inscribe it in vermilion while facing east, then ingest it.

The Jialin Plain Memorial Cinnabar Talisman: inscribed in vermilion on white silk and worn on the person. On a Jialin day at dawn, inscribe it in vermilion while facing east, then ingest it.

The Six Jia Cinnabar Talismans: received through ritual offering on a Jiazi day and worn on the body, they summon divine spirits, command the seas, and seal the mountains. Roaming the Five Peaks, all spirits pay homage; the Six Jia are dispatched to ascend to heaven or descend into the abyss. One’s form scatters and radiance disperses—seventy-four directions see desires instantly fulfilled, and all endeavors swiftly accomplished. After nine years of practice, the Three Origins are eradicated, and one soars through the void in flight.

The Inner Names and Jade Talismans of the Flying Numinous Six Jia Jade Maidens

The Three Departments of the Left Flying Numinous Jade Maidens:
- Jiazi: Great Mystery Palace
- Jiaxu: Yellow Plain Palace
- Jiashen: Great Plain Palace
Their hair is styled in three-cornered clouds, with the rest cascading to the waist, and each holds a Jade Spirit Tiger Talisman in hand.

The Three Departments of the Right Flying Numinous Jade Maidens:
- Jiawu: Crimson Palace
- Jiachen: Essence Palace
- Jialin: Azure Mystery Palace
Their hair is styled in three-cornered clouds, with the rest cascading to the waist, and each holds a Jade Essence Metal Tiger Talisman in hand.

The Supreme Talisman of the Jade Essence True Formula of the Great Ultimate: beginning on a Jiazi day, ingest one talisman every two days at dawn. On the eight solar terms, ingest it again at noon.

The Supreme Talisman of the Jade Essence True Formula of the Great Ultimate: beginning on a Yichou day, ingest one talisman every two days at dawn. On the eight solar terms, ingest it again at midnight.

These two talismans are the ancestral talismans of the Flying Numinous Six Jia. Before ingestion, fast for six days. After sixty days of ingestion, one may then ingest the talismans of the sixty Jade Maidens, which govern the summoning of spirits and the opening of numinosity, granting communion with the myriad essences. Continuous ingestion without cessation leads to flying immortality and eternal life. Having ingested the talismans of the sixty Jade Maidens, one must concurrently cultivate them.

Men and women use talismans corresponding to their names. On every Jiazi day and other Jia days, ingest ten Great Talismans of the Highest Clarity, followed by ten Solar Talismans—having first ingested the Lunar Talismans. Do not let others see them. Solar talismans are inscribed in vermilion; Lunar talismans are inscribed in black by day.

The above is from the *Scripture of the Primordial Records of the Seven Sages of the Cavernous Realms*.

The Azure Radiance Treasure Jade Talisman of the Eastern Beginning Green Yang: If the aspirant wishes to summon the Jade Controller of the Azure Emperor, on the days of *Lichun* (Beginning of Spring) and *Chunfen* (Spring Equinox), inscribe in black upon green paper, face east, and ingest. Also inscribe in black upon green silk and wear it. After nine years, the Jade Controller will erase the aspirant’s death register, deliver them to the Palace of Life, and dispatch green auroras and verdant chariots to welcome the aspirant’s body.

The Luminous White Jade Talisman of the Western Lesser Yin: If the aspirant wishes to summon the Jade Controller of the White Emperor, on the days of *Liqiu* (Beginning of Autumn) and *Qiufen* (Autumn Equinox), inscribe in yellow upon white paper, face west, and ingest. Also inscribe in yellow upon white silk and wear it. After nine years, the Jade Controller will erase the aspirant’s death register, deliver them to the Palace of Life, and dispatch flying auroras and pristine clouds to welcome the aspirant’s body.

The Vermilion Spirit Jade Talisman of the Southern Great Yang Cavernous Heaven: If the aspirant wishes to summon the Jade Controller of the Vermilion Emperor of the Left Palace, on the days of *Lixia* (Beginning of Summer) and *Xiazhi* (Summer Solstice), inscribe in blue-green upon red paper, face south, and ingest. Also inscribe in blue-green upon crimson silk and wear it. After nine years, the Jade Controller will erase the aspirant’s death register, deliver them to the Palace of Life, and dispatch vermilion auroras and crimson chariots to descend and welcome the aspirant’s body.

The Mysterious Essence Jade Talisman of the Northern Great Yin: If the aspirant wishes to summon the Jade Controller of the Mysterious Emperor, on the days of *Lidong* (Beginning of Winter) and *Dongzhi* (Winter Solstice), inscribe in white upon black paper, face north, and ingest. Also inscribe in white upon black silk and wear it. After nine years, the Jade Controller will erase the aspirant’s death register, deliver them to the Palace of Life, and dispatch black clouds and green chariots to descend and welcome the aspirant’s body.

The Nine Rivers Mysterious Numinous Dragon Ridge Jade Talisman: If the aspirant wishes to escape the labor of bearing stones to fill the rivers, on the day of their life destiny, inscribe in blue-green upon yellow paper and ingest. After three years, the roots of past sins will be extinguished; after nine years, the River Earl will come forth to welcome them. They may enter water without sinking, and though the abyss be ten thousand fathoms deep, they shall soar through the azure depths.

The Way of Great Mystery is not transmitted to the untrue.

The Ninefold Mysterious Divine Life Cavernous Origin Talisman of the Pure Tenuity: If the aspirant wishes to bypass the Pure Tenuity Heaven and its Three Offices left and right, on the third day of the waxing moon and the day of their life destiny, inscribe in blue-green upon white paper and ingest. Also inscribe in blue-green upon white silk and wear it. The officials of the Pure Tenuity Heaven will descend to guard the aspirant’s body, and after nine years, they shall succeed in dispatching a flying canopy to descend and welcome the aspirant’s body.

The Mysterious Essence Preserving Spirit Jade Talisman of Yu’s Remnant: If the aspirant wishes to bypass the Three Offices left and right of Yu’s Remnant Heaven, on the fifteenth day of the waxing moon and the day of their life destiny, inscribe in yellow upon blue-green paper and ingest. Also inscribe in yellow upon blue-green silk and wear it. The officials of Yu’s Remnant Heaven will descend to guard the aspirant’s form, and after nine years, they shall succeed in dispatching a yellow aurora and a mysterious canopy to descend and welcome the aspirant’s body.

The Vermilion Yang Cavernous Flame Mysterious Essence Life-Body Jade Talisman: If the aspirant wishes to bypass the Three Offices left and right of the Great Vermilion Heaven, on the fifteenth day of the waning moon and the day of their life destiny, inscribe in vermilion upon white paper and ingest. Also inscribe in vermilion upon silk and wear it. The officials of the Vermilion Heaven will descend to guard the aspirant’s body, and after nine years, they shall succeed in dispatching a cinnabar aurora and a flying chariot to descend and welcome the aspirant’s body.

The above is from the *Luminous Regulations of the Four Poles of the Cavernous Realms*. Here ends Scroll Twenty-Seven of the *Supreme Secret Essentials*.

**Scroll Twenty-Eight of the Supreme Secret Essentials: The Nine Heavens’ Chapters on Generating the Spirit**

The Celestial Worthy addressed the Flying Heavenly Divine Kings: These Nine Heavens’ Chapters are the *qi* of the Three Caverns’ Flying Mystery, where three gatherings form sound and coalesce into true script. They blend with the hundred spirits, concealing their inner names in hidden rhymes. Thus, the Great One tests and observes, grasping life across the ten directions, leading to the comprehension of Cavernous Emptiness. They reveal vows in cinnabar and azure, for without eons of karmic affinity and predestined names, even the imperial charts cannot be beheld. Those who attain a glimpse of these texts and their titles shall ascend with nine generations of ancestors.

**First: The Chapter on Generating the Spirit in the Immeasurable Heaven of Yudu**
*The Primordial Qi of the Imperial Perfected Womb-Life, the Primal Unity’s Yellow Evolution*

Blending with the Cavernous Void’s *qi*,
Flying souls drift in the distant and serene.
Eons of boundless renewal stretch endlessly,
Vast and remote, severed from the root.
Suffering souls sink through nine nights,
Yearning for dawn’s yang to lift them.
The Great Possession opens the Gate of Mystery,
Yudu descends in the morning’s aurora.
Yellow clouds congeal in the numinous palace,
Yin and yang’s *qi*-signs intertwine.
The womb’s origin knits long life,
Evil roots dissolve in transformation.
Peach and health merge with essence to extend,
The Two Emperors flourish with jade splendor.
They irrigate the womb’s life-origin,
Refining essence so the spirit never withers.
The Nine Heavens’ Spirit-Generating Chapter—
The spirit, once born, transcends itself.
The Primal Lord bars the path of death,
The Marshal recites the Cavernous Hymns.
One chant summons the myriad perfected in harmony,
Nine recitations bring the heavens to court.
Bowing in reverence through kalpas of ages,
We celebrate this glory of the ancient sprout.

**Second: The Chapter on Generating the Spirit in the Lifespan-Immeasurable Heaven of Upper Upper Meditation Virtue**
*The Qi of the Imperial Perfected Embryo-Life, the Cavernous Dark Purple Gate*

The Purple Gate coalesces in boundlessness,
*Qi* honored as the Heavenly King within.
It ferries flying mystery-souls,
Congealing transformations in the wheel of emptiness.
The old root departs from past attachments,
The karmic origin yearns for its former lineage.
Through dark nights and distant kalpas,
It faces the great cycle’s passage.
The Imperial Perfected’s radiant essence,
Named "Primal Yang," the Infant Scribe of a Hundred Flowers,
Forms the embryo and guards the Yellow Chamber.
Severing roots to seal the gate of death,
Nurturing the infant with joyful countenance.
Meditation virtue guides the numinous *qi*,
Mysterious nourishment feeds the flying heavens’ fragrance.
Flowering luminosity adorns the jade form,
Refinement forges its own visage.
Devoted to the mystery of fostering life,
Arrayed in readiness for the Hall of Light.
The Great Void stirs with numinous convergence,
Commanding me to chant the Spirit-Generating Chapter.
One chant moves the Nine Mysteries,
A second recitation unites heaven and earth.
Blending in natural harmony,
Nine repetitions perfect human achievement.
The Great Sage rejoices in primal felicity,
Scattering blossoms in homage to the Great Void.
All heavens delight in unison,
Every being bows in reverence.

**Third: The Chapter on Generating the Spirit in the Heaven of Xuanyan, Overseen by Brahma**
*The Qi of the Imperial Perfected Soul-Life, the Long-Numinous Bright Immortal*

Xuanyan governs the Three Numinosities,
The Primal *qi* divides from the Mysterious Origin.
Vast and unbounded, the great pattern unfolds,
The Jasper Capital crowned with emerald jade.
The Bright Brahma’s flying mystery-light
Opens the path for long-night souls.
Wandering souls hasten to their destined return,
*Qi* by *qi* reverting to the original root.
The Supreme Emperor is titled "Yang Hall,"
His name: "Eightfold Numinous Lord."
Nine openings reverse the path of Lu,
Embryonic *qi* births the Upper Prime.
Ascending Brahma to review the ledgers of life,
The Great One assists in refining essence.
The Mud-Pill Palace numbers the imperial seats,
The Three Sections and Eight Luminaries divide.
The soul’s birth seizes the wandering *qi*,
Nine revolutions perfect immortality.
Resonant, the Nine Heavens’ sound,
Jade scriptures generate the myriad spirits.
Three recitations array them in proper ranks,
*Qi* intermingles at the Eight Mornings’ Gates.
The Mysterious Pass bars the gate of death,
The numinous guards the source of fluids.
Responding to the convergence of numinous fate,
The Way illumines the hidden turning wheel.
Celebrating this infant’s transformation,
We bow in praise of the Cavernous Scriptures.

**Fourth: The Chapter on Generating the Spirit in the Heaven of Silence and Dou-Shu**
*The Qi of the Imperial Perfected Corpse-Life, the Vast Corpse’s Dark Evolution*

Silent, the colorless origin,
Dou-Shu resists the Great Net.
Numinous transformations divide the Four Luminaries,
Myriad strands of emerald and vermilion auroras.
The wandering *po* does not glance back,
Once departed, it pierces the demonic throng.
The Divine Duke seizes the wandering *qi*,
Floating, refining the pristine blossoms.
Flourishing through kalpas of camphor,
Riding the cycle in accord with the numinous chart.
The Cavernous Void’s Spirit-Generating Chapter—
Jade tones soar beyond the Nine Auroras.
One chant gathers the myriad perfected,
The soaring souls unite as a family.
Nine revolutions complete the luminous array,
Lush and radiant, the jade blossoms gleam.
Dou-Shu opens the Great Possession,
One celebration bestows abundant blessings.
The Supreme Sage turns the imperial chariot,
The infant suddenly breaks into song.
Overwhelmed by this auspicious morning’s gathering,
All bow in harmony.

**Fifth: The Chapter on Generating the Spirit in the Heaven of Joyous Pride, Paranirmita**
*The Qi of the Imperial Perfected Visceral Palace-Life, the Five Immortals’ Central Numinosity*

Fluttering, the Five Emperors’ chariots,
Drifting at the Mysterious Upper Gate.
Wandering through the Yellow Flower Wilderness,
Returning spirits at the Joyous Pride’s threshold.
Gathering the flying emptiness’ luminosity,
Many former souls no longer remain.
The Great Tenuity reverses the Yellow Banner,
Wu-Ying commands the numinous pennant.
Summoning the long-night palace,
Opening the path to receive the born souls.
The Duke’s son assists Huang-Ning,
Recording in full both form and spirit.
Jade scriptures penetrate the dark numinous,
Five revolutions divide heaven and earth.
Refining *qi* in the primal visceral palace,
The Purple Gate spontaneously births immortals.
Countless perfected gather in assembly,
The Yang’s arousal responds to abundant resonance.
Jade maidens anoint with five fragrances,
The Holy Mother celebrates ten thousand years.
The Three Realms rejoice together,
Bowing in homage to the Celestial Worthy.

**Sixth: The Chapter on Generating the Spirit in the Heaven of Responsive Transformation, Cavernous Primordial Sound**
*The Qi of the Imperial Perfected Numinous Palace-Life, the Lofty Perfected’s Surging Fusion*

The sound-responsive colorless realm,
Auroras crown the ten directions.
Revolving transformations leave no shadow,
Dark kalpas hasten toward the Dao’s arena.
The numinous chariot requires no bridle,
Luminously, the Spirit-Generating Chapter arises.
The Cavernous Void is truly boundless,
The mysterious souls, too, grow strong.
Refining the embryo to return to the origin,
Eternally riding the Flying Mystery’s beam.
Abandoning the celestial true in vain,
Scattered thoughts await the constant path.
Severing the stagnant womb-tree,
The heart wanders beyond the Upper Capital.
Wishes and meetings are profoundly profound,
Awakening, I forget both principle and self.
Blessings from the Nine Heavens’ summit,
Exchanging rites with the earthly stars’ goodness.
Blending transformations to return to the Primal Unity,
Loftily uniting with the Primordial King of Origins.
Bowing, we accompany the numinous journey,
Eternally parting from the clamor of dust.

**Seventh: The Chapter on Generating the Spirit in the Heaven of Numinous Transformation, Brahma’s Assistance**
*The Qi of the Imperial Perfected Primal Palace-Life, the Lofty Immortal’s Cavernous Tome*

The Mysterious Assembly governs the boundless,
Blended *qi* returns to Brahma’s assistance.
Pursuing the workings of numinous transformation,
Silently advancing through endless seasons.
Riding the numbers to construct true branches,
Sleeve-swings brush the light feathers.
The Jade Chamber holds wondrous rhymes,
Floating to ascend the high numinous abode.
The circular wheel ceaselessly reflects,
True immortals stand in ordered ranks.

The Lofty Path of the Highest Empyrean stretches afar,
The Cavernous Origin plunges deep into myriad vastness.
Verdant leaves veil kingfisher mists,
Shade lingers o’er limpid isles.
Playful chaos delights the Five Spirits,
Abundant thoughts whistle with radiant companions.
The Five Difficulties depart by principle,
The unburdened heart finds joy in itself.
The luminous soul follows its root-source,
Steadily advancing through the void’s benevolence.
Seven recitations unseal the layered gates,
Stagnation disperses—not by divine might.
Circulation arises from within,
A lofty chant lifts with bowed head.

**Eighth: The Chapter on Generating the Spirit in the Heaven of Luminous Clarity**
*The Qi of the Imperial Perfected Hua-Palace, the Numinous Transformation-Condensing of the Primal True*

Luminous clarity crowns the layered empyrean,
Joining the appointed time amid felicitous clouds.
Jade verses scatter into the unburdened heart,
A solitary radiance summons the numinous assembly.
Resplendent, the mists of light unfurl,
The spirit’s robe knows no hindrance.
Jade branches stream with ethereal echoes,
Leisurely discoursing on the void’s subtleties.
Numinous tones vibrate through the hollow vast,
The Nine Mysteries depart from dark descendants.
Inspired clarity knows no stagnation,
Coming and going like untying a sash.
Illuminating the chapter on generating spirit,
Lofty wandering knows no end or defeat.
Mysterious radiance gleams on the cloud-path,
Traces transcend the divine beyond.
Resonance and response know no bounds,
Casually moving the Four Greatnesses.
With focused mind, bowing and reciting,
All sages together proclaim joy.

**Ninth: The Chapter on Generating the Spirit in the Heaven of No-Thought, No-Attachment, No-Desire**
*The Qi of the Imperial Perfected Yue-Palace, the Spontaneously Illuminating Mysterious Radiance*

No attachment firmly severs emotion,
Mysteriously, the void’s midst clarifies.
The wheel of transformation knows no fixed order,
Numbers arrive yet remain ungraspable.
Who claims the Primal Hue is level?
Towering, the many hills and mounds.
The darkened mind roams freely,
Loftily awaiting the pure spirit’s journey.
A blessed encounter transcends years,
How can kalpas be named?
The floating soul follows its former branch,
Returning to the womb by its own constancy.
Numinous resonance pervades the Great Void,
Soaring steps tread the empyrean’s ice.
Ford-crossings stir myriad currents,
Silently congealing, the true spirit ascends.
No desire thus no sorrow,
Lofty contemplation bows and rises.
