**Right Section from *The Scripture of the Nine Heavens’ Generative Spirit Chapters*:
The Nine Heavens’ Jade Texts**

The *Tai Xiao Lang Shu* is the melody of the Nine Heavenly Kings’ soaring empyrean, the *Qiong Wen Di Zhang* is the text of the Nine Heavens’ summit. Both arose when the Primordial Beginning was born within the spontaneous, hollow vastness. The Jade Emperor of the Hollow Sovereign received them, whereupon the Heavenly Kings inscribed their names therein.

**First: The Jade Text of the Heavenly King of Yu Dan, the Immeasurable Heaven**
The *qi* of the Great Empyrean’s hollow vastness,
Congeals into cloud encampments.
Our King excels in divine craft,
Transforming as if without form.
Within formlessness lies the true,
From the true, the formless is born.
In the distant, boundless void above,
Soughing, the Primordial Beginning’s essence.
Dharma-light illumines wondrous awakening,
Mysterious movement comes to summon.
Constellations array the jade cosmos,
Flying mists transcend green jasper.
Resplendent, the Three Dawns’ radiance,
Streaming light thickens into purple clarity.
Grasping robes at the Jade Radiance Terrace,
Unfastening rest to sport in Phoenix City.
Turning through the empyrean, ascending the Nine Peaks,
To inaugurate an inexhaustible age.
Who can journey here with me?
Come seek my name.
My name is easily known—
It abides in the Eastern Flowery Court.
From there, one may dawn upon the Mysterious Capital,
Contemplating the Emperor’s numinous subtlety.
Cast aside thoughts beyond the clouds,
Focus singularly on the Yellow Tranquility.
Reciting the *Tai Xiao* chapters,
The Three Passes will naturally clarify.
Mysterious descents in lingering chariots,
The void dispatches flying mists.
Though the Nine Heavens seem distant,
Wondrous thought settles your form.

**Second: The Jade Text of the Heavenly King of Shang Shang Shan Shan, the Immeasurable Heaven of Goodness and Non-Toxicity**
Numinous movement initiates the hollow vast,
Golden perfection nurtures the jasper embryo.
Dharma-light illumines the Great Stillness Court,
Mysterious transformation propels itself.
Through kalpas, sinking into the Nine Darks,
With the true, it contracts a hidden tryst.
The Three Dawns announce to the Primordial Beginning,
Movement flows freely, naturally pacified.
Guiding reins above the bright mists,
Streaming essence gleams on jade branches.
Glancing back, within the origin there is,
Merging like an infant.
Father’s tranquility and mother’s essence,
Carefree, sporting at Phoenix Terrace.
Falling light roams the cloud chambers,
Peerless wonder—who can know?
Joining felicity, departing the Net Gate,
Unfastening robes at the Purple Empyrean’s cliffs.
If you wish to seek me,
Diligently study the *Lang Shu* verses.
Revolving the jade texts,
The Heavenly King will naturally respond.
Abide in the Emperor’s singular honor,
As the foundation for seeking immortality.
Sever thoughts, cast aside external musings,
Ever keeping the heart-spirit serene.
Accumulating resonance summons the true to descend,
Lushly, the feathered regalia shines.
Delivering the roots of the seven ancestors,
All ascend the cloud steps together.
Jade verses reflect the lofty numinous,
Jasper texts defy contemplation.
Two wonders harmonize,
Each proclaiming their original disparity.
If you wish to sport in the Nine Mysteries,
Simply recite the *Tai Xiao* poems.
Ten thousand kalpas pass in an instant,
Do not fret over heaven’s delay.

**Third: The Jade Text of the Heavenly King of the Brahma-Monitoring Heaven**
Limpid clarity, without the slightest defilement,
Congealed *qi* forms purple radiance.
The Cinnabar Empyrean reflects the Monitoring Heaven,
Arrayed in the southwest’s return.
The Three Dawns illumine the constellations,
Seven revolutions brighten the Supreme Subtlety.
Numinous winds swiftly carry rare fragrance,
Jade pipes—how mournful their sound!
Divine phoenixes soar in jasper groves,
Hosts of immortals shake their feathered robes.
The Heavenly King rides the movement’s summons,
Grasping the tally, he governs the myriad mechanisms.
Void chariots hurl through the hollow vast,
Vast and bright, the Nine Heavens’ gates.
Escorting guests from the empyrean’s midst,
Unfastening robes to enter the jasper curtains.
Spreading brilliance to support the dawn’s *qi*,
Radiant nets gleam on jade steps.
Ascending Brahma, reflecting the vermilion sun,
A thousand lights wing the numinous glow.
Within the whirlwind of primal transformation,
The jade chariot lingers in circuit.
The Noble Son commands the tiger tally,
Gathering all spirits to return.
Eradicating the roots of the seven ancestors,
Exhausted souls all become immortal and fly.
The *Lang Shu* in the Felicitous Cloud Court,
Jasper texts in the hollow’s subtlety.
Diligently studying, the Dao’s sun shines fresh,
Through a hundred kalpas, the numinous never decays.
Myriad transformations follow movement’s shifts,
Thus knowing the wondrous are rare.

**Fourth: The Jade Text of the Heavenly King of the Silent Heaven**
Feasting on light in the Great Stillness Land,
Whirling winds swiftly turn the jasper wheel.
The Cinnabar Empyrean wings the green chariot,
Divine lords assist the Emperor’s honor.
Hazy, beyond the Nine Transformations,
Separate, departing the gate of inclinations.
Lingering upon golden nets,
Whistling and singing, celebrating the numinous clouds.
Three chants illumine the mysterious awakening,
Five revolutions divide the Dao.
Golden chambers resplendent and towering,
Streaming essence—how profuse!
Glancing left, beholding the Peerless,
Chanting right, gazing upon the White Origin.
Treading prosperity, crossing the Yellow Register,
The Great One excels in the root of destiny.
For me, record the immortal register,
Bestow upon me the text for transcending destiny.
Pure chanting moves the heavenly true,
Stillness governs the hundred passes.

**The Emperor-Unity Mirrors the Numinous Palace,**
Ritual robes soar in azure flocks.
Where do they meet in covenant?
Converging at the apex of the Nine Heavens.
Though the sun shines, no fixed hour is set—
The imperial splendor holds fast to the Four Constants.
Supreme mindfulness casts aside all other thoughts,
The Dao is transmitted from within the Mysterious.

Numinous resonance follows its own course,
Yet those who attain the highest learning are ever whole.

**Joy Without Arrogance: Jade Writ of the Heavenly King, Fifth Chapter**
Within the void, purple mists arise,
Thick and billowing, veiling the Flowery Palace.
Luminous radiance follows the revolving fate,
The Cinnabar Empyrean illumines the verdant chambers.
Wings and aids manifest in the midst of emptiness,
Numinous brilliance shines across the ten directions.
The myriad emperors move by true destiny,
Yet none surpass the King of the Nine Heavens.

His form coalesces with natural elegance,
Holding qi, he emerges from the Void Palace.
Governing transformation at the Four Cardinal Points,
He is hailed as the ancestor of all emperors.
Descending in splendor, riding the Eight Mists,
He unites all wheels in the harmony of space.
At dawn he roams the Western Terrace,
At dusk he rests in the Fusang Palace.

He grasps the jade tablet of the Mysterious Realm’s register,
Liberating the verdant youths of Hua.
Peach and prosperity fix the ledger of destiny,
Bright beginnings preserve the merit of the kalpa.
His sweeping gaze knows no bounds,
The myriad transformations follow the turning fate.
With flying steps, he chants the *Great Empyrean*,
In seclusion, he seeks the traces of the Primordial Beginning.

Accumulated thought stirs the utmost stillness,
Thus ascending to the Mysterious Wisdom.
The legacy of past foundations flows as blessings,
Seven ancestors return to the Southern Palace.
The Five Sufferings are not his path—
His bonds of friendship lie in the Great Void.
The numinous peaks are no ordinary abode,
Flying clouds are his dragons.

Joining hands with the Perfected of the Nine Summits,
He pairs with the radiant to form a pair.
Why remain mired in the clamor of filth,
Dallying until destiny’s end?

**Responding to Transformation by Voice: Jade Writ of the Heavenly King, Sixth Chapter**
Lofty numen shines through the empty cavern,
Congealed qi forms crimson mists.
Waving his staff, he circles the Nine Empyreans,
Drifting, the Heavenly Emperor Perfected.
Jasper terraces gleam upon the rocky cliffs,
Purple phoenixes and jade unicorns flourish.
Ethereal songs drift through the secluded palace,
The solitary one above the clouds.

Holding covenant in the Sevenfold Radiant Chambers,
Golden nets gleam in the central fields.
The Heavenly King embodies the Nine Colors,
Flying immortals number in the billions.
The Cavernous Yang glows with numinous signs,
Marking the years of destiny’s crossing.
Cinnabar blossoms brighten the vermilion sun,
Flowing fragrance bathes the destined body.

Gazing upward, he sips the nectar of the moon,
The Nine Springs pour forth their liquid essence.
Ever preserving through endless kalpas,
Within and without, the Cavernous Void shines resplendent.
Accumulated thought moves the Great Void,
Penetrating the abyss of the Boundless.
Form merges with the primordial unity,
Roaming and feasting—none can turn him back.

**Brahma-Treasure: Jade Writ of the Heavenly King, Seventh Chapter**
Three dawns illumine the secluded night,
Streaming rosy clouds gleam like golden suns.
The cinnabar chambers blaze in towering splendor,
Numinous incense coils around the jasper halls.
The noble scions gather in the Hall of Celebration,
Treading prosperity, grasping the Emperor-Unity.
The Three Origins merge in the Harmonious Palace,
Their subtle words most profound and secret.

Should the destined wish to cross the years of fate,
Let stillness in thought admit no杂 distractions.
Though stillness may seem as if nothing exists,
The true emerges from the void’s midst.
Blessings extend without fail,
The Seven Mysteries are naturally liberated.
Accumulated merit has deep foundations,
Past roots are all dissolved and extinguished.

The jade writ contains wondrous verses—
Guard this chapter, never forget or lose it.
Hold in mind the most numinous taboos,
The Dao descends, uniting with the Mysterious Unity.

**Brahma-Māyā: Jade Writ of the Heavenly King, Eighth Chapter**
The Nine Mysteries permeate the primordial qi,
Purple and white ascend the Jade Empyrean.
Numinous elegance gleams at the Golden Gate,
Spiritual fusion flourishes in the jasper branches.
Vast and open, the Purple Void Pavilion,
Celebratory clouds follow the transformations and vanish.
The abyssal echo strikes the numinous mechanism,
The dharma drum resounds in the Great Seclusion.

Feasting in the Mysterious Dawn’s gate,
Revolving currents skim the cloudy gales.
Beyond the Nine Heavens, he guides the reins,
Driving his chariot in carefree roaming.
Lingering upon the Purple Radiance Peak,
His bearing chilled at the Jade Emperor’s court.
The turning kalpa lasts not a moment,
In an instant, the two symbols converge.

The empty courtyard knows no delay,
Coming and going, following fate’s vastness.
Great transformation does not alter its measure,
The Three Dawns illumine the numinous signs.
Jade script celebrates the divine chamber,
Jasper writ orders the pure songs.
Holding elegance, he emerges from the Mysterious,
Returning countenance—no mere floral adornment.

**Pārijāta-Forgiveness: Jade Writ of the Heavenly King, Ninth Chapter**
Primordial qi congeals in the Nine Empyreans,
The Purple Void brightens the Great Yang.
Flying jasper ascends the blossoming splendor,
Flowing essence crystallizes as jade frost.
Heavenly Perfected ride the revolving fate,
Thin clouds flourish upon the Mysterious Beam.
Dark convergence arises from mutual resonance,
The Cinnabar Empyrean reflects their light passage.

The secluded tryst lies in the High Dawn’s mansion,
Holding covenant, they ascend the Jade Capital.
Numinous transformation surges within the vast,
The boundless, dark realm of fate’s turning.
Flowing fragrance veils the vermilion sun,
Whirling winds swiftly carry rare incense.
Resplendent above the Golden Gate,
Jasper terraces sprout jade blossoms.

Orchids and mushrooms fill the Mysterious Valley,
Gazing upward, he swallows the flourishing Six Stomachs.
Spirit soars, stirring the Secluded Palace,
Profound thought pierces the Cavernous Realm.
Grasping the covenant in the Great Empyrean’s hall,
He studies the jasper writ of the Emperor Perfected.

The *Great Empyrean Jade Script* and *Jasper Writ of the Emperor Perfected*—
Both employ the Nine Mysteries’ subtle words to address the Nine Heavenly Kings within the Cavernous Void,
Before the Primordial Beginning.
Mysterious songs govern destiny,
Roaming and celebrating in the Empyrean Court.
Their sounds and phrases, empty and subtle,
Arise from the Mysterious to generate the divine and true treasured formulas.
Thus are the numinous chapters composed.

Those who practice this Dao
Attain rank equal to the Nine Heavens.
Subtle thought reaches the utmost taboos,
Holding spirit and mind in the true.
Numinous grace descends in response,
Naturally ascending at dawn.

*From the* Wondrous Writ of the Jade Script of the Great Empyrean’s Emperor Perfected
*Right section of* The Supreme Secret Essentials, Scroll Twenty-Eight
*The Supreme Secret Essentials, Scroll Twenty-Nine*

**The Thirty-Two Heavens’ Hymns of Praise**

The Most High Dao Lord observed a pure fast and upheld the precepts in the Western Jade Realm of Xina, upon the Floating Mountain of Yuqie’s summit. He spread golden mats upon the earth, laid white jade and green jasper steps, and adorned the space with seven-jeweled garlands. Radiance blazed like the sun, yellow clouds coiled on all sides, and purple auroras wound thrice around.

The Primordial Heavenly Worthy, together with all the Heavenly Worthies and Great Sages, the Perfected of the Ten Directions, the Boundless Spirit Kings, the Heavenly Immortals, Flying Immortals, Earthbound Immortals, and the Five Thearch Perfected, descended from the void to take their seats. Streaming light illumined all, and the two luminaries merged in darkness.

The Most High Dao Lord, overcome with joy, advanced to bow and addressed the Heavenly Worthy: “Today, the host of sages has descended upon this empty mountain, and the assembly of Perfected rejoices beyond measure. I humbly beseech the Heavenly Worthy to command the Supreme Perfected of the Western Palace to unfurl the strings of the Cavernous Void and harmonize the numinous chapters of spontaneity, that those who have not seen may see, and those who have not heard may hear.”

The Heavenly Worthy, filled with delight, replied: “The numinous chapters of the Cavernous Void and the jade tones of the Heavens are treasured in the Upper Palace and have never been transmitted below. Yet today, at this auspicious feast, joy defies expression, and such an extraordinary gathering brooks no concealment. Now I shall proclaim them universally to the Thirty-Two Heavens, that the fasted Perfected may join in harmony and chant the numinous chapters.”

Thereupon, the Dao Lord bowed his head in reverent celebration, and the hosts of the Heavens, filled with joy, each offered their hymns:

**Hymn of the Grand Yellow Sovereign Heaven**
Virtue crowns the Great Veil,
Pure winds uphold the Mysterious Record.
The heavens’ form endures eternally,
Gazing upon the world, the principle turns manifest.
Treading the path through unending kalpas,
Exploring the hidden, transcending life and death.
The Three Vehicles open the way,
Pure and void, free of dust and dross.
The long night stills the wandering souls,
Hell’s five torments dissolve.
Sword trees no longer sway their branches,
Blade mountains no longer wound the body.
Gates are guarded by lords of vast kalpas,
The earth knows no children of untimely death.
Today, at this joyous gathering,
All the Heavens unite in celebration.
Overcome with gladness,
They raise their voices in reverent hymns.

**Hymn of the Grand Brightness Jade Perfection Heaven**
Feasting in the Jade Perfection’s heights,
Wandering chariots roam the Mysterious Capital.
Carefree within the Grand Brightness,
Eternal lamps gleam upon emerald gauze.
Numinous winds brush layered clouds,
Dragon mounds rise in towering splendor.
Above, Flying Heavenly Beings,
Feathered robes flutter in blossoming hues.
Below, the people of the Dragon Han,
All dwell in kalpas vast as oceans.
The five paths still the wandering souls,
The nine darknesses end the three roads.
Heavenly steeds draw from the Eastern Well,
Endless springs know no silt.
No more the cries of lonely souls,
Only songs of joy resound.
This bliss knows no end—
What shall we do when the turning kalpas come?

**Hymn of the Luminous Childlike Heaven**
The Childlike Heaven of No-Form,
Its Mysterious Origin governs the Grand Clarity.
Resplendent as jade metropolis,
Yellow clouds coil around its four chariots.
Purple groves embellish the southern mounds,
Whirling winds stir crimson jades.
Phoenixes cry, and the long night unfolds,
The nine darknesses brighten in tenfold turns.
The Crow Mother halts the Heavenly River,
Dragons bear the cold well’s emptiness.
The five paths sever the roots of opposition,
The three roads no longer bind with soldiers.
Banners turn to subdue the heavenly demons,
Yellow standards array the northern camps.
The Cavernous Chapters ferry dark souls,
The three realms know no wailing cries.
Above lies the Palace of Blessed Virtue,
Below, forms of renewed life.
This is the law of the Primordial Beginning,
Wondrous indeed, the *Cavernous Void Scripture*.
In joy and reverence, we chant and bow,
Raising our voices to celebrate ten thousand ages.

**Hymn of the Mysterious Womb Nurturing Heaven**
The Nurturing Heaven stands against the three tiers,
Its spirit turns to traverse the ten directions.
Above, it opens the gates of the long night,
Below, it illumines the chambers of the nine darknesses.
Suffering souls ride the celebration home,
Flying to enter the halls of blessing.
Mountains know no souls of grievance,
Only lords of vast kalpas remain.
The Primordial Beginning turns his jade chariot,
Yellow banners summon the numinous winds.
Sweeping clean the five paths’ grounds,
Karmic opposition rides the turning kalpas to passage.
Flying immortals unite in joy,
Celebrating our Palace of Longevity.

**Hymn of the Primordial Brightness Literary Elevation Heaven**
The net of the void dances in round perfection,
Purple wheels adorn the jade court.
Literary Elevation unfurls its crimson radiance,
The Three Conveniences govern the Jade Clarity.
The Net of Separation shines like the Long-Lived Star,
The nine nights gleam with lofty brightness.
The three realms know no dead souls,
Countless kalpas all become spirits.
Majestic, the Ten Sage Lords,
Their virtuous conduct soars in the *Flying Heavenly Scripture*.
One recitation invokes the Heavens’ rites,
Ten turns revive withered bones.
The Seven Mysteries ascend the Vermilion Palace,
Enjoying blessings to enter formlessness.

**Hymn of the Upper Brightness Seven Luminaries Heaven**
Riding the luminous scene, they roam the Three Simplicities,
Soaring high to the palaces of sun and moon.
The Seven Luminaries blaze in the Upper Clarity,
Yu Yi dries in the chambers of jade.
Dispelling demons, not as friends of the Cavernous,
They bind the radiant ones as their companions.
Traversing the ten heavens’ people,
Together they sip the Flying Flower Sovereign’s nectar.
At dawn, they align with the five clouds’ *qi*,
At dusk, they chant the three dawns’ light.
The demonic barbarians know no world,
The five paths’ grounds are nowhere to be found.
Countless kalpas unite as royal citizens,
All called the Hall of Blessed Virtue.

**Hymn of the Void Transcending Balance Heaven**
The Void embraces the Great Veil,
Flying nets dance at the Heavenly Gates.
Pushing through the totality of the Primordial Record,
The four *qi* divide day and night.
Nine assemblies mark extraordinary kalpas,
Named the Gate of Transcending Balance.
Heaven and earth’s principles settle themselves,
Yet joy and bliss cannot endure forever.
This is the realm of blessed virtue,
Where life arises free of evil roots.
Why must the turning kalpas hasten,
Their revolutions never aligning in time?
Grieving for those yet to come,
We chant these mournful and joyous verses.

**Hymn of the Supreme Ultimate Veiled Heaven**
The Veiled Heaven gleams in layered emptiness,
Radiant spirits reflect upon vermilion doors.
The thirty-two heavenly youths,
Broidered robes of flying azure.
Bearing banners, grasping the registers of fate,
They summon and gather the suffering souls.
The long night opens its five gates,
The nine darknesses shine brightly.
The Supreme Ultimate’s Palace of Longevity—
Names inscribed, all ascend as immortals.
The Dharma Gate ferries the heavenly people,
Countless kalpas follow of their own accord.
Seven generations sever the roots of suffering,
Singing as they ascend to the Purple Tenuity.

**Hymn of the Vermilion Brightness Harmonious Yang Heaven**
Vermilion Brightness unfurls the Primordial Chart,
Harmonious Yang returns to the Upper Void.
The Primordial Beginning spreads the numinous chapters,
Ten divisions of the *Flying Heavenly Scripture*.
Opening the deliverance of the nine darknesses’ ancestors,
Ten thousand recitations, the Dao dwells within.
Five mounds adorn the jade palaces,
Life and death become the abode of blessed virtue.
Without the Yellow Register’s writ,
How could the roots of suffering be removed?
Long fasts and recitations of the numinous chapters,
The Five Numinous Ones support one another.
Merit complete, the foundations of heaven and earth,
Generation after generation overflow with celebration.

**Hymn of the Mysterious Brightness Reverent Florescence Heaven**
The *Reverent Florescence Scripture of the Ten Directions*,
Resolving the tones of all the Heavens.

Spreading practice across the Five Paths,
Delivering those of noble aspiration.
The Yellow Demon subdues the Great Demon,
The Red Writs extinguish the lofty groves.
The Three Realms open the mysterious road,
The Heavenly Heart pities the wailing souls.
Passing beyond the Eight Diff

Amid the blade-mountains, keen edges fall,
The Nine Darks unfold their nightly glow.
Tormented souls cast off layered gloom,
Swift as the gale they ascend the Hall of Blessing.
Turning through my Three Vehicles’ gate,
Lifetimes arise as lords of immortals.

*Ode to the Boundless River-Source Heaven*
Boundless, formless realm—
Vast and dim, the Primal Beginning’s dawn.
The River-Source mirrors the Highest Mystery,
Radiant, the Five Scriptures unfurl.
Ten Heavens’ halls of green silk,
Oblivion’s sheen and the sun’s purity.
Five Elders feast in the Round Palace,
Wondrous lads align with the Numinous Mound.
Gazing upward, they chant the Well of Eternity,
Refining the embryo, returning to infancy.
The *Taiyi Preserving-Life Record*,
From Southern Mound, delivers the night-dwellers.
In the Nine Darks, no soul perishes;
At the gate, bodies are reborn.
Past bonds to the Five Sufferings severed,
Kalpa upon kalpa, they dwell in immortals’ abodes.

All heavens in unison rejoice,
In desolate quiet, the sacred texts are intoned.

*Ode to Ruanle Soaring Heaven*
Ruanle soars on dark effulgence,
Cinnabar clouds spread o’er the Three Nets.
Revolving banners summon the ten thousand spirits,
Gongs and drums call forth the celestial demons.
Gongs and drums call forth the celestial demons,
Sweeping clear the Nine Darks’ paths,
Dragons and crows bear the Long River aloft.
Ethereal, they rise above the formless realm,
The soaring tree blossoms with jade radiance.
All sages gather in the Jasper Palace,
The Queen Mother commands the pure song.
Shuangcheng’s yang-melody,
A single chant summons celestial harmony.
Ten chants dissolve the Five Sufferings,
Night-souls cast off layered silks,
Seven spirits return to the numinous embryo,
Rotten bones bloom anew.
The Hall of Blessing teems with pure guests,
In hell, no adversary remains.
The workings of qi proceed naturally,
Thus the Three Paths come to rest.
One flourish stirs ten thousand kalpas’ gratitude,
Jubilation fills the Western Jade That.

*Ode to the Vow-Sworn Heaven of No Limit*
Vow-Sworn, lofty and limpid,
Void and vast, tenfold revolving.
Azure essence first encircles,
Primal qi unfolds its splendor.
Great Possession illumines all,
The Red Emperor lingers in circuit.
Five Talismans flow resplendent,
The Primal Lord releases his might.
Ten thousand spirits bow in awe,
Hordes of demons crumble and fade.
Heaven clears, earth is purged,
The Nine Darks stand wide and open.
After eons of reckoning,
Each follows the mandate to return.
Roots are severed, wombs cut off,
The dead corpses shine with life.
Seven ancestors receive the numinous,
All attain immortal flight.
Extinguished and transcended without limit,
Blessings and joy tower in the luminous court.

*Ode to the Radiant Court Ascending Heaven*
The Radiant Court illumines the Ten,
Pale radiance floats westward.
The Vermilion Youth brandishes his staff,
Urging the spirits of the Nine Mounds.
With flying steps he seizes demons,
Commands spirits, summons the formless.
Gathering qi, he steers the course,
The Primal Beginning roams in brightness.
In a flash, the Four Eights,
Great images intermingle and revolve.
Through kalpas, life’s gates open,
The Five Thearchs display their talismans.
Ten turns return the mysterious,
Dharma grace flows abundantly.
Earth’s treasuries release their stores,
Gold and jade fill every corner.
Dead souls hasten to return,
White bones grow flesh anew.
Carefree on the lofty terrace,
They soar as celestial companions.

*Ode to the Profound Cavern Heaven*
The Profound Cavern gleams in brightness,
Tai bai’s supreme essence.
The Golden Immortal, the Yellow Mother,
Named the Luminous Numinous.
To her right, the Moon Maiden,
To her left, the Life-Sustaining One.
Seven Primes emit their light,
The Sun Lad tosses his bells.
Might shakes the profound depths,
Resplendent, meteors rush forth.
All converge from the ten thousand directions,
Receiving deliverance in the immortals’ court.
Qi does not encircle the dead,
Brahmā-conduct engenders life.
Golden towers amass their records,
Above, the kalpas’ names are inscribed.
When merits are complete, they ascend,
In the Moon Palace, their forms are refined.
To attain the feathered robes,
One must master the Vermilion Infant.
When the Vermilion Infant is mastered,
The records enter the Flowering Azure.
The Five Thearchs escort them apart,
Descending in flying chariots.
Seven ancestors rejoice together,
All ascend to the Highest Clarity.

*Ode to the Wondrous Perfected Heaven*
The Wondrous Perfected’s Upper Capital,
Mysterious model transforms and pervades.
Revolving in Brahmā-conduct,
Filling the Ten Directions.
Formless, they ride the course,
Observing the world’s great impartiality.
To the left, the sun; to the right, the moon,
Virtue bears its majestic radiance.
In one illumination, heaven and earth,
Life and death flourish universally.
All sufferings and hardships are lifted,
Forever parted from Northern Feng.
Crowned and girded in the Southern Realm,
The groves of decaying forms.
Rotten bones rise and walk,
Soaring to the Great Void.
Carefree in the mysterious emptiness,
Clothed and fed in the Hall of Blessing.
With the Primal Beginning, they share affinity,
Lifetimes arise as lords of immortals.

*Ode to the Prohibited Upper Heaven*
The Prohibited Upper Heaven’s kalpa turns,
Revolving spirits on high.
Traversing all heavens,
The thirty-two barriers.
Wheeling dances in the empty cavern,
In a flash, ascending the high pavilion.
All sages come to celebrate,
Together they pay homage at the Jade Gate.
Flying, they tread the void,
In desolate quiet, the sacred texts are intoned.
Jubilant radiance streams through the night,
Returning fragrance, auspicious dust.
Moon-water gleams with blossoms,
Sun-essence refines the immortals.
Flying effulgences pour forth in all directions,
Gold and jade entwine and spiral.
The great kalpa’s dark convergence,
Ten thousand kalpas’ obscure shift.
Life and death share joy,
Radiant and blissful, full of delight.
Flying celestials lead by the hand,
Feasting and reveling in the purple dawn.
Grasping the course, they preserve their years,
Forever enjoying the natural.

*Ode to the Supreme Constantly Harmonious Heaven*
Constantly Harmonious pours forth numinous qi,
All heavens receive its truth.
Gathering the essence of sun and moon,
They stride in splendor, treading luminous jade.
Above, they sip the Supreme Dao,
Eternally renewing their twilight years.
Not delighting in soaring through heaven,
They seek deliverance through the Northern Mystery.
Vast, the Dragon Han’s beginning,
No evil adversaries remain.
Only the immortals’ toil is feared,
Joyfully wandering the round and square.
Ethereal, they ride the course to return,
Yet feel no toil or hardship.
Through ancient kalpas, they tread to gather,
Now they join the celestial guests.
In the Western That’s assembly,
They revel in good karmic bonds.
Delivering seven ancestors in flight,
Ten thousand beginnings gather in the Hall of Blessing.
Crowned and girded, the flying celestial throng,
Soaring on the vast waves’ crests.
Waving my banner of life-deliverance,
In an instant, the Two Modes part,
In a flash, they pay homage to the Imperial Honored One.

*Ode to the Supreme Ultimate’s Resplendent Heaven*
Vast and dim, the Great Net Heaven,
The Supreme Ultimate’s Jade Clarity precincts.
Resplendent, the primal qi of chaos,
Eightfold pervading, leveling the subtle and obscure.
Brahmā-conduct bears no form or hue,
Lofty and firm, no peril of collapse.
When the great kalpas’ reckoning is complete,
Alone it remains, limpid and bright.
Heaven and earth dissolve and vanish,
All sages hasten to return.
Circling the seven-jeweled terrace,
Treading the void, they shake their feathered robes.
Roaming the jade gardens,
How lush the gemstone groves!
Radiant and blissful, unaware of dawn,
In a flash, the great kalpa revolves.
What joy surpasses this joy?
The numinous treasure gleams with true majesty.
Five scriptures plant the mysterious root,
The heavens’ gates open wide.
Born beyond the Great Net’s bounds,
Great and small alike soar as immortals.

Today the host of perfected gather,
Yet the Primordial Beginning’s presence is seldom seen.
Clapping hands in harmony with the Hollow Cavern,
Their zither-songs—how mournful they ring!
Lofty their chants, proclaiming ten thousand kalpas,
As the Most High beckons with his eternal banner.

Here ends the twenty-ninth scroll of *The Supreme Secret Essentials*,
Excerpted from *The Scripture of Cavernous Mystery and the Hollow Cavern’s Numinous Hymns*.

Yulong how towering and vast,
Its soaring heights the foundation of ten thousand Ways.
Triple qi births layered mists,
The Purple Tenuity shines with lush radiance.
Colorless, it ascends into empty space,
So distant and subtle it defies thought.
Within dwells the deathless spirit,
Surnamed Peach, named Returning Child.
None but the people of the Dark Capital
Can know what lies within its form.
For humans, it is the true mandate’s register,
The tally that extends the era of well-being.
Its course unfolds in the age of Eternal Joy,
All sharing the same moment in time.
Yet since the Kaihuang departed,
Where have the ten thousand kalpas each gone?
Though this is no realm of final end,
The world below will soon be hard to govern.
The hosts of heaven, wishing to relieve suffering,
Diligently pay homage at the Seven Treasures Terrace.

*Hymn of the Dragon’s Transformation and Brahmā’s Crossing of Heaven*
The dragon transforms high above the layered skies,
Brahmā traverses the threshold of kalpas.
The Three Nets span the flying heavens,
Opening in full the Ten Immortals’ Gates.
Subtle, the qi of human concentration—
Only the Lord of Unity remains.
He turns the pivot of all heavens’ destinies,
Ever revolving the barrier of a hundred million kalpas.
At the grand assembly, the Primordial Beginning confers,
The Jade Terrace examines the souls of the departed.
The exalted ones wander the Seven Treasures,
The flying immortals chant the numinous scripture.
One intones, the host of immortals responds,
With every word, the boundary of life and death shifts.
They pluck out those bound in endless darkness.

*Supreme Secret Essentials, Scroll Thirty*
*Passage from the Scripture’s Sections*

The King of the Nine Heavens,
Primal source of the ten thousand qi,
Ancestor of all emperors and lords,
Essence and origin of the ninefold qi.
When Heaven and Earth had yet to coalesce,
And the Three Dawns remained unlit,
He spontaneously formed within the Void’s embrace,
Amidst the boundless expanse of primordial chaos.
Through ninety thousand kalpas, the qi divided to govern,
Establishing the Nine Heavens,
Where sun, moon, and stars at last shone forth.
The ten thousand qi flowed and unfolded,
Congealing into the perfected truth of the Dao.
The Primordial August Sovereign and the Supreme Jade Void
Both emerged within the First Heaven.
Thirty-nine Emperors and twenty-four Perfected Ones
Then established palaces and ranks of office.
The August Sovereign’s sacred scriptures were woven from natural patterns,
To practice the Dao of long life and the methods of immortality.
Talismans, jade instructions, and secret formulas
All originated with the King of the Nine Heavens,
Transmitted through generations of the Perfected.
When the Three and Five transformed the cosmic destiny,
And the Nine Numinous Ones answered the appointed time,
The Later Sage, the Ninefold Mystery Dao Lord,
Examined the original source.
After ninety trillion and ninety thousand kalpas,
The August Sovereign’s canonical standards no longer aligned.
In the first year of the Middle August Era, on the first *zhi* day of the ninth month,
Within the Jade Heaven’s Jasper Chamber and Golden Tower,
The Upper Palace commanded the Eastern Flowery Azure Palace
To seek out the standards of past and present,
Collate and revise the ancient texts,
And compile them into three hundred scrolls of sacred scriptures,
Which were then bestowed upon the Prime Minister, the Azure Lad.

*The Exalted Jade Book of Lang* is the melody of the Nine Heavens’ King’s soaring clouds,
*The Jade Texts of Imperial Chapters* are the writings of the Nine Heavens’ summit.
Both arose when the Primordial Beginning first emerged
Within the natural void’s emptiness,
And the Jade Emperor of the Void Sovereign received them from the Nine Mysteries.
*The Eight Scrolls of Yellow Writ from the Grand Tenuity*
Were united with the Mysterious Mother of the Nine Heavens,
Their texts woven in the womb of space,
Passing through countless kalpas
To form natural chapters in the Middle August Era.

The above is from *The Wondrous Scripture of the Cavern-Real Exalted Jade Book of Lang*
And *The Cavern-Real Scripture of the Golden Perfection and Jade Radiance of the Eight Effulgences*.

The Primordial Heavenly King named it *The Scripture of the Eight Effulgences’ Flight*;
The Vastly Born Grand Perfected One called it *The Upper Scripture of the Eight Simplicities*;
The Azure Perfected Youth named it *The Expansive Seven Primes*;
The Supreme Dao Lord named it *The Hidden Book of Jade Instructions and Golden Chapters*.

The above is from *The Cavern-Real Scripture of the Golden Perfection and Jade Radiance of the Eight Effulgences’ Flight*.

*The Cavern-Real Scripture of the Great Cavern Perfection*:
The Eastern Flowery Upper Immortal called it *The Hidden Book of the Eight Simplicities of the Supreme*;
The Southern Flowery Upper Immortal called it *The Scripture of the Great Cavern Perfection*;
The Northern Flowery Upper Immortal called it *The Expansive Scripture of the Nine Luminaries and Seven Primes of the Desolate*;
The Central Jade Emperor’s Immortal called it *The Jade Register of the Eight Effulgences of the Supreme and Exalted*.

The above is from *The Cavern-Real Scripture of the Great Cavern Perfection*.

*The Cavern-Real Scripture of the Nine Perfected Ones of the Supreme*:
Also named *The Flying Text of Heaven*,
*The Liberated Categories of Foreign Lands*,
*The Numinous Chapters of the Divine Continent*.
Though bearing four titles, it is but a single book.

The above is from *The Cavern-Real Scripture of the Nine Perfected Ones of the Supreme*.

*The Cavern-Real Scripture of the Jade Dawn’s Bright Mirror, Golden Flower, Grotto Chamber, Feminine Unity, and Five Elders*:
Also named *The Three Primes’ Jade Dawn Method*,
*The Feminine Unity’s Hidden Mystery Scripture*.

The above is from *The Cavern-Real Scripture of the Jade Dawn’s Bright Mirror, Golden Flower, Grotto Chamber, Feminine Unity, and Five Elders*.

*The Cavern-Real Scripture of the Eight Dao Secret Words of the Central Yellow Elder Lord*:
The Grand Void Perfected One, Red Pine of the Southern Marchmount, said:
This scripture is also called *The Upper Book of the Nine Simplicities*,
*The Jade Text of the Central Perfection of the Supreme Ultimate*,
*The Golden Writs of the Eight Dao*.

The above is from *The Cavern-Real Scripture of the Eight Dao Secret Words of the Central Yellow Elder Lord*.

*The Scripture of the Cavern-Secret Divine Registers*:
*The Lower Scripture of the Lesser Existence* records:
When the Three Sovereigns governed the world,
Each received one scroll to rule all under Heaven.
In times of urgency, they summoned the gods of Heaven
And the ghosts of Earth, commanding them all.
These were called the *Three Tombs*.
Later, eight emperors succeeded the Three Sovereigns in governance,
Each also receiving one scroll,
Ruling the world through the teachings of spirits and numina.
The first three scrolls were called the *Three Essences*,
The next three the *Three Transformations*,
The following two the *Two Transmutations*.
In all, eight scrolls, called the *Eight Simplicities*.

The above is from *The Scripture of the Cavern-Secret Divine Registers*.

*The Scripture of the Cavern-Mysterious True Writ and Jade Instructions of the Red Book*:
*The True Writ of the Red Book of the Nine Qi of the Azure Heaven of the East*,

*The Eight Might Writs of the Divine Incantations of the Eastern Marchmount*.
*The True Writ of the Red Book of the Three Qi of the Cinnabar Heaven of the South*,
Also named *The Southern Clouds’ Passage to Heaven’s Treasure and Numinous Mantle*,
*The Divine Incantations of the Nine Heavens*,
*The Eight Might Writs of the Red Emperor*.
*The True Writ of the Red Book of the Yellow Heaven of the Center*,
Also named *The Nine Heavens’ Numinous Book of the Treasure Kalpa and Cavern-Purity*,
*The Great Incantation of the Yellow Spirit*,
*The Might and Numinous Writs of the Yellow Emperor*.
*The True Writ of the Red Book of the Seven Qi of the Plain Heaven of the West*,
Also named *The Cavern-Micro Chapters of the Golden Perfection’s Treasure and Radiance*,
*The Divine Incantations of the Western Marchmount*,
*The Eight Might Writs Summoning the Dragon*.

Also named *The Cavern Writ of the Treasure of Spirit-Generation and Perfection*,
*The Divine Incantations of the Northern Marchmount*.
On the first *jia* day of the ninth month of the western *xun*,
The Heavenly Gods of the Brahmā Treasure Realm manifested wondrous signs,
Revealing the imperial scriptures and numinous diagrams,
Congealing into true writs.

On *The Scripture of the Divine Metamorphoses of the Purple Luminance and Blazing Radiance*:
It is not that the Purple Luminance and Blazing Radiance possessed an original text,
But rather that the divine scripture spontaneously arose within the empty void,
Condensing qi into chapters, its mysterious radiance blazing forth.
After seven thousand years, its text became visible.
The Heavenly Emperor Lord of the Grand Tenuity inscribed its chapters on purple slips,
And its text in standard script on golden slips,
Recording it as *The Scripture of the Divine Metamorphoses of the Purple Luminance and Blazing Radiance*,
Named for its transformations within the mysterious.

The Nine Heavens’ Venerable One told the Three Heavens’ Jade Lad:
*The Central Record of the Womb Essence of the Nine Elixirs’ Upper Transformation*
Arose at the dawn of the Nine Mysteries,
Formed from the natural qi of the Great Void,
A treasure text practiced by the twenty-four Perfected Ones and thirty-nine Emperors.

*The Hidden Arts of the Eight Earthly Transformations* is the Dao of the Purple Clarity Emperor’s wanderings and concealments, the secrets of departure and change. Its original text comprised eight scrolls, corresponding to the eight directions, containing methods for concealing form and hiding one’s radiance.

*The Scripture of Liberated Beings from Foreign Lands* consists of texts from the primordial caverns of the empty void, chapters of spontaneous origin. It is said that from the Supreme Perfected and Imperial Sovereigns down to those who study immortality and attain the Dao, none fail to receive its teachings from the Great Void.

*The Yellow Plain of the Supreme Lord* and *The Forty-Four Directions* are both texts from above the Nine Heavens, hidden writings of the Eight Assemblies. Thus, the Supreme Lord of the Great Dao commanded the Supreme Perfected of the Grand Ultimate, the High Immortal of Shangqing, to compile and arrange their contents, combining them into *The Divine Formulas of the Yellow Plain*, forty-four in total.

*The Nine Vermilion Talismans of the Supreme Lord* and *The Inner Scripture of the Five Emperors’ True Essence* are formed from the qi of the Nine Heavens, celestial feathered chapters condensed into jade script.

The *Divine Tiger True Talismans of the Supreme Lord* were issued by the Celestial Parents of the Nine Heavens.

The *Golden Tiger and Jade Essence True Talismans of the Heavenly Emperor Lord of the Grand Tenuity* are the natural golden chapters of the Supreme Origin’s luminous radiance.

The Nine Melodies of the Supreme Perfected were all cast in metal slips, inscribed in purple ink.

*The Eightfold Plain Scripture of the True Essence* is the Dao of the Jade Emperor of the Mysterious Clarity.

There are also *Earthbound Immortals*, who possess *The Discourse on the Eightfold Plain Scripture*, containing methods for ingesting royal qi and exhaling-inhaling.

Additionally, there is *The Discourse on the Ninefold Plain Scripture*, which concerns summoning spirits, commanding essences, and managing kitchens and inspecting souls.

*The Scripture of the Seven Cycles and Seven Transformations of the Divine Continent’s Dance of Heaven* states: All the treasured scriptures of Shangqing—three hundred scrolls, nine thousand jade instructions, and seven thousand talismanic diagrams—emerge from the primordial jade chapters of the Highest Origin, inheriting the spontaneous writings of the mysterious ancient Dao.

The Celestial King of the Primordial Origin and the Supreme Emperor rejoiced in the numinous auspices of the Great Void, beseeching the supreme Dharma from the Nine Heavens. They initiated vows and announced the numinous, purifying themselves in the courts of the heavens.

On that day, the sky suddenly darkened, the sun and moon dimmed by day, for three days and nights. Then the azure rooster heralded dawn, and nine suns blazed forth. The mysterious radiance of the eastern direction shone brilliantly. The Green Bird of the Primordial Origin and True Essence returned to soar, bearing in its beak a purple script that alighted upon the jade pavilion. Descending through the empty void, it divinely bestowed the script upon the Celestial King and the Supreme Emperor. Together, they ascended the lofty heavens, reverently receiving the true writ.

The Celestial Venerable said: "You both return to your seats. I wish to impart to you the essential instructions on perceiving the subtle and stabilizing the will. Its essentials are simple and easy; from ease comes enlightenment—is this not delightful?"

The Two Perfected Ones said: "Perceiving the subtle and stabilizing the will—is there a scripture for this?"

The Celestial Venerable said: "There are no written words."

The Two Perfected Ones said: "This is like running into a wall, a bottomless great folly. If there are no written words, how can one attain enlightenment?"

He replied: "At that very moment, all scriptures were originally without written words. Are not today’s words also a scripture?"

The above is from *The Scripture of the Cavern Mystery’s Perception of the Subtle and Stabilization of the Will*.

**Chapter on the Virtues of the Scripture**

The *Five Elderly Numinous Treasure’s Five True Writings* are the primordial celestial texts of the Originator, born within the Void and Cavern, serving as the root of Heaven and Earth. Their numinous majesty and wondrous nobility, their dharma teachings and awe-inspiring authority, unfold across the Three Primes, their virtue crowning all heavens. They possess fourteen virtues:

1. Their virtue is like the Great Void—boundless and unobstructed, the ancestral origin of the Originator.
2. Their virtue is like Non-Being, where Non-Being gives rise to Being, and Being returns to Non-Being.
3. Their virtue is like the Great Dao—its numinous might vast and expansive, the treasure of divine luminaries.
4. Their virtue is like Heaven—serene, clear, and loftily empty, its vast covering without limit.
5. Their virtue is like Earth—open, receptive, and boundlessly supportive, bearing all without exception.
6. Their virtue is like the Three Luminaries—illuminating all heavens, universally bestowing radiance.
7. Their virtue is like the Lofty Perfected—expounding the mysterious teachings, the most revered within Heaven.
8. Their virtue is like the Divine Humans—universally delivering all beings, universally receiving spontaneity.
9. Their virtue is like the Great Mystery—pure, open, and expansively established, the capital of divine immortals.
10. Their virtue is like clouds and rain—all the myriad things universally receive their shade and moisture.
11. Their virtue is like wind—all the myriad things receive its dispersal and release.
12. Their virtue is like the four seasons—all the myriad things receive their completion and growth.
13. Their virtue is like Mount Tai—preserving and securing the primordial destiny, pacifying the numinous and anchoring the spirits.
14. Their virtue is like the Great River—boundless and unobstructed, embracing all without exception.

These wondrous and weighty true writings embody these fourteen virtues. Their virtue is thus—towering and lofty in model. Its measure is beyond reckoning, like the shade of mountains flowing with divine currents. Through ten thousand kalpas without end, it unfolds and illuminates the primordial transformation—none does not arise therefrom.

*From* The Scripture of the Cavern Mystery’s Red Writings.

Laozi said: The *Supreme Numinous Treasure* has always existed before Heaven and Earth first arose, from countless kalpas past, naturally emerging from primordial chaos—it is the true essence of the Dao. In the Dao, it is the root of the Dao; in the dharma, it is the origin of the dharma. The divine humans of the ten directions all begin with the *Numinous Treasure*.

Laozi said: In the beginning of chaos, at the subtle and wondrous source, before the opening of creation, there already existed the *Numinous Treasure’s* natural true writings, prior to the appearance of the Emperor. I am the profound gateway of the *Numinous Treasure’s* Great Dao; those who receive its essence become the spirits of Heaven, Earth, and humanity.

Laozi said: The *Supreme Numinous Treasure* arises from the formless Void and Cavern of Heaven, Earth, and the myriad things. The Great Dao’s constant movement within the boundless and non-active naturally coalesces into spontaneity—its nobility beyond naming, its reverence without superior. Thus, it is called *Supreme*. It encompasses all that is vast, penetrates all that is minute, its principle wondrous and unfathomable—the origin of Heaven, Earth, and humanity. In Heaven, the five stars circulate qi, the sun and moon radiate light; on Earth, the five peaks secure their positions, mountains stand tall and seas run deep; in humanity, the five constituents remain secure. Without the *Numinous Treasure*, how could Heaven shine? Without the *Numinous Treasure*, how could Earth manifest form? Without the *Numinous Treasure*, how could humanity attain life? Thus, the teeming myriad things take me as their root, me as their gateway. Why am I the root and gateway? I possess the *Numinous Treasure’s* writings.

Laozi said: When a serpent obtains the *Numinous Treasure*, it transforms into a divine dragon; when a crow obtains it, it becomes a phoenix; when a common beast obtains it, it changes into a qilin; when an ordinary person obtains it, they are called a sage. What is a sage? One who possesses the *True Writings of Penetrating the Sage*, able to ingest them and wander playfully upon the Five Peaks, roam freely in the Void, transform the five viscera, alter their form and appearance, command ghosts and spirits, penetrate the subtle in the ten directions, appear and vanish unpredictably, ascend heights and ride clouds, journey afar in the lofty purity.

Laozi said: *Numinous* means penetrating the Dao—able to penetrate the Great Dao’s utmost numinosity, thereby commanding the myriad spirits. *Treasure* means able to preserve in harmony with Heaven and Earth. Thus, the *Supreme Numinous Treasure* is the utmost reverence of the Dao.

Laozi said: When a state is about to prosper, it cultivates and attains these writings. If one desires wealth, honor, and agelessness, they must attain the *Numinous Treasure*. If the Son of Heaven obtains it, phoenixes will come to pay homage, the five stars will align in harmony, the sun and moon will radiate brilliance, the four directions will submit in reverence, the world will be clear and peaceful, no omens or evils will arise, the feudal lords will unite in allegiance, and his lifespan will equal Heaven and Earth, his myriad fortunes never declining. If a feudal lord obtains it, the constellations will harmonize their light, benefiting state and family, his position will ascend, and he will enjoy long life and enduring vision, forever secure from calamity. If a grandee obtains it, he will extend his years without end, attain noble rank and abundant emolument, and ascend to the status of prince.

*From* The Scripture of the Cavern Mystery’s Five Praises.

The *Highest Three Primes’ Dispersal Scripture* is the true book of the Three Heavens of the Highest Purity, the flying writ of the jade tally of the Highest Perfected. The Upper Prime’s tally is the *Great Record of Heaven*, the Lower Prime’s tally is the *Jade Writ of Earth*, and the Middle Prime’s tally is the *Book of the Divine Immortals*.

The *Three Primes’ Writings* state: The jade tally’s writings emerge from the immortals of the Ninefold Mystery’s Void and Cavern, congealing the qi of spontaneity to form jade writings. The Nine Heavens divide and judge, the Three Ways unfold and clarify. Without these writings, the Three Luminaries would darken and dim, the Five Emperors would err in their positions, the Nine Movements would overturn and shift, and the Seven Lodges would scatter their essence. Without these writings, the Nine Lands would sink into the abyss, the Five Peaks would collapse, mountains and rivers would invert and topple. Without these writings, immortal officials would not descend, earthly officials would not govern, the names of the Nine Heavens’ above would not be inscribed in the mysterious register. One’s efforts in study would be in vain, and the Dao would have no means to be accomplished. Its method is lofty and wondrous. The Three Primes’ secret writings—those who obtain these writings will have their rank elevated to immortal minister.

*From* The Scripture of the Cavern Reality’s Three Primes’ Jade Tally.

The Dao states: The *Scripture of Ascending the Mystery* is the essential principle of Heaven and Earth, the ancestral origin of virtue and the Dao, revered by the highest sages, feared and obeyed by ghosts and spirits. Its height extends beyond the Nine Heavens, its depth penetrates below the Nine Earths. Its thousand transformations and myriad changes—all Dao is exhausted therein.

The Supreme Lord said: In my past lives, seeking divine immortality, I refined cinnabar and ingested mushrooms, merely attaining extended years. Though I lived for a thousand years or ten thousand ages, death still brought suffering. Though I possessed the strength to move mountains and halt rivers, to embrace and conceal the sun and moon, I could not escape the Three Paths and Eight Difficulties.

Later, I encountered the Most High Heavenly Worthy and obtained the *Scripture of Numinous Treasure* along with its ritual fasts. Following the scripture’s instructions in cultivation for seventeen years, I attained the true Dao and thus beheld the good and evil of past, future, and present—the three times.

Dao Ling said: I do not yet understand the meaning of "Ascending the Mystery." I humbly beseech your compassion to expound and clarify it, that those of future karmic affinity may comprehend its profound subtleties.

The Dao said: Your inquiry is most essential. I shall now explain—listen carefully and do not forget. "Ascending" means "to rise above." All the great sages of the ten directions, the perfected who neither live nor die—none who attain the Dao fail to ascend beyond the Three Realms, to ascend to the Golden Towers. Their bodies are born of water and fire, their virtue harmonizes with emptiness. They encompass the purest essence, vast and boundless, above enveloping the heavens’ net without limit, below entering the bottomless subtlety of the infinitesimal. Ascending, they merge with the formless, their essence serene and spontaneous.

"Mystery" is the image of no-light, the form of no-thing. Approached, it has no head; pursued, it has no tail. Near, it cannot be drawn close; distant, it cannot be estranged. It governs the great subtlety—the Heaven within Heaven, the True within the True, the Spirit within the Spirit. Those who attain it are called "Ascending the Mystery."

Dao Ling said: Since attaining perfection, my body has ascended to the Mystery Palace. For nine years now, I have only just received and heard the *Wondrous Scripture of Ascending the Mystery*.

---

From the *Scripture of Ascending the Mystery*:

The Most High Lord Lao said: Among the great scriptures of the Daoist tradition, none surpass the Five Thousand Characters—the hymns of the Cavern Mystery and Cavern Reality. When this text is recited in emptiness and distance, it summons the descent of cloud chariots and jeweled canopies, dragon-drawn carriages, and ascension to heaven in broad daylight. The Five Thousand Characters are the ancestral origin of virtue and the Dao, the True within the True. Unsullied by defilement, they may be recited from beginning to end. Expounding their wondrous meaning brings order to kings and lords; fasting and reciting them causes the body to fly as an immortal.

---

From the *Cavern Mystery Scripture of Petitioning Inquiry*:

**On the Preservation and Loss of Scriptures**

The Heavenly Worthy said: I have surveyed all heavens from kalpas past to this day. The lofty sages, great spirits, and perfected of the upper heavens, as well as the flying immortals of the Nine Palaces and Five Peaks—none have failed to receive deliverance through the *Numinous Treasure* and thus become true. This scripture is revered and wondrous, delivering countless beings.

When great kalpas cycle and the heavens collapse, the earth sinks, the four seas merge into darkness, gold and jade dissolve, and the myriad Dao’s influences cease—this scripture alone endures, its methods unbroken. All miscellaneous methods—techniques of guiding and nourishing life, arts of transformation, scattered folk prescriptions—belong to the Six Heavens and the Desire Realm. When a minor kalpa arrives, these methods perish entirely, leaving no trace.

The various talismans of Supreme Clarity, the *Scriptures of the Great Peace*, and the *Greater and Lesser Sutras* circulate among the eighteen heavens above and below, within the Form Realm. When the great kalpa turns and heaven and earth are renewed, their texts still vanish, leaving no remnant.

The divine scriptures of the Three Caverns of the Jade Clarity’s Upper Dao—the *Tiger Script of Spirit Perfection*, the *Golden Writ and Jade Characters*, the *True Scripture of Numinous Treasure*—all issue from the Primordial Beginning and abide above the twenty-eight heavens of the Formless. When the kalpa cycles, their texts return to the Seven Jeweled Mystery Terrace atop the Jade Capital in the Great Luo Heaven of No-Form, untouched by calamity.

---

From the *Cavern Mystery Scripture of the Wondrous Wheel of the Dao*:

The Dao said: My scripture of the wondrous wheel has existed since kalpas beyond reckoning—like the dust of the earth or the sands of the Ganges, its duration defies comparison. Though heaven and earth rise and fall beyond count, and all other scriptures perish, mine remains unbroken. Turning with the wheel of fate, its teachings flourish ever more, delivering boundlessly. It is the most revered among scriptures, just as the heavens’ teachings flourish. Without this scripture, the Dao’s methods would not spread.

Thus, all teachings and doctrines begin with this scripture. Like the stars’ universal radiance, this scripture shines like the full moon—brightest among them, illuminating the ten directions. Like the Three Realms’ unending darkness, this scripture rises like the sun, universally illuminating all heavens with clarity. Like the flow of ten thousand rivers, this scripture is the abyss of the Scorching Valley—the source of the vast sea, to which all return. Like the height of Mount Sumeru, this scripture is the Mountain of the Jade Capital—encompassing all.

This scripture is subtle and wondrous, enduring as long as heaven and earth. The primordial kings of the heavens, the lofty immortals and perfected of boundless number—none fail to obey its command. Thus, it universally saves beings. Whether one studies or not, it broadly opens the gate of the Dao: above, it governs the Three Luminaries; in the middle, it harmonizes yin and yang; below, it opens the myriad lives. All receive its sheltering shade, their seven ancestors delivered, lost souls rescued, the wounded and broken made whole. Like a boat ferrying people, it ensures the wheel of rebirth never ceases.

---

From the *Cavern Mystery Scripture of the Wheel of the Dao*:

**On Karmic Affinity with Scriptures**

The *Seven Sages’ Mystery Record* reverses the celestial texts. Some align in rhyme, some interweave by category, some unite above and below to form sounds. Some mark the true taboo names, some combine single and compound characters—all emerge from the primordial emptiness of the Cavern Mystery. The lofty sages compiled them to reveal the numinous texts. Later scholars who study their chapters, receiving the precious secrets, naturally ascend as immortals.

Yet there are the Six Harmonies and the Seven Harms. Treasure them, and they unite; neglect them, and they vanish. Those with karmic affinity must diligently cultivate sincerity: observe long fasts on sacred peaks, seek distant secluded mountains, burn incense and perform rites, recite scriptures morning and night, abandon all stray thoughts, and focus the mind on the Supreme Perfection. Only then may the Mystery descend, and one ascend in broad daylight.

Among later scholars, some whose names are not inscribed on the Mystery Register yet obtain the precious scriptures—all because their past lives bore abundant virtue, whose blessings extend to them. Or they possess hidden merits, their aspirations surpassing the crowd, their single-minded austerities moving the Jade Emperor. The Four Poles record their deeds, the Five Peaks inscribe their names, leading them to encounter scripture masters and receive the precious texts.

If one diligently cultivates without violating the Seven Injuries, the Perfected Ones will descend to bestow the true scriptures. Those who attain the sacred texts of the *Mystic Register of the Supreme Sages* do so because in primordial antiquity they possessed the destiny of flying immortals—inscribed in the unseen patterns before birth, their names retroactively recorded in the *Mystic Void’s* annals. Having received the human Dao, their names were registered in the *Azure Palace*, protected by the Four Directors, attested by the Five Emperors, their essence bound in the *Jade Void*, their roots planted in the *Purple Web*. Their bones radiate extraordinary light, their entire form harmonizing with immortality. The Four Poles secretly descend, conferring the precious texts in concealment. The *Supreme Unity* revises their celestial register, the *Director of Destinies* alters their years. Their souls become steadfast, their spirits secure; the six bones crystallize into perfection, the myriad spirits fully manifest—thus do they ascend as Supreme Immortals.

The Most High Sage Emperor Lord declares: All who obtain the *Mystic Register of the Seven Sages* and traverse the Nine Empyreans, though they have not yet ascended, have their names registered in the *Azure Palace* and receive talismans from the Five Peaks. The officials of all numinous mountains, rivers, and seas guard their bodies. Twelve Jade Lads and twelve Jade Maidens attend the sacred scriptures, serving the Way and practicing perfection. This is the spontaneous convergence of the Mystic’s destined meeting, a principle inherent in nature. The Supreme Sages all have their names retroactively inscribed in the *Azure Register*, their positions aligned with the ranks of immortal ministers. Only when the Way is complete, the Four Perfected Ones arrive at their chambers, and the numinous chariot descends, may they ascend at dawn. The standards of ascent and descent follow their rank, advancing in immortality according to their grade. This Way is profoundly subtle, not something ordinary study can glimpse or hear.

The Most High Sage Emperor Lord declares: Those with jade bones and cinnabar script, whose names are listed in the *Imperial Chart*, may behold the *Mystic Register of the Seven Sages*. Those with golden marrow and purple viscera, whose names are inscribed on golden tablets, may behold the *Hidden Writings of the Inner Texts*. Those with extraordinary and wondrous features, purple wombs and jade networks, whose names are marked in the *Upper Register of Certainty*, may behold the *Upper Scroll of the White Tablet*. Those with flowing essence and purple radiance, inner illumination entwining their exterior, their precious treasuries and golden countenances, whose names are recorded in the *Jade Void*, may behold the *Azure Register’s* scriptures. Those with divine destiny matching the celestial charts, jade embryos and purple voids, whose names are inscribed in the *Eastern Florescence*, may behold the *Examination Text of the Seven Injuries*.

The Most High Sage Emperor Lord declares: Later scholars who delight in diligent cultivation, harmonize with others through gentle conduct, embrace the Four Greatnesses with magnanimity, and accommodate all things with tolerance—such persons have their mystic names inscribed in the *Imperial Register*, their purple characters woven into the *Jade Scrolls*. They receive qi from the *Divine Charts*, their virtue flourishing to unite with immortality. Internally, the *Great Ultimate* oversees their illumination; externally, they become the lineage of the *Grand Artificer*. When their merit is complete and the Way perfected, they naturally ascend to heaven in broad daylight.

*—Excerpted from the* Wondrous Scripture of the Primordial Register of the Seven Sages of the Cavern Realms*, spoken by the Lady of Purple Tenuity to the Queen Mother of the West:*

The Nine Qi forge and temper; the Supreme Unity moves the spirit. Though you have attained human form—of which there are many—without the *Numinous Tablet of the Supreme Unity*, the *Golden Names of the Three Origins*, the *Hidden Talismans of the Director of Destinies*, or the *Purple Registers of the Five Elders*, even if born through the qi of heaven, you cannot hear or see the Supreme Way. Without the *Purple Tablets of the Mystic Palace*, the *Precious Names of the Highest Sovereign*, the *Jade Register of the Supreme Unity*, the *Hidden Charts of the Eastern Florescence*, the *Divine Inscriptions of the Three Origins*, or the *Triple-Soul Attestations of the Supreme Emperor*, though you may briefly hear the Supreme Way, you cannot cultivate it, or if you do, you cannot persist. Persistence may lack firm

Without a golden name inscribed in the Orchid Terrace’s cinnabar script and the Purple Chamber, one cannot see or hear of this book.
— *From the* Hidden Writ of the Golden Prime and Feathered Chapters of Jade Clarity *(Dongzhen Jin Yuan Yu Zhang Yu Qing Yin Shu)*

Those whose golden names and jade characters are arrayed in the charts shall conceal radiant essence within their bones and are destined to receive this text.
— *From the* White Spirit Inner Prayer of the Great King Who Dissolves Demons *(Dongzhen Xiao Mo Da Wang Bai Shen Nei Zhu Wen)*

All who possess a golden name on the Imperial Tablet and purple script of Highest Clarity shall receive this text, for they are predestined to be recorded in the Azure Palace as those who respond to immortality. If one’s body lacks extraordinary *qi*, uniquely endowed by nature to harmonize with the divine radiance, whose inner illumination of feathered splendor reflects the Primordial Simplicity, giving rise to the seven numinous spirits within the five viscera and entering the marrow of the Mud-Pill Palace—if one’s bones bear the jade brilliance of the Five Emperors and one’s blood flows with the vast golden springs—such are the signs of a Heavenly Immortal. If one possesses a golden name and jade script, with charts submitted to the Mystic Register, one may receive this text.

The texts of the Southern Culmen’s Upper Prime and the Precious Secret Jade Tallies—without a golden skeleton, jade marrow, mystic name, or Imperial Chart, none may see their chapters.

**Chapter Thirty-Two: Transmission of the Scriptures by the Host of Sages and the Time Limits for Transmission**
*Supreme Secrets Unbound, Scroll Thirty-Two*

**Chapter on the Transmission of the Scriptures by the Host of Sages**

The Yellow Emperor said: The texts of the Great Cavern and Jade Clarity are cultivated by the august Highest Perfected; they are not transmitted to those of the earthly realm. The scriptures of the Cavern Mystery and Highest Clarity are, in due time, bestowed below to instruct the most devoted scholars. The books of the Cavern Spirit and the Three Sovereigns are transmitted to the world below to stabilize transformation, assist the state, and succor the myriad people.
— *From the* Scripture of the Cavern Spirit *(Dongshen Jing)*

The Highest Lord Emperor addressed the Most Exalted Minister, the Azure Lad: All the celestial writings of the thirty-six nations and the sounds of the nine earths are the natural script and voice of the Primordial Cavern and the Void. From the Celestial Perfected and Emperor-Sages down to those who study immortality and attain the Dao, none fail to receive these sounds from the Great Void and bear their texts as they wander.
— *From the* Scripture of the Cavern Perfection on the Release of Foreign Lands *(Dongzhen Waiguo Fangpin Jing)*

They bound the qi of the Nine Origins and the Orthodox Unity to compose verses of sorrow and joy, which were illuminated upon the Mystic Terrace. Each character measured a *zhang* in size, their radiant patterns resplendent, penetrating the Nine Heavens. Seven-jeweled floral light streamed and shone upon Highest Clarity. The Master of the Mystic Capital received them from the Great Void, later inscribing them in phoenix-script and transmitting them to the Most High Great Dao Lord. The Dao Lord passed them to the Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate, who in turn transmitted them to the Azure Lad, Great Lord of the Eastern Sea’s Square Cauldron.
— *From the* Scripture of the Cavern Perfection on the Phoenix Terrace and the Curved Silk *(Dongzhen Fengtai Qusu Shang Jing)*

The Tiger Perfected Talismans were issued by the Nine Heavens’ Father and Mother of the Great Perfected. The Elder of the Great Perfected transmitted them to the Little Lad of the Eastern Sea, and the Perfected Kings of the Nine Heavens transmitted them to the Most High Dao Lord.
— *From the* Scripture of the Cavern Perfection on the Divine Tiger Perfected Talismans *(Dongzhen Shenhu Zhenfu)*

The Supreme Jade Emperor transmitted them to the Celestial Emperor of the Grand Tenuity, who bestowed them upon the Later Sage, the Dao Lord of Great Peace.
— *From the* Scripture of the Cavern Perfection on the Loftiest Divine Wisdom and Hidden Writings *(Dongzhen Gaoshang Shenhui Yinshu)*

The Most Exalted Minister, the Azure Lad, said: The Elder of the Nine Heavens and the Three Supreme Jade Lads simultaneously transmitted them to the Great Emperor Lord. The Great Emperor Lord passed them to the Supreme Lord of the Southern Culmen, who transmitted them to the Queen Mother of the West. The Queen Mother of the West conveyed them to the Celestial Emperor Lord of the Grand Tenuity, who bestowed them upon the Sage Lord of the Golden Portal. The Sage Lord of the Golden Portal transmitted them to the Most Exalted Minister, the Azure Lad, who passed them to the Lord of the Western City, charging him to deliver them to later students destined to become Perfected Ones.
— *From the* Cavern Perfection’s Jade Essence True Formulae of the Three Origins’ Plain Speech *(Dongzhen Sanyuan Suyu Yujing Zhenjue)*

The *Lang* Writings of the Great Empyrean are the melodies of the Flying Empyrean’s Celestial Kings. The Imperial Chapters of the Jade Texts are the writings of the Nine Heavens above. Both originated with the Primordial Beginning in the natural Void Cavern. The Jade Emperor of the Void Sovereign received them from the Nine Mysteries and, after ten thousand kalpas, transmitted them to the Great Perfected King. The Great Perfected King passed them to the Perfected of Mount Taihua, the Lord of Longevity of the Three Heavens, the Perfected of Great Harmony, the Old Master of the Eastern Flower, the Supreme Overseer of Prohibitions of the Southern Culmen, the Central Attendant of the Western Terrace, the Central Perfected of the Northern Emperor, the Great Numinous Prince, the Perfected Consort of the Great Numinous, the Vermilion Essence Jade Lad, the Master of the Dark Valley, the Red Pine of the Southern Marchmount, the Royal Bridge of Mount Zhong, the Perfected of Purple Yang, the Lord of the Western City, the Central August Master, and Zhao Boxuan—all of whom cultivated and received these scriptures.
— *From the* Scripture of the Cavern Perfection on the *Lang* Writings of the Great Empyrean *(Dongzhen Taixiao Langshu Jing)*

The *Hidden Writings of the Golden Chime and Great Empyrean* and the *Precious Scripture of the Cavern Perfection on the Mystic Flight of the Two Luminants* were transmitted to the Most High Jade Dawn, the Great Dao Lord of the Supreme Clarity. The Jade Lads of the Three Heavens, the Queen Mother of the Western Tortoise, the Purple Essence of the Great Simplicity, the Lords of the Three Origins, and the Central Yellow Old Emperor of the Supreme Ultimate received them. The Great Emperor transmitted them to the Celestial Emperor Lord, the Celestial Emperor Lord of the Grand Tenuity, the Supreme Overseer of Prohibitions of the Southern Culmen, and the Golden Portal Emperor Lord of the Supreme Clarity of the August Heaven.
— *From the* Scripture of the Cavern Perfection on the Jade Pendants and Golden Earrings *(Dongzhen Yupai Jindang Jing)*

The Four Perfected—of the Great Perfected, the Nine Capitals, the Supreme August, and the Supreme Ultimate—received them from the Most High Jade Dawn, the Lofty Sage Dao Lord.
— *From the* Scripture of the Cavern Perfection on the Inner Writings of the Six Jia of the Numinous Flight *(Dongzhen Lingfei Liujia Neiwen Jing)*

The Elder of the Nine Heavens said: The *Central Record of the Embryonic Essence of the Nine Elixirs’ Upper Transformation* was transmitted by the Great Emperor Lord to the Lady of the Southern Culmen, who passed it to the Celestial Emperor Lord of the Grand Tenuity. The Celestial Emperor Lord of the Grand Tenuity conveyed it to the Later Sage, the Golden Portal Emperor Lord, who transmitted it to the Most Exalted Minister, the Azure Lad. The Azure Lad further compiled and arranged its sequence for application, entrusting it to the Perfected of the Western City.
— *From the* Central Record of the Embryonic Essence of the Cavern Perfection *(Dongzhen Taijing Zhongji)*

The Most High Jade Dawn, the Lofty Sage Lord, received them from the Nine Mysteries. After seven thousand years, he transmitted them to the Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate, the Great Spirit of the Eastern Flower, the Azure Lad of the Square Cauldron, the Divine King of the Fusang Sun Valley, and the Perfected of Pure Emptiness. They swore an oath upon Highest Clarity, rending gold as their pledge. Those whose bodies bear these texts shall vanish into the eight directions; those who cultivate their arts shall ride the void and mount the skies. They are received orally and must not be recklessly transmitted.
— *From the* Scripture of the Cavern Perfection on the Eight Arts of the Hidden Earth and the Communion with the Elixir’s Radiance *(Dongzhen Danjing Tongjing Yindi Bashu Jing)*

All the three hundred volumes of the precious scriptures of Highest Clarity, the nine thousand sections of jade formulae, and the seven thousand chapters of talismans and diagrams originate from the Most High Jade Emperor. They are endowed with the natural writings and the Dao of the Primordial Antiquity. This Dao is secretly preserved in the heavens above, within the Palace of Great Existence. The transmission of the jade texts is entrusted to the Most Exalted Minister, the Azure Lad.
— *From the* Scripture of the Cavern Perfection on the Seven Turns and Seven Transformations of the Heavenly Dance *(Dongzhen Qizhuan Qibian Wutian Jing)*

The *True Scripture of the Eight Simplicities* is the Dao of the Jade Emperor of the Mystic Clarity. The Heavenly Emperor of the Supreme August transmitted this text to the Celestial Emperor Lord of the Grand Tenuity, the Lord of the Purple Essence of the Three Origins, and the Lord of the Primordial Yang and the Ancient. These three lords received the text and practiced it. After attaining the Dao, they transmitted it to the Most High Dao Lord, who passed it to the Later Sage, Lord Li. Lord Li conveyed it to the Perfected of the Great Void, Red Pine of the Southern Culmen, charging him to bestow it upon those who study the Dao and whose names are already inscribed in gold. The Way of the August Splendor of the Sun and Moon was transmitted by the Primordial Beginning to the Nine Celestial Kings of the Most High Jade Emperor. The Elder of the Nine Heavens inscribed its text upon the Western Tortoise Mountain within the Void Mystery, where it was mystically bestowed upon the Queen Mother of the West. The Most High Great Dao Lord received it from the Nine Mysteries and transmitted it to the Great Emperor Lord of Fusang. The Golden Portal Emperor Lord received it from the Northern Origin and passed it to the Most Exalted Minister, the Azure Lad. The Great Emperor transmitted it to the Four Poles’ Perfected Ones. The Dao of the Primordial Antiquity is perpetuated through the succession of qi, the transmission from Perfected to Perfected.

The above is from the *Supreme Perfection Eight Simplicities Perfected Scripture of the Cavernous Truth*. In former times, the Three Lords—the Grand Thearch, the Celestial Thearch, and the Grand Tenuity—received the Mysterious Cinnabar Upper Scripture from the Most High Great Dao Lord. Having practiced and perfected the Dao, they ascended to replenish the Perfected of the Jade Thearch. On the day of their ascent into the clouds, the Grand Thearch transmitted the scripture to the Queen Mother of the West; the Most High Celestial Thearch Lord transmitted it to the Southern Culmen Supreme Origin Lord; and the Grand Tenuity Celestial Thearch Lord transmitted it to the Golden Portal Sage Lord. The Sage Lord transmitted it to the Most Exalted Minister, the Azure Lad, and the Azure Lad transmitted it to Master Juan.

The above is from the *Supreme Perfection Grand Tenuity Celestial Thearch Lord’s Mysterious Cinnabar Upper Scripture*. The Most High Treasure Chapters were transmitted to the Grand Thearch Lord, the Grand Thearch Lord to the Celestial Thearch Lord, the Celestial Thearch Lord to the Grand Tenuity Celestial Thearch Lord, the Celestial Thearch to the Golden Portal Emperor Lord, and the Golden Portal Emperor Lord entrusted them to the Azure Lad of the Eastern Sea.

The above is from the *Supreme Perfection Simplicity and Numinous Lesser Possession Wondrous Scripture*. The Nine Reds are the qi of the Nine Heavens, soaring in dark-feathered splendor, congealing into jade script. The Primordial Beginning Elder transmitted them to the Most High Great Dao Lord; the Primordial Celestial King transmitted them to the Southern Culmen Supreme Origin Lord; the Most High transmitted them to the Fusang Grand Thearch; the Grand Thearch transmitted them to the Grand Tenuity Celestial Thearch Lord; the Grand Tenuity Celestial Thearch Lord transmitted them to the Later Sage Golden Portal Emperor Lord; the Golden Portal Emperor Lord transmitted them to the Most Exalted Minister, the Azure Lad; the Azure Lad transmitted them to the Southern Culmen Supreme Origin Lord; the Supreme Origin Lord transmitted them to Master Hongya; Master Hongya transmitted them to the Four Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate—all transmitted through the succession of qi.

The above is from the *Supreme Perfection Nine Reds Mottled Talisman Inner Perfected Scripture*. Such are the phoenix scripts of the Nine Heavens, the melodies of sorrow and joy, the Dark Mound Grand Perfected—all formed from the natural qi of the Nine Heavens. The numinous script manifests its marvels within the Void Mystery, enduring through ninety thousand kalpas. The Dark Capital Elder received it from the Grand Numinous and transmitted it to the Most High Great Dao Lord; the Dao Lord transmitted it to the Supreme Ultimate Perfected; the Perfected transmitted it to the Azure Lad of the Eastern Sea Fangzhu.

The above is from the *Supreme Perfection Phoenix Terrace Melodies of Simplicity Upper Scripture*. Formerly, the Supreme Origin Lady transmitted the hidden script to the Jade Maiden of Grand Harmony, and the Jade Maiden of Grand Harmony transmitted it to the Young Yang Lord.

The above is from the *Supreme Perfection Jade Clarity Hidden Writings Scripture*. The Transcendent King of the Dark Capital formerly received it from the Three Elders of the Grand Tenuity; the Lord of the Western Citadel formerly received it from the Queen Mother of Tortoise Mountain.

The above is from the *Supreme Perfection Grand Tenuity Yellow Writings Scripture*.
