The White Thearchs of its gates are variously titled: White Numinous Duke, White Spirit, White Essence, or White Thearch Lord, all serving the Central White August Perfected Great Lord.

The method for ascending to the Water Star: the Water Essence of the Round Mirror of the Chen Star illumines the Northern Dark. Within the Chen Star are five gates, from which five radiant beams emerge, their light cascading five million *zhang* in length. Each gate is guarded by a Black Thearch, five in total, all attending and protecting the Northern Perfected August Thearch. At the star’s center resides the Grand Mystic Yin Origin Black Thearch of the Dao, whose taboo name is Qixuan and whose style is Jingyuan. His consort’s taboo name is Xuanhua, and her style is Long’e. They govern within the Water Star, presiding over the five gates, circulating the luminous qi of Mystic Radiance to illumine the Northern Origin’s court.

For those who would become Perfected, the method of flight and ascent begins with visualizing the Water Star. Focus the mind and gaze upon the star, placing both hands over the heart. Then raise both hands to cover the ears, hold the breath five times, knock the teeth together twenty-seven times, and swallow saliva nine times. Closing the eyes, silently invoke the names of the Chen Star’s Perfected August Thearch of the Dao and his consort three times. Upon completion, say: *"May I be granted to ride the Eight-Scenery Azure Chariot with you, O Thearch, and your consort, ascending to the Upper Clarity’s Upper Origin Palace."*

Then, facing the star, recite the subtle invocation:
*"The five qi soar mystically, their light flowing to the North.
I lift my gaze to the five gates, where azure towers rise in splendor.
Their radiant beams pierce the void, their numinous glow illumines the clouded skies.
Within dwells the Black Thearch, whose style is Jingyuan.
Dragon-robed Long’e, resplendent, together they govern the Mystic Pass.
Alike they don the azure mantle, their skirts of purple brocade take flight.
At their waists hang tiger talismans, upon their heads rest lotus crowns.
They ascend beyond the Nine Voids, descend to echo the Jade Ford.
Preceded by the Black Thearchs, followed by the Six Ren,
they descend to welcome, ascending to the Purple Chamber.
My name inscribed in the Supreme’s register, I attain the rank of Jade Perfected."*

When the invocation is complete, remove the hands and no longer cover the ears. Face the star with eyes open, absorbing its radiant light twenty-seven times, visualizing the five beams entering fully into the throat. Once finished, knock the teeth together three times.

Practicing this for fourteen years, the Grand Mystic Upper Star Perfected Lord of the Chen Star petitions the Highest Palace, inscribing the name upon the Jade Tablet of the Jasper Chamber, establishing it in the Purple Script of Jade Clarity, and conferring the rank of Perfected Duke of Upper Clarity. The Chen Star has five gates, within which reside five Black Thearchs. Each Thearch oversees one gate, attending the Central Mystic August Thearch.

The Mystic Thearch is the Supreme Perfected of the North, the August Lord of Grand Mystery, who enters and exits the Upper Void, befriending the Purple Essence Thearch of the Dao. The Black Thearchs of its gates are variously titled: Black Numinous Duke, Black Spirit, Black Essence, or Black Thearch Lord, all serving the Central Grand Mystic Black August Perfected Lord.

The method for ascending to the Earth Star: the Earth Essence of the Round Mirror of the Zhen Star shades and stabilizes the Yellow Dao. Within the Zhen Star are four gates, from which four radiant beams emerge, their light cascading four million *zhang* in length. Each gate is guarded by a Yellow Thearch, four in total, all attending and protecting the August Perfected of the Stabilizing Origin. At the star’s center resides the Yellow Center Perfected August Thearch of the Dao, whose taboo name is Cangmu and whose style is Danyan. His consort’s taboo name is Kongyao, and her style is Feixian. They govern within the Zhen Star, overseeing the four gates, circulating the flowing qi of the Yellow Skirt to illumine the Central Origin, gazing upon those who study the Perfected.

The method of flight and ascent begins with visualizing the Zhen Star. Focus the mind and gaze upon the star, placing both hands over the heart in reverence. Then raise the left hand to cover the Cavern Chamber, hold the breath four times, knock the teeth together twenty-seven times, and swallow saliva nine times. Closing the eyes, silently invoke the names of the Zhen Star’s Perfected Lord and his consort three times. Upon completion, say: *"May I be granted to ride the Eight-Scenery Yellow Chariot with the Central Grand Thearch of the Dao and his consort, ascending to the Upper Clarity Palace."*

Then, facing the star, recite the subtle invocation:
*"The four qi meander, converging upon the Central Origin.
I lift my gaze to the Nine Poles, behold the four gates at my side.
The Yellow Terrace and Purple Chamber, their beams scatter radiant light.
Numinous brilliance spreads in splendor, celestial blossoms fall like rain.
Within dwells the Yellow Thearch, whose style is Danyan,
and his consort, Portent of Virtue, known as Feixian.
They govern the harmonious qi, guiding the Mystic to irrigate the Origin.
Alike they don the yellow clouds, their skirts of dragon brocade and tiger patterns.
At their waists hang golden talismans, upon their heads rest purple crowns.
They ascend beyond the Mystic Void, unfolding their light at the Golden Gate.
Preceded by the Yellow Thearchs, followed by the Six Ji,
they descend to welcome, ascending to the Celestial Pass.
My name inscribed in golden script upon the Supreme’s register,
engraved upon the jasper tablet, soaring through the Grand Void,
I attain the rank of Jade Minister."*

When the invocation is complete, remove the hand and no longer cover the Cavern Chamber. Face the star with eyes open, absorbing its radiant light twenty-seven times, visualizing the four beams entering fully into the throat. Once finished, knock the teeth together three times.

Practicing this for fourteen years, the Yellow August Perfected Lord of the Zhen Star petitions the Supreme Palace, inscribing the name upon the Azure Tablet of the Jade Terrace, establishing it in the Nine Mysteries’ Cinnabar Script, and conferring the rank of Perfected Duke of Upper Clarity. The Zhen Star has four gates, within which reside four Yellow Thearchs. Each Thearch oversees one gate, attending the Central Yellow August Perfected Thearch.

The Central Yellow August Perfected Supreme Thearch is the Loftiest Honored One of the Central Ultimate, who enters and exits the Grand Tenuity, befriending the Primordial Thearch of the August Beginning. The Yellow Thearchs guarding its gates are variously titled: Yellow Numinous Duke, Yellow Spirit, Yellow Essence, or Yellow Thearch Lord, all serving the Central Yellow August Perfected Lord.

To practice the absorption of the Five Stars in a single night, ensure it is done regularly and comprehensively. In spring, begin with the star of the East; in summer, begin with the star of the South. Follow the dominant month and its corresponding star as the primary star, without being constrained to a single direction, but rather proceeding according to the star’s position and orientation.

When the sky is overcast and no stars are visible, perform the practice within your bedchamber, inwardly visualizing the Five Directions as one. The Perfected One states: "Visualizing the stars within the chamber is no different from seeing them with your eyes—do not abandon the practice simply because the stars are not visible." This is the Hidden Dao of the Supreme Thearch, the secret method of ascending at dawn.

When swallowing the radiance of the stars, at that moment fully visualize the Supreme Thearchs of the Star Perfected Ones and the Supreme Thearchs’ Consorts descending upon the light and entering your mouth as you swallow. With eyes closed, faintly perceive their forms.

By constantly cultivating this Hidden Method of the Supreme Thearch and invoking the Supreme Thearchs of the Five Stars, within five years you will dimly perceive their forms; in seven years, you will see them and walk alongside them; in fourteen years, the Five Stars will unite and descend together, bearing you upon a dark-flowered chariot, enveloped in the Three Simplicities and purple clouds. Preceded by the Five Thearchs and followed by the Ten Thousand Perfected, the Five Stars will escort you to ascend at dawn, ascend to the Jade Purity, and receive the scriptures to become a Perfected One of the Highest Clarity.

—From the *Eight Simplicities of the Cavern-Real Perfected Scripture*

The Azure Thearch of the Eastern Marchmount: inwardly visualize the Nine Crimson-Speckled Talisman of Jia-Yi Entering Wood. The Azure Thearch Lord of the East, surnamed Chang and named Jing Meng, wears the Nine Origins Celestial Crown upon his head, dons azure brocade, and drapes a flying skirt of jade-green brocade. He bears the Supreme Thearch’s Nine Qi Life-Spirit Seal and the Azure Feather Intertwined-Spirit Sash. On the day of the Beginning of Spring, he rides a cloud chariot drawn by nine azure dragons, accompanied by twelve Azure Waist Jade Maidens, each holding nine-colored banners of the Azure Forest’s blossoms. He roams the Eastern Marchmount, Mount Tai, reviewing the records of Perfected Ones and Immortal Officials, and at times visits the Water Thearch of the Eastern Sea to audit the merits, transgressions, and demerits of those who study the Dao.

When returning to bestow the talisman upon the practitioner, the adept should ingest the talisman to summon its spirit, visualize its qi, and draw down its Perfected One. Seek to have one’s name erased from the Water Thearch’s ledger and inscribed in the Jade Register. On the day of the Beginning of Spring at dawn, bathe, purify, and fast, then enter your chamber, burn incense, and ingest the Nine Crimson-Speckled Talisman of Jia-Yi Entering Wood. After nine years of practice, you will be able to inscribe talismans and cast them into mountains, causing mountains to summon clouds and rain, swiftly vanishing into obscurity; inscribe talismans and cast them into water, causing dragons in the water to descend into abysses ten thousand fathoms deep. If you inscribe talismans upon wood while among people, the writing will not fade but grow clearer. Carrying the talisman and embracing a tree, your body will transform into a mountain forest, guarded by twelve Immortal Officials of the Eastern Marchmount. After eighteen years, you will be able to fly and ascend to the Highest Clarity.

The Lord of the Northern Marchmount, Mount Heng, on the day of the Winter Solstice presents memorials listing the names of Perfected Immortals who have attained the Dao and those who have just begun their studies, reporting to the Supreme Thearch Lord on high. He records and reviews the mysterious names, distinguishing merits from transgressions.

To cultivate the Dao of Flying Immortality, on that day at midnight, bathe, fast, and purify, then enter your chamber and burn incense. Face north and visualize the Lord of Mount Heng, surnamed Fu and named Tong Meng, who wears the Five Origins Treasure Dawn Jade Crown, dons a flying skirt of black brocade, and drapes a robe of Mysterious Pattern Bright Light. He bears the Intertwined-Spirit Purple Sash and rides a dark cloud flying wheel, accompanied by twelve Immortal Officials of the Northern Marchmount, all riding flying turtles and holding five-colored banners. They turn toward the northwest, ascending to the boundless heights of the Jade Purity Heaven, wandering amidst the void within black clouds. Strike your teeth five times and silently recite: "Today is most auspicious, the Eight Nodal Points return in cycle. May the Dao Lord deign to glance upon me, descend into my body, take charge of my life’s register, and eternally preserve my celestial years."

Conclude by visualizing the Lord of Mount Heng descending upon your chamber in a flying wheel of black clouds, black qi billowing and filling the room. The Lord stands amidst the black qi, holding a purple tablet and inscribing your name upon it. Softly recite the incantation:

Mysterious Yin returns the spirit,
Riding the sun to govern the dawn.
The Five Qi gather the Perfected,
Universally governing the host of immortals.
Surveying the radiance of the Upper Palace,
Wandering amidst the cloud array.
Deign to descend and oversee,
Come to my chamber’s eaves.
Inscribe my name on the Mysterious Tablet,
Record it in the Jade Register above.
May my Dao shine brightly,
Penetrating and entering the Perfected.
Command the Five Spirits,
Seal rivers and summon mountains.
Descend dragons and summon rain,
Guide clouds and raise mist.
Ride the light wheel through the skies,
Ascend to the Thearch’s dawn.

Conclude by gazing upward and swallowing the Five Qi in proper order.

After nine years of practice, the Lord of Mount Heng will descend to bestow upon you a black dragon cloud chariot, provide Jade Persons as Immortal Officials, and summon the spirit medicines of the Northern Direction. You will gain insight into the yet-unmanifested affairs of the Northern Direction, as well as the omens of fortune and misfortune. After eighteen years, you will fly and ascend to the Highest Clarity.

—From the *Nine Crimson-Speckled Jade Thearch’s Inner Perfected Scripture*

The Jia-Yi Azure Thearch’s Intertwined-Spirit Jade Talisman: inscribe with malachite on crimson silk and wear upon your person. Additionally, on a Jia or Yi day, inscribe with azure ink on crimson paper, face east, and ingest one talisman. After three years, the Azure Waist Jade Maidens of Jia-Yi will descend and appear, granting your body spiritual communion and knowledge of affairs ten thousand miles to the east. The Immortal Officials of the Eastern Marchmount will deliver the natural kitchen. After nine years, the Azure Thearch will descend to your bedchamber, welcoming you with an azure cloud flying wheel to ascend to the Highest Clarity Palace.

The Bing-Ding Crimson Thearch’s Intertwined-Spirit Jade Talisman: inscribe with cinnabar on yellow silk and wear upon your person. Additionally, on a Bing or Ding day, inscribe with cinnabar on yellow paper, face south, and ingest one talisman. After three years, the Crimson Simplicity Jade Maidens of Bing-Ding will descend and appear, granting your body spiritual communion and knowledge of affairs ten thousand miles to the south. The Immortal Officials of the Southern Marchmount will deliver the natural kitchen. After nine years, the Crimson Thearch will descend to your bedchamber, welcoming you with a crimson cloud flying wheel to ascend to the Highest Clarity Palace.

The Geng-Xin White Thearch’s Intertwined-Spirit Jade Talisman: inscribe with white ink on black silk and wear upon your person. Additionally, on a Geng or Xin day, inscribe with white ink on black paper, face west, and ingest one talisman. After three years, the White Simplicity Jade Maidens of Geng-Xin will descend and appear, granting your body spiritual communion and knowledge of affairs ten thousand miles to the west. The Immortal Officials of the Western Marchmount will deliver the natural kitchen. After nine years, the White Thearch will descend to your bedchamber, welcoming you with a plain cloud flying wheel to ascend to the Highest Clarity Palace.

The Ren-Gui Black Thearch’s Intertwined-Spirit Jade Talisman: inscribe with black ink on azure silk and wear upon your person. Additionally, on a Ren or Gui day, inscribe with black ink on azure paper, face north, and ingest one talisman.

After three years, the Ren-Gui Dark Simplicity Jade Maidens will descend and appear, granting your body spiritual communion and knowledge of affairs ten thousand miles to the north. The Immortal Officials of the Northern Marchmount will deliver the natural kitchen. After nine years, the Black Thearch will descend to your bedchamber, welcoming you with a dark cloud flying wheel to ascend to the Highest Clarity Palace.

The Yellow Thearch’s Wu-Ji Intertwined-Spirit Jade Talisman: inscribe with yellow ink on white silk and wear upon your person. Additionally, on a Wu or Ji day, inscribe with yellow ink on white paper, face the Grand Year Star, and ingest one talisman. After three years, the Wu-Ji Yellow Simplicity Jade will descend and appear, granting your body spiritual communion and knowledge of affairs ten thousand miles to the center. The Immortal Officials of the Central Marchmount will deliver the natural kitchen. After nine years, the Yellow Thearch will descend to your bedchamber, welcoming you with a yellow cloud flying wheel to ascend to the Highest Clarity Palace.

*—Excerpted from *The Wondrous Writ of Vermilion Petitions and Cinnabar Talismans of Cavernous Perfection*

Here ends Scroll Ninety-Two of *The Supreme Secret Essentials*
Scroll Ninety-Three of *The Supreme Secret Essentials*: *Ascending to the Highest Clarity, Lesser Grade*

In the third summer month, the Nine Primordials of the Supreme Void Sovereign transform into nine suns, layered and conjoined, their radiance streaming and shining to illuminate the Highest Clarity. Meditate upon them to return to your true form.

To cultivate the Dao of the Supreme Void Sovereign, always on the winter solstice, enter your chamber, face north, and prostrate to the Void Sovereign. Upon completion, strike your teeth thrice, and visualize the Void Sovereign following the four seasons’ forms and appearances within the Northern Primordial Mansion of the Seven Treasures Palace in the Jade Clarity, turning true illumination downward to enter the twin dark gates of your numinous chamber. Then recite the incantation:

"Mysterious quiescence pervades the subtle,
Essence scatters from the Void Sovereign.
Three Primordials merge as one,
Flying immortals stream with light.
Divine youths bathe and irrigate,
Jade maidens disperse fragrance.
Primordial Father exchanges blessings,
Fortune and longevity befall me.
Eight luminaries lend their wings,
Five Elders descend to my chamber.
I behold the supreme numina,
Meet the countenance of the Immortal King.
Eternally partaking of boundless grace,
I soar aloft to the Great Void.
Light feathers carry me in flight,
Ascending to enter the Highest Palace."

Upon completion, tilt your head back and swallow ten breaths of qi to conclude.

This is the Mysterious Quiescence Supreme Dao, concealed within the Purple Chamber of the Six Harmonies of the Most High. According to the statutes, it is revealed once in ten thousand kalpas, secretly transmitted to those destined to become Highest Clarity immortals. Those who attain it become divine immortals, practicing the Highest Clarity Dao.

The esoteric name and character of the qi of the Nine Primordials of the Supreme Void Sovereign, the Primordial Flying Sovereign, measures fifty million zhang in length. In the third winter month, he wears a flying celestial purple crown, robes of five-colored patterned cloth and tiger fur, bears flowing golden bells, and girds intertwined spirit white sashes. He stands upon a dark turtle amidst dark clouds, his radiance resplendent, brightly illuminating the Highest Clarity. Meditate upon him to return to a length of five cun and five fen.

In the third spring month, the Nine Primordials of the Supreme Void Sovereign transform into an old man, wearing a yellow kerchief and a robe of dark feathers, holding a halberd, standing upon purple clouds. Meditate upon him to return to your true form.

In the third autumn month, the Nine Primordials of the Supreme Void Sovereign transform into a radiance of yellow and black, their brilliance gleaming to illuminate the north. This is the returning of the mysterious quiescent qi, further refining the essence of the Primordial Flying Sovereign. Meditate upon him to return to your true form.

*—Excerpted from *The Cavernous Perfection Scripture of the Primordial Beginning’s Transformations**

On the vernal equinox, when the moon lodges above the Metal Gate, there lies the Gate of Spiritual Communion. At that time, the moon refines within the pool of metal essence, tempered by the Stone Radiance Water Mother, burnished within the splendor of floral light. On this day, the yang essence is bathed in the Metal Gate, and the yellow qi is received in the Jade Spring. The Supreme Perfected and all celestial beings gather the blossoms of the *qian* tree on this day to brush the light of the sun and moon. The moon bathes the countenances of celestial beings with yellow qi, thus on the vernal equinox, the myriad qi harmonize in warmth, divine radiance conjoins in harmony—this is the time when yellow qi and yang essence descend to meet.

To seek the Dao of immortality, on the vernal equinox at dusk, enter your chamber, face west, recline upon your seat at ease, close your eyes, and inwardly visualize the Green Radiance Lady of the Moon, whose esoteric name and character measure nine cun in length. She wears her hair in a cascading cloud coiffure, dons a flying cloud skirt of green brocade, and holds the moon’s light in her mouth, descending to enter above your two eyes. In an instant, the moonlight scatters into yellow qi, flowing to suffuse your entire form. The lady stands at the moon’s center, gathering blossoms from the *qian* grove and scattering them amidst the yellow qi. She exhales the red qi of yang essence to pour into your form, raining from within to without. The yellow and red qi intertwine, illuminating your entire body. The lady transmits to you six cinnabar characters in purple script, then leads you to swallow twenty-four breaths of yellow qi and sixteen breaths of yang essence to conclude. Strike your teeth twenty-four times and recite the incantation while looking upward:

"Eightfold refining in the metal crucible,
Cinnabar pool vast and deep.
Jade nectar surges in torrents,
Flowing to bathe the eight *qian*."

The yellow qi swells and ascends, the yang essence congeals into mist. Plucking blossoms in the orchid court, her flying skirts flutter in profusion. The lady rinses with fragrance, the august sovereign pours forth the fluid. The gentle radiance melts in season, the intercalary rains fall upon the heavens. The cinnabar brilliance shines in eightfold clarity, its luminous purity pervading all. Reflected and refracted, it descends upon my form. United with the moon’s essence, I shall long preserve my numinous years. Riding the void and steering the floating, I reach the realm beyond intervals.

Cease after swallowing the qi twenty-four times and the saliva sixteen times, then ingest the six cinnabar characters in purple script. Practicing this Way for eight years, the lady will confer upon you the true sounds of the cinnabar characters and the flying blossoms of the moon to brush your form. Your countenance will assume a golden aspect, and you will soar through the Upper Clarity.

The cinnabar characters in purple script and the hidden sounds of the moon’s essence are inscribed upon the trees of the *qian* grove in the moon’s eastern realm—upon their leaves form the writings of spontaneity. Those who ingest these characters shall attain a lifespan of ten thousand years. Though the Way of the Sun and Moon encompasses dozens of methods, this sound remains secret and is not transmitted. Those who recklessly divulge it will suffer the judgment of the wind-knife in this life, their seven ancestors condemned to the ghostly torments of the boundless, enduring the Three Paths and Five Sufferings for ten thousand kalpas without release.

On the autumn equinox at dawn, face east, inscribe the characters in cinnabar upon purple paper, and ingest them. Strike your teeth twelve times and softly recite the incantation:

"Mysterious radiance, luminous and bright,
Purple qi in resplendent light.
Whirling winds ride the sun,
Four and six in harmony run.
Without, they brush the vermilion blossoms,
Within, they weave the eightfold rays.
The purple Way flows in splendor,
My body brims with ease and fullness.
I ascend the chariot of light,
To reach the imperial hall on high."

Conclude after swallowing the qi twenty-four times. Further, inscribe the cinnabar characters upon a piece of raw purple silk and wear it upon your head. After three years, a purple light three feet in height will emanate from your crown, and you will be attended by six jade maidens who will impart to you the numinous sounds. Those who recklessly divulge this will die and be consigned to the offices of the dead.

Only those whose names are inscribed in gold and whose characters are etched in jade may transmit this to one person in a hundred years. Guard it in secrecy, and you shall become a transcendent, soaring through the Upper Clarity.

For all scholars of the Dao who practice the Way of the Sun and Moon: on the day of the summer solstice at noon, take eight *fen* of true pearls and inscribe the Eightfold Refining Cinnabar Womb Jade Talisman upon yellow paper. Cast it into pure water, face south, bathe, and strike your teeth twenty-four times, softly reciting the incantation as on the day of the spring equinox. Conclude after swallowing the qi eight times. Return to your chamber, burn incense, and blend the elixir with purple powder and various powders to anoint your body. Rub your hands until warm, then wipe your face and entire form. Lie down with your head to the south, strike your teeth nine times, close your eyes, and clench your fists. Visualize the purple qi of the sunlight layering down to suffuse your body. Envision yourself within the sun’s radiance, the sun’s radiance encircling your form, ascending to the Cavern Yang Palace amidst the Azure Forest of the Void and the Courtyard of Flowing Fire. Visualize the Perfected One of the Southern Culmen and Cavern Yang, whose taboo name is Fusion Pearl, standing eight inches tall, clad in a single robe of crimson splendor, wearing the Sun Essence and Pervading Yang Crown upon his head. From his mouth issues forth crimson qi, billowing like flames, to burn your body. In an instant, he plucks the blossoms of the Azure Forest to offer you. After consuming the blossoms, their flavor sweet, you feel warmth suffusing your body. Conclude after swallowing the qi eighty times and softly recite the incantation:

"The sun’s radiance gleams in the net,
Woven with the dark and vast.
Flowing fire surges in abundance,
Ten thousand streams raise their waves.
The Azure Forest swells in verdant profusion,
The golden wings dance in circling motion."

Eightfold refinement of the Vermilion Mother, fragrant zhi serene and harmonious.
Four golden portals unfold, the imperial household’s domain,
where numinous radiance exhales essence, and one gazes upward to sip the flying blossoms.
To the left, dark luxuriance ascends; to the right, the demonic commands are wielded.
The body ascends the high terrace, roaming and gazing upon the verdant expanse.
Eightfold luminaries wing through the clouds, amidst purple jasper and cinnabar mist.
Qi aligns with the Jade Perfected; life matches the numinous branch.
Ever feasting in the Nine Mysteries, the path knows no peril or steepness.

Upon completion, ingest the Eightfold Refined Elixir Embryo Jade Talisman, swallow qi eighty times, and swallow saliva thirty-six times to conclude.

To practice this Way: at dusk, lie down, and from the day of the Beginning of Summer to the Beginning of Autumn, rub the heart with both hands, eighty times on each side. Visualize the sun within the heart and the moon beneath it, their twin lights suffusing the body. Knock the teeth twelve times and recite the incantation:

"At dawn I wander the Azure Forest,
at dusk I lodge upon the high terrace.
Flowing fire spans ten thousand fathoms,
receiving the Jade Embryo’s refinement.
The hun soul is at peace, the po soul rejoices,
the myriad spirits radiant and joyous.
The sun’s extremity endures with the moon,
the Three Luminaries unite in harmony."

Upon completion, lie down. Practicing this for eight years, the body shall enter fire yet remain unburnt, the face shall bear a vermilion glow, and one shall converse face-to-face with Fusion Pearl, summoning cinnabar mist to ascend and soar into the Highest Clarity.

The above is from *The Scripture of the Yellow Qi and Yang Essence: The Kingly Way of Sequential Practice*.

Above, the twenty-four qi coalesce to form the names of twenty-four palaces, domains, and abodes, establishing the twenty-four August Worthies upon the summit of Jade Clarity, the peak of the Boundless, within the Cavernous Void, and amid the Great Emptiness. The Imperial Lords emerge from the void, their numinous harmony giving rise to the palaces and domains, all coalescing from jade qi to form their titles, aiding the Supreme Prime and Highest Perfected, their luminosity illuminating the Cavernous Brilliance and reflecting upon the Highest Clarity.

On the days of the Beginning of Spring and the Autumn Equinox, the twenty-four August Worthies ingest the qi of incipient generation, refining the true and transforming the spirit, descending into the bodies of the adept and the perfected.

On these days, one must purify and bathe, burn incense, and enter the chamber. First, visualize green qi issuing from the right eye and white qi from the left, the two qi blending and billowing to fill the chamber. Envision the body within these two qi, perceiving the forms of the divine perfected with clarity, scrutinizing their light and color. Then proceed to ingest the qi and recite the incantation.

Focus the mind with unwavering intent, allowing no stray thoughts. Thus, concentration invokes resonance, and precision invokes subtlety, enabling one to turn the purple chariot to fan the void and mount the whirlwind wheels to ascend.

Without the Golden Name and Jade Characters of the Supreme Ultimate, one may not know or perceive its chapters and verses. All are mysteries awaiting their destined convergence, fulfilling ascent to the Highest Immortality. Secrecy invites numinous descent; disclosure invites calamity.

The Supreme Prime disperses the twenty-four qi, transforming them into the Three Divisions, Eight Luminaries, and Twenty-Four Primordial Cavern Spirits, governing the adept’s body below.

Within the Central Palace of the Supreme Prime, the primordial qi likewise transforms and emerges from the void, each accompanied by a thousand chariots and ten thousand riders to guard and protect the bodily form.

If one preserves the celestial perfected within the silent chamber, meditating upon the divine countenance within the numinous abode, then the Three Eights’ divine hosts shall peacefully guard the palaces and domains. Within a year, the spirits shall manifest, and jade boys and jade maidens shall be at one’s command. Within eight years, the thousand chariots and ten thousand riders shall surely convey the adept’s body upon the Eight Luminaries’ Jade Chariot, flying to ascend the Palace of Highest Clarity.

The Grand Simplicity Three Prime Ladies are the daughters of the One Perfected, and thus the mothers of the Three Simplicity Prime Ladies.

The Grand Simplicity Prime Lady coalesced an empty embryo from the void, emerging from blossoms to be born in the Highest Highest Clarity, the Jeweled Simplicity Nine Mysteries Jade Sovereign Heaven. Her taboo name is Zheng Huiliao, her style Yun Tingying. Upon her head she wears the Jeweled Lang Jade Dawn Feather Crown, draped in a purple qi floating cloud brocade mantle, clad in a nine-colored dragon brocade feathered skirt. At her waist hangs a flowing gold fire bell tiger tally dragon script. She sits amid the Great Emptiness, beneath her knees ever the cinnabar, green, and azure clouds of the Three Simplicities, their qi crowning and veiling the Prime Lady’s body.

To practice the Way of Flying Immortality and wear the script of the Three Primes’ Jade Seal, at midnight within a secluded chamber, face north, close the eyes, knock the teeth three times, and visualize the Grand Simplicity Three Prime Ladies’ attire, taboo names, and styles. Envision them riding the cinnabar, green, and azure Three Simplicities’ whirlwind wheels, descending from the Jade Sovereign Heaven into the chamber. Then bow in reverence to the Prime Ladies and softly recite the incantation:

"Three qi’s primordial essence,
nine heavens’ supreme numina.
Dawn’s radiance gleams bright,
jade blossoms illumine the cavernous.
Three simplicities’ flying whirlwinds,
cinnabar chariots and green chariots.
Eight winds raise the wheels,
flowing reflections in the cloudy court.
Summon the true, attain immortality,
descend into my form.
Supreme wishes prosper,
all endeavors fulfill.
Golden countenance, blossoming visage,
inner palace resplendent.
Eight luminaries support the chariot,
bones fly, flesh light.
Ascend the cinnabar terrace,
pay homage in the Jade Clarity."

Upon completion, swallow qi twenty-four times and cease. Open the eyes and chant the *Lonesome and Desolate Song of the Jade Clarity’s Highest Palace*, harmonizing the body and soul’s qi, rejoicing in the Grand Simplicity’s lofty perfected. The chant:

"The Supreme Prime connects to Jade Clarity,
the Three Luminaries illumine the high and bright.
Eight luminaries turn the morning wind,
dispersing clouds to veil the flying numina.
Round wheels cast into the empty cavern,
golden reflections crown the celestial essence.
Jade blossoms bind the Five Elders,
purple mist propels the cloudy wheels.
Riding qi to sway the mysterious chamber,
yielding and following to transcend the path.
Golden visage gleams with ninefold mist,
jade form leaps in the cold court.
Secluded youths turn in startled gaze,
aged elders return to youthful infancy.
The Imperial One solidifies the mud pill,
the Nine Perfected guard the Yellow Tranquility.
Gazing beyond ten thousand kalpas,
all align with the nine heavens’ overturning."

Upon completion, bow in reverence, swallow saliva three times, and conclude.

The Supreme Perfected Primordial Father coalesced the nine heavens’ jade essence qi, transforming to give birth to the Palace of the Way’s Oneness and the Inner Spirits of the Non-Action Way’s Culmination. The Mysterious Perfected Primordial Mother coalesced the nine yin jade numinous qi, transforming to give birth to the Palace of the Inner Spirits’ Mysterious Culmination and the True Prime’s Central Numinosity.

The two qi govern above in the Nine Heavens’ Culmination Cavern Palace and below in the human body’s Golden Gate, the chambers of yin and yang.

The Primordial Father and Mysterious Mother regularly receive the intermingling void-reflected qi on the days of *Lichun* (Beginning of Spring) and *Chunfen* (Spring Equinox), dispersing essence to irrigate the numinous, uniting with the Heavenly Origin, refining the Jade Transcendents within, and transforming the bodily perfected below. On these days, all within the heavens is renewed. The foundation of study lies in bathing and purifying oneself on these days, entering the chamber to burn incense, visualizing the forms, taboo names, attire, palaces, and abodes of the Two Perfected, and ingesting the talismans of the yin and yang Perfected. Thus, one secures the spirit palace within the hidden precincts, stabilizes the register within the Primordial Chart, the yang departs from the northern desolate realms, the yin converges in the Golden Cloud Provinces, the two qi intermingle for refinement, and yin and yang unite to support one another. Then the Primordial Beginning inscribes the mandate at the Southern Culmen, the Three Perfected record the writ at Eastern Florescence, the curling incense smoke meanders, and one roams the cliffs of Purple Tenuity. Death’s knot is severed at the Primordial Womb, and the Supreme Perfected are aided in the Hidden Capital. The Eight Effulgences spur the reins, the Three Origins swiftly traverse the void, soaring into the Highest Clarity, transforming into the Great Vacuity—thus the seventy-four directions merge with the bodily abode.

The seventy-four directions of Highest Clarity’s transformations, the Supreme Perfected, are originally named the High Origin’s Supreme Perfected, Luminous Primordial Mysterious Numinous Qi. They coalesce in the Jade Clarity’s Upper Palace of Vermilion Radiance, the Three Simplicities’ Land of Primordial Rectitude, styled the Upper Three Heavens’ Jade Youths with their taboo names. Their heads bear the Three Florets’ Jeweled Effulgence Cavern-Heaven Jade Crowns, they wear azure-yellow sevenfold-transforming brocade robes, gird themselves with the Vermilion Essence’s Celestial Prohibitions, and bear the Seven Luminaries’ Flowing Gold Fire Bells. They govern the Jade Essence Upper Palace, dispersing below the Primordial Nine Ways’ qi, transforming to give birth to the Cavern Transcendents’ Middle Origin Five Yang Cavern Radiance Cavern Culmen Void Upper High Sovereign’s Palace, and below govern the Yellow Longevity Palace within the perfected person’s body.

The Three Heavens’ Jade Youths regularly ingest the Primordial Mysterious Void’s qi on the days of *Lichun* (Beginning of Spring) and *Qiufen* (Autumn Equinox) to refine the perfected and transform the spirit, dispersing the Primordial Nine Ways’ qi to irrigate the bodies of those studying the perfected. To cultivate the Way of Flying Transcendents, one should enter the chamber at dawn, dusk, and midnight on these days, face east, ingest the Supreme Perfected High Origin’s numinous talisman, knock the teeth thrice, close the eyes, and visualize the Three Heavens’ Jade Youths’ taboo names and attire. Riding the Mysterious Void’s qi, they descend into one’s body, merging with the Nine Ways’ qi in a single palace. Then draw in the qi thrice and swallow, silently reciting the incantation:

Vast and boundless, the Mysterious Void,
Golden chamber, jade abode.
Three Numinous initiate the movement,
Six Origins scatter and spread.
Flowing perfected descend,
bestowing upon me the Mysterious Talisman.
Radiance illumines the Eight Circles,
the Way’s clarity broadly supports.
Golden tablets, jade graphs,
purple script, cinnabar writ.
Inscribed in the Nine Heavens’ ranks,
numinous perfected share the same domain.
Descending, the green wheel arrives,
flying clouds, dragon chariot.
Soaring into Highest Clarity,
ascending into the Mysterious Void.
Long preserving kalpas of years,
blessings and felicity overflow.

Upon completion, raise the head and swallow the qi thrice, then cease.

The above is from the *Scripture of the Seventy-Four Directions’ Transformations of the Cavern Perfected*. Examining the Transcendents’ Perfected Writ, it is also named the *Three Origins’ Writ of the Supreme Perfected Yin-Yang Numinous Register*, the Three Heavens’ Nine Numinous Upper Subtle Hidden Text. Heaven and earth possess the great kalpa’s reckoning: after eight thousand kalpas, this writ appears once. The Three Origins’ Mysterious Terrace’s Direct Talismans number three hundred persons, and ninety-one Jade Maidens. Those who bear it—all the spirits of their bodily forms—receive the titles of spontaneous Jade Transcendents. Without this writ, body and spirit do not transform, the defiled soul wanders aimlessly. Wandering without fixity, the spirit intermingles with the demonic, and the time of ashes and ruin arrives. If body and spirit do not transform, one cannot summon the transcendents’ officials, command the Supreme Perfected, or recite the myriad recitations of the Jade Chapters. The myriad recitations of the Jade Chapters are the hidden names of the Nine Heavens’ Supreme Perfected myriad spirits; reciting them startles the Nine Heavens into listening, and the myriad transcendents gird themselves in the east. Without the Transcendents’ Examining Writ, to lightly command the transcendents’ officials and shake the Nine Heavens, the transcendents will not descend, heaven will not receive the resonance, the soul flies and the spirit scatters, the spirit is startled and the qi flees, the palaces and dwellings collapse, the infant is disturbed and lost, heavenly demons bring calamity, and the body is reduced to ashes. Those who possess this writ transcend spontaneously without cultivation; when the Great Peace’s time arrives, they welcome the Sage Lord at the Highest Clarity Palace. Without the Mysterious Chart’s imperial writ, inscribing cinnabar script, one must not rashly transmit it. To frivolously leak the precious writ brings the seven ancestors to account, eternally seals the demonic officials, and dooms one’s own body to perish, unable to enter transcendence.

The Highest Clarity’s Jade Effulgence Cinnabar Numinous Cavern-Heaven High Origin Lord’s Three Origins’ Jade Examining Writ is conferred upon the Highest Clarity Perfected. Bearing it, one roams the various heavens, examines and governs the Great Void, and commands the host of perfected. Those who bear this writ hold rank equal to the Numinous Transcendents; the various heavens respect and protect them, and the Five Thearchs officiate their welcome. After nine years, they attain the Three Origins’ Lord and proceed to the Highest Clarity Palace. To receive this writ, one fasts for nine days. With a green brush, inscribe it upon nine feet of yellow silk, offer it at the sacred peak of one’s life destiny, and then bear it upon the body. If after nine years one has not ascended, offer it again, casting the writ into the azure smoke’s empyrean, and one will attain the Highest Clarity’s Jade Effulgence Palace, where a five-colored cloud chariot is provided to welcome the recipient’s body.

In the first year of the *Qingxu* era, the year *gengyin*, on the ninth day of the ninth month, the Supreme First Direct Dawn Primordial Heavenly Thearch fasted in the Highest Clarity Palace and swore a covenant with the Utmost, Unsurpassed, Colorless, Shadowless, Formless, Nameless, Ancestorless, Clanless, Limitless Cavern Clarity Nine Mysterious Spontaneous Unreckonable Kalpas Dao, conferring the Three Origins’ Jade Examining Writ to examine the Three Heavens’ Jade Youths and transmit it to later students whose mysterious names qualify them as Highest Clarity Perfected, inscribing their names upon the Cinnabar Terrace’s Golden Repository Jade Writs Purple Script Jade Tablets. They welcome the Sage Lord, soaring into the Highest Clarity Palace.

The Grand Simplicity Three Origins’ Lord resides in the Highest Clarity’s Highest Palace, the Vast Numinous Hall, where morning lamps illumine the Jade Perfected, radiant light shines in the Cinnabar Chamber, the Three Florets emit effulgence spontaneously, and the spirit’s brilliance illumines the Nine Mysterious. Felicitous clouds shade the Jade Terrace, flying smoke thickens at the Purple Pavilion, the Mysterious Chart is displayed in the Upper Hall, the Five Talismans are ordered in the Womb Honored, the Three Origins are arrayed in the Grand Simplicity, and the Register of Life is governed at the Jade Gate. The lofty pavilion stands desolate, uniquely delighting in the wondrous abyss. Emerging to roam the empyrean observatory, the sun and moon incline their radiance, torches are arrayed to uproot the origin, the eight winds reverse their waves, the whirlwind surges through the hidden source, jade effulgence illumines brightly, the high empyrean dances at dawn, crimson auroras thickly spread, yellow clouds coil sevenfold, the Five Elders open the path, the Supreme Thearch supports the wheel, the Western August wields the tally, the Eastern Florescence raises the banner, and the Nine Heavens tremble.

Amidst the vastness of non-action, mist arises—subtle qi shrouds in obscurity, the Eight Effulgences brush away dust. Gazing upward, one beholds the Net of the Supreme; looking about, one encompasses the Hundred Circles. This may indeed be called the loftiest of the Perfected Real, the unfathomable subtlety of wondrous transformation.

*(From the* Dongzhen Yujian Jing *[The Scripture of Jade Tallies of the Cavern Real])*

This is the method of Flowing Rosy Clouds Opening the Inner Vision of the Jade Talisman: facing east, write in vermilion on white paper, then strike the teeth twelve times and recite the incantation:

Nine Paths of the Grand Yang,
Eight Perfected unite in radiance.
Three and Five revolve in transformation,
Merging with the cinnabar spirit.
Stone Effulgence, Jade Womb,
Essence of vermilion cinnabar.
Gather and receive the soaring mystery,
Descend to enter my form.
Ever with the Three Dawns,
Together in death, together in life.

Conclude by casting the talisman into the Water Mother of Stone Effulgence.

*(From the* Shangqing Yuxia Ziying Neiguan Shangfa *[The Supreme Clarity Method of the Purple Radiance of Jade Rosy Clouds in Inner Vision], also titled* Jinjing Shijing Shuimu Yubao Jing *[The Scripture of the Jade Womb of the Water Mother of Stone Effulgence and Golden Essence], or* Caifu Rigen Zhaoxia zhi Dao *[The Way of Gathering and Ingesting the Root of the Sun to Summon Rosy Clouds])*

Regularly, on the first day of the waxing moon, gather three *sheng* of the yellow essence of the Eastern Well—*jinghua* (well-florescence, i.e., water)—and place it in a golden vessel, which is also excellent. Set it in the central courtyard. On the night of the sixteenth day of the lunar month at midnight, when the mysterious radiance of the moon’s essence shines upon the yellow essence, the adept faces east and inscribes the Talisman of Yellow Qi and Yang Essence of Cavernous Clarity, then casts it into the vessel of yellow essence. Turning to face west, strike the teeth twenty-four times and intone the invocation to the lunar spirit, twenty-four words in all. Conclude by closing the eyes and visualizing the five-colored flowing essence and purple radiance of the moon descending to bathe the adept’s body, suffusing the entire form.

Visualize within the moon a perfected person, nine *cun* in height, wearing a purple crown and clad in a flying robe of yellow brocade, descending to stand above the adept’s head. This being draws the yellow essence of the moon into the adept’s form, then leans over the vessel of yellow essence, reflecting the moonlight while softly reciting the incantation:

Spirit unfurls its radiant bloom,
Three and Five pervade in clarity.
Purple and yellow intermingle in descent,
Dual qi merge as one.
Celestial origins part and unite,
Cycles turn in waxing and waning.
Imperial mushrooms overflow,
Yellow womb congeals its essence.
Perfected within the effulgence,
Wash and bathe my form.
Lady of the Moon,
Secure my yellow tranquility.
Golden bells and jade pendants,
Render me utterly luminous.
With the moon I wane,
With the moon I wax.
Ever ingesting yellow essence,
Ascend to the imperial court.
Roam the Great Void,
Govern the flying wheel.
Supreme offering without end,
Lifespan of myriad kalpas.

Conclude by facing the moon and swallowing twenty-four times. Then, using the yellow essence, wash the eyes toward the moon and bathe the entire body. Finally, release any remaining essence into an eastward-flowing river.

After practicing this for nine years, the eyes perceive the vast emptiness, clearly seeing ten thousand miles. One reverses inquiry into fortune and misfortune, refines the countenance to transform the body, the face radiates jade essence, and the body emits purple light. Riding the void and mounting emptiness, one soars into the Upper Clarity. The Three Passes unlock their mechanisms, the Nine Portals receive the numinous. The face shines with golden countenance, the Five Viscera flourish in splendor. The Golden Perfected unfolds in harmony, the Falling Vastness becomes utterly luminous. The divine candle illumines in hidden radiance, treasure light arises at night. Flowing gold intermingles in casting, the resplendent fire bells blaze. With a whistle, commands are instantly fulfilled; one drives and directs the divine soldiers. The Three Primes arrive at the chamber, descending to summon the Green Wheel. Riding the void and mounting emptiness, one ascends into the Upper Clarity.

—Excerpted from *The Supreme Lord of Radiance’s Purple Reflection Inner Contemplation Upper Method*

Here ends Scroll Ninety-Three of *The Supreme Secret Essentials*
Scroll Ninety-Four of *The Supreme Secret Essentials*: Ascending the Great Void

The Upper Clarity Golden Palace Numinous Writ and Purple Text teaches the ingestion of solar effulgences and flying roots to disperse and unbind the knots of death, preserve and congeal the Mud Pill, blend the generative forces of yin and yang, secure the hun and nourish the shen. The body attains the Jade Emperor’s essence, and the qi merges with the Three Luminaries.

This method of swallowing qi was formerly received from the Celestial Emperor of the Grand Tenuity. It is also called *The Scripture of Cinnabar Elixir, Golden Essence, Stone Radiance, Water Mother, and Jade Embryo*.

One should regularly await the moment of sunrise, face east toward the sun, and click the teeth nine times. Upon completion, silently invoke the names of the solar soul and the five emperors within the sun:

Solar soul, Pearl Radiance,
Illuminating and enveloping the green glow,
Crimson Lad of Returning Radiance,
Mysterious Flame and Whirlwind Image.

After silently invoking these sixteen characters, close the eyes and clench the fists. Visualize the five-colored streaming radiance within the sun all coming to embrace the body, descending to the two feet. Then visualize the five qi ascending to the crown of the head. Thereupon, the sunlight and streaming radiance of five colors all enter the mouth. Within the sunlight and radiance, there is also a purple qi, large as the pupil of the eye, layered in tens, gleaming and resplendent amid the five lights. These are called the Flying Roots of Solar Effulgence and the Water Mother of the Jade Embryo. Together with the five qi, they enter the mouth. Facing the sun, swallow the radiance forty-five times. After swallowing the qi, swallow saliva nine times. Then click the teeth nine times and softly invoke:

Cinnabar furnace, elixir qi,
Spherical heaven nurtures essence.
Firmness receives softness,
Flame and water’s yin flower.
Solar origin, morning radiance,
Named the Great Illumination.
Nine yangs transform in unison,
Dual mists arise together.
Congealing the hun and harmonizing the marvel,
The essence of the five qi.
Within, the Five Emperors are born,
Shedding light to govern the form.
Gathering the flying in emptiness,
Plucking the root to attain fullness.
The head is crowned with dragon blossoms,
Adorned with crimson and girded with azure.
The bridle bird flows in mystery,
Radiance reflects the Upper Clarity.
Bestowed the jade tablet script,
Name engraved in the golden palace.
Ingesting the morning effulgence,
Uniting with the Perfected in numinosity,
Flying immortal of the Grand Tenuity,
Ascending to the Purple Court.

After the invocation, bow twice toward the sun. Among a million true immortals, not one knows the name of the solar soul. This Dao is profoundly wondrous; it cannot be heard by those who consume putrid food and foul corpses. On overcast days without sun, one may perform this in a secluded chamber at a clean place outside. Refined Daoist practitioners who are adept at upper resonance may cultivate this without awaiting the sun. If a disciple abstains from grains in the mountains and forests, maintains perpetual purification on the Five Peaks, severs worldly ties, and dwells afar in contemplation of purity, they may daily ingest the solar root’s radiance and swallow the essence of the Great Yang. Then the body will generate jade luster, and the face will bear flowing light. If one is entangled in worldly affairs, has not attained bodily stillness, drifts along worldly paths, and the heart is bound in entangling nets, one should perform this on the first, third, fifth, seventh, ninth, thirteenth, fifteenth, seventeenth, nineteenth, and twenty-fifth days of the lunar month, totaling ten times in a month, following the method above. On these days, the solar soul descends to connect with the flying roots, filling the Water Mother and Jade Embryo. After practicing for eighteen years, the Three Primes of the Jade Clarity and Grand Simplicity will refine one with golden perfection, illumine one with jade light, and confer the rank of Jade Emperor, enabling flight through the Great Void.

—Excerpted from *The Cavern-Real Numinous Writ of Purple Text*

*The Purple Writ Formula* states: Those who cultivate the Dao of the Supreme Perfected should practice the Upper Clarity Jade Radiance Purple Reflection Inner Contemplation Upper Method. Regularly on the first day of one’s birth decade, bathe, purify, and fast. Wear clean ritual garments, enter the chamber at dawn, and use the Inner Contemplation Luminous Jade Talisman’s pure effulgent water to wash the eyes facing east, and rinse the mouth and intestines, ensuring inner and outer clarity and emptiness. The mouth should have no lingering flavors, the abdomen no residual warmth, the eyes no extraneous sights, the body no remaining dust. Serene, pure, and silent, the self is solely the Dao. Then turn to face south, sit upright, close the eyes, and inwardly visualize purple qi emerging from the top of the head, vigorously filling the heavens. The qi bathes one’s form, both inside and out, in dense obscurity. Then draw in the purple qi and swallow it thirty-nine times, the qi following each swallow into the mouth and abdomen. After swallowing, open the eyes to a state of clear brightness, click the teeth three times, and look up to invoke:

Upper Clarity streaming radiance,
Dawn announces the true effulgence.
Purple clouds reflect the numinous,
Radiant essence intermingles and blazes.
Inwardly infusing the golden gate,
The jade portal receives the irrigation.
Treasure spirits conceal their radiance,
Hun and po do not scatter.
Illustrious Sovereign of the Nine Perfected,
Eight Dao’s flowing brilliance.
Grasping clouds to summon emptiness,
Numinous descent from the River of Stars.
Penetrating the dark origin,
The Three Dawns feast in unison.
Roaming and ascending the jade chamber,
Bowing above in the imperial palace.

Afterward, look up and swallow three times. This Inner Contemplation Luminous Jade Talisman should be written in vermilion on white paper and cast into water. Facing east, click the teeth three times and invoke:

Heaven has no flying obscurities,
Earth has no drifting dust.
The jade talisman scours filth,
Washing away the inauthentic.
The cavernous luminous emptiness
Summons and attracts the numinous immortals.

After the invocation, use the water to wash the eyes, rinse the mouth, and cleanse inside and out. Discard the remaining talisman water into an eastward-flowing stream.

This method originates from the middle chapter of the *Highest Clarity Jade Radiance Purple Reflection Inner Contemplation Scripture*. After eight years of practice, purple clouds will shroud the adept’s body, the eyes will gain penetrating clarity to perceive the Nine Heavens, the body will emit wondrous light, and one’s luminous form will transform myriad times, soaring through the Great Void.

—From the *Cavern Realms Azure Essentials Purple Writings of the Upper Scripture*

In the twelfth month, one receives the qi of the Brahma Treasure Heaven. On the third day of the month at dawn, the thirteenth at noon, and the twenty-third at midnight—three days and three times each month—bathe in fragrant water, burn incense, and enter the chamber. Bow nine times to the Primordial Father in the northwest, then three times to the Mysterious Mother in the southeast. Return to face the lunar mansion, sit upright, and click the teeth thirty-six times. With eyes closed, visualize and invoke the name of the Brahma Treasure Heavenly King. After three years of this practice, the bones will transform into jade, the spirit will rejoice, and qi will overflow. One will retroactively know future events before they occur. After nine years, the form will change, and one will soar through the Great Void.

—From the *Cavern Realms Nine Elixirs Upper Transformation Embryonic Essence Record*

The Eight Simplicities Flying Essence Twofold Luminous Jade Scripts arise within the Cavernous Void, manifesting atop Tortoise Mountain’s summit, above the Dark Garden, and in the shade of the Accumulated Stones. They govern the myriad qi and command all heavens. The sun and moon conceal their scripts, hidden above the Nine Heavens, transmitted once in ten thousand kalpas. Those who obtain these numinous scripts will share the same lifespan as the sun and moon, transforming freely to exit existence and enter non-existence. A purple light will crown their heads, their faces will radiate golden countenance, the ten thousand spirits will bow in reverence, and the Ten Heavens will unite in welcome. After nine years of practice, one will ascend and soar through the Great Void.

—From the *Cavern Realms Eight Simplicities True Scripture*

Refine the Nine Origins True Talismans from golden essence and stone marrow. To escape the peril of the Blade Mountains, on one’s life-day, write them in white on blue paper and ingest them. —From the *Cavern Realms Four Poles Luminous Regulations*

**Ascending the Purple Tenuity Palace Section**

The Yellow Water Moonflower Elixir: Gather and consume its blossoms, drink one sheng of yellow water, and one’s form will divide into ten thousand transformations. The eyes’ light will become bright moons, floating through the Great Void, soaring into the Purple Tenuity’s Upper Palace.

—From the *Cavern Realms Numinous Writings Purple Texts of the Upper Scripture*

Yin and yang harmonize their transformations,
The two qi flow unimpeded.
The Primordial Father guards authenticity,
The Mysterious Mother protects the palace.
The two spirits intermingle and change,
The Dao shines with radiant fullness.
The Eight Primes sprinkle the mysterious,
My Dao expands boundlessly.
The Three Departments merge their luminosities,
Transformations know no limit.
The numinous talisman halts aging,
Jade qi restores youth.
Lifespan equals kalpa’s span,
Enduring as the eternal heavens.

After reciting, swallow eight qi. After eight years of practice, the Eight Luminous Spirit Officials will serve as the adept’s charioteers, ascending to the Purple Tenuity Palace.

The **Middle True Upper Origin Yang-Born Bing-Zi Transformation Talisman**: This Upper Origin Jade Gate Yang Spirit’s essence generates jade scripts to assist the Middle True High Clarity, transforming the qi of the eight directions, communicating with spirits, summoning the true, and preserving life for eternity. After eight years of ingestion, eight Jade Lads from the Purple Tenuity Upper Palace will attend the adept, summoning the Eight Luminous Cloud Chariots to welcome the adept’s ascent to the Purple Tenuity Palace.

—From the *Cavern Realms Seventy-Four Methods of Transformation Scripture*

The **Purple Tenuity Numinous Capital True Talisman’s Ancient Text** originates from the *Highest Supreme Transformation Cavernous Void Third Jade Luminance Chapter*, concealed within the Purple Tenuity Palace. For all who practice the Dao to seek immortality, contemplate spirits, preserve authenticity, repent sins, resolve transgressions, and aspire to the grace of the Five Emperors and host of immortals, on the Summer Solstice, write the text in vermilion, face south, and ingest three talismans. All sins will be eradicated, the Five Emperors will protect and recommend, and one’s name will be recorded in the Cinnabar Chamber. After three years of practice without fail, the Purple Tenuity will assign eight Jade Lads.
