—From the *Cavern Realms Numinous True Eight Dao Jade Luminance Hidden Talismans*

**Ascending the Purple Court Section**

The Highest Sage Lord said: To inscribe one’s name on the Western Tortoise Mountain and ascend to the Sevenfold Radiance Chamber, on the seventh day of the seventh month at the hour of Upper Union, bathe in purity and fast. At dusk, enter the chamber, burn incense, and bow nine times to the Jade Emperor facing north. Afterward, face north, click the teeth twelve times, and visualize within the fasting chamber a white, plain cloud arising in luxuriant abundance, filling the entire room. Envision the Five Elder Immortals within the plain cloud, draped in flying azure robes, crowned with Heaven-Penetrating Jade Diadems, holding green-scripted registers. Visualize the Immortal Jade Gentlemen wearing cloud-brocade robes, crowned with Seven Treasures Jade Diadems, holding silver tablets. See the two perfected ones inscribe your name upon the silver tablet, binding the record within the green-scripted volume. Hand your inscribed tablet to the Supervising Perfected Envoy to register among the Left Immortals, then memorialize the Nine Heavens’ Emperors and Seven Sages’ mechanisms to confirm your name. The Five Elder Immortals and Immortal Jade Gentlemen will transform and enter your body’s Primordial Simplicity Palace. Softly recite:

Heaven’s blessings universally descend,
Upper Union unites the ten thousand spirits.
The Great Void records names,
Eastern Florescence engraves the volume.
Bound with green records,
Inscribed on silver tablets.
Four rhymes unite as one,
Harmonious tones perfect the true.
The Highest Sage transmits the mysterious,
To deliver my body.
The two qi descend to fill,
Revolving the Nine Heavens’ mists.
Transformed into Immortal Elders,
Jade Gentlemen and perfected unite.
Eight Luminances bear the chariot,
Ascending to the Imperial Dawn.
Pay homage to the Highest Sages,
Fortune and blessings coil ninefold.
Eternally preserve the Three Luminaries,
Heaven and earth share the same lifespan.

After reciting, bow seven times to the Seven Sages and swallow seven qi.

To practice this Dao, the Mother of Tortoises records one’s name, the Eastern Florescence inscribes it, and the Three Origins descend to ascend one to the Purple Court.
*(From the* Scripture of the Primordial Record of the Seven Sages of the Cavernous Truth.*)*

The Cloud-Opening Talisman of the Jade Luminance of Yin and Yang is written in cinnabar on green paper and ingested, or written in cinnabar on green silk and worn.
These are the essences of the Two Luminaries of the sun and moon. To know the essence of the Two Luminaries is to conceal one’s luminance and hide one’s form.
Practicing this for eighteen years, one ascends to the Purple Court.
*(From the* Scripture of the Seven Transformations and Seven Changes of the Divine Continent’s Dance of Heaven.*)*

**Ascending to the Purple Void Rank**

The Supreme Perfected transmits the secret Dao of summoning the Five Celestial Bodies in the Cavern Chamber to the South Pole Primordial Lord.
At midnight, in stillness, one may sit or lie as one wishes. Compose the body, quiet the mind, relax the qi, and harmonize the spirit.
With eyes closed, inwardly visualize the Great White Star of the West above the two eyes on the face, called the Jade Earrings of the Purple Gate.
Next, visualize the Star of the Northern Dipper in the Celestial Center, the Imperial Realm, the Mysterious Palace, ascending from above the nose to five fen within the hairline, one cun deep.
Next, visualize the Wood Star of the East at the Crimson Terrace of the Cavern Pass, one cun behind the eyes, one cun deep.
Next, visualize the Fire Star of the South at the inner canthus of the Jade Eyes, five fen deep.
Next, visualize the Earth Star of the Center in the Golden Treasury of the Yellow Chamber, the Long Valley. The Golden Treasury of the Yellow Chamber lies two fen deep at the center of the philtrum, with the star suspended above like an ornament.
Once all visualizations are complete, perceive the stars occupying their positions, awakening so that the Five Stars emit their radiance, casting five-colored mists that penetrate one’s entire body, illuminating both within and without.
If the body feels warm and suffused, it is the entry of the stellar essences.
Then, knock the teeth five times, and swallow saliva twenty-five times.
Softly recite:

The Lofty Purple Gate,
Within dwell the Five Spirits.
Precious luminaries unfold their splendor,
Radiance surging through the gates.
Essence transforms and accumulates,
Changing into an Elder.
Head wrapped in white, countenance serene,
Green mantle, crimson skirt.
On the right, flowing bells,
On the left, the Tiger Perfected.
Holding the Celestial Steel,
Scattering crimson flying stars.
Feet treading the Floral Canopy,
Spitting radiance to refine the body.
The Three Luminaries guard and preserve,
Enabling me to attain perfection.
Nurturing the po, restraining the hun,
Riding the whirlwind to fly as an immortal.

After completion, those who practice this for fifteen years will be met thus:
The Crimson Mound Supreme Perfected of the South Pole Elder welcomes with a chariot of green clouds;
The White Spirit Master of the West Pole welcomes with a carriage of yellow whirlwinds;
The Mystic Supreme Immortal Sovereign of the North Pole welcomes with a dragon of dark luminance;
The Supporting Yang Lord of the East Pole welcomes with a palanquin of blue-green paired steeds;
The Central Origin Elder, the Supreme Mystery Master of the Center, welcomes with a canopy of winding dawn.
The Five Elders unite as one, together ascending to the Purple Void.
*(From the* Scripture of the Golden Perfection and Jade Luminance of the Supreme Hidden Writ.*)*

*End of Scroll Ninety-Four of the Supreme Secret Essentials*
*Scroll Ninety-Five of the Supreme Secret Essentials*

The *Ascending to the Purple Dawn* Chapter

For those who practice the Seven Cycles and Seven Transformations of the Divine Dance of the Celestial Realm within the Sacred Continent, twenty-one Jade Lads and twenty-one Jade Maidens are commanded to serve. They traverse the Five Marchmounts, bearing the Dark-Network Azure-Furred Standards, riding Azure-Luminance Dragons, wearing Tiger Talismans of Spirit, crowned with Hibiscus Wreaths, clad in Purple-Embroidered Feather Mantles and Cinnabar-Green Flying Skirts. They ring the True Bells of Gold and Jade, raise Purple Canopies and Florid Banners, and bear the Nine Crimson-Speckled Talismans to seal mountains and summon clouds, ascending to wander within the Golden Hall of the Purple Ultimate.

If one has not yet attained the transformation of luminous ascent to the heavens, they remain among mortals. Those who cultivate this Way shall be granted by the Nine Heavens’ Parents, the Supreme August Purple Dawn, the raiment of flying immortals and feathered regalia for their bodies—though these shall not manifest amid the clamor of the dusty world. When you practice this Way, you must simply visualize yourself clad in these sacred vestments, riding dragons and commanding clouds. After seven years, you shall attain the true numinous form and ascend to the Purple Dawn.

The Supreme August Lord of the Purple Dawn, Master of the Primordial Dawn, is the descendant of the Twin Radiance, the essence congealed from the Jade Dawn. He nurtures dragon mists in the Great Void, enfolds the Purple Emptiness to commune with spirits, entrusts the Nine Mysteries to contain brilliance, coalesces the Vast Dew to form his spirit, and refines the Three Qi to bathe himself. Having passed through the Dark Mother to achieve dharma-birth, he endures kalpas of transformation, moved by the sun’s proclamations to reveal his luminous form.

Thus, in the first year of the Supreme August Era, when Heavenly Stem Jia inaugurated the dawn, he was born upon the Central Plain of the Eight Luminances within the Divine Continent, by the shores of the Cavernous Abyss. His name was tabooed as *Bodi*, his style called *Tiger*□. On the day of his birth, his face radiated a golden countenance, his body gleamed with jade light, his five-colored purple regalia shimmered, and his seventy-two transformations dazzled with jade-like brilliance. Divine dragons spat fungi to nourish him, phoenixes and simurghs spread their wings to shade his mystery. Cinnabar spirits scattered luminance upon his jasper terrace, while flowing light blazed resplendently in the distant truth.

The twin luminaries paused their radiance amid the Eight Clarities,
the Seven Primes revolved their essence to uphold the dawn.
Golden Immortals scattered incense to mingle with the qi,
divine consorts cast blossoms to kindle mist.
The Five Wefts wove their patterns,
spiritual splendor suffused the purple heavens.
At eighteen years of age, he roamed freely in the Middle Prime,
ingesting essence and swallowing qi,
exhaling and inhaling numinous fluids.
He consumed fungi to inwardly irrigate,
congealed spirit to gestate as an embryonic immortal.
Drawing in and rinsing, he maintained silence,
abiding in tranquil spontaneity.
His thoughts subtle, his mindfulness of qi unbroken,
he accumulated resonance with the Cavernous Prime,
his name transcending the Upper Clarity.
He received the title of Primordial August,
his rank ascending to the Purple Dawn.
Orchid phoenixes responded to auspicious omens,
following the flow of destiny’s transformations.
His spirit embraced the Five Luminaries,
his form coiled with the Seven Primes.
He soared through the firmament, wheels revolving,
riding the void to descend in trailing mist.
The host of immortals opened the path,
the Three Ways converged in brilliance.
Forked lightning spat its might,
his swift chariot traversed the Nine Primes.
Twice he ascended the jasper steps,
thrice he paid homage at the Purple Court.
He wandered and gazed upon the jasper towers,
feasting in the radiance of the Three Primes.
In fellowship with the Five Elders,
he became an honored guest of the Jade Empyrean.
Flying beasts crouched and reared,
divine phoenixes soothed with their cries.
Mighty dragons guided the reins,
spirit winds dispersed fragrance.
Flowing scents surged and billowed,
pervading the Jade Clarity.
Golden lads grasped clouds to attend his wheels,
jade maidens trod the void to guard his spirit.

Eastward he journeyed to the Azure Waters and Mulberry Grove Pavilion,
to the Cavernous Abyss’s vast numinous utmost clarity,
the source of the Sun Valley’s Divine King and Sovereign of Immortals,
where he sought the Nine Primes’ Primordial Chart,
the luminous chapters of the Nine Transformations of Azure Essence and Verdant Clouds,
and the solar radiance of Dawn’s Clarity,
to refine his true form and roam the Grotto-Heavens’ upper palaces.

Westward he traveled to the Mystic Feathered Wilds,
the banks of the Western Dragon’s Vast Expanse,
to the Purple Tenuity’s Jasper Hall and the Queen Mother of the West,
where he sought the Pristine Luminous Chapters,
the Primordial Register of Tortoise Mountain,
and the Jade Standard of True Refinement,
to meditate upon the title of the Purple August.

Southward he ventured to the Vermilion Mound’s Great Cinnabar,
the ultimate fiery realm of scorching flames,
the Nine-Tiered Jasper Terrace of the Grand Yang’s Luminous Palace,
to the Southern Culmen’s Upper Prime Lord,
where he sought the Great Cinnabar’s Cavernous Prime,
the Flame Bell’s Seven Luminaries’ Jasper Chapters,
and the Golden True Jade Radiance,
to summon the twin luminaries’ jade essence
and refine his sevenfold-transformed countenance.

Northward he journeyed to the Dark Yin’s Nine Primes’ frigid realm,
where the Grand Yin’s Jade Dawn’s Nine Prime True Consort
received the Flowing Essence’s Flying Radiance Treasure Chapters,
the desolate Nine Luminaries’ vast expanse,
and the Seven Primes’ effulgence,
to part the Celestial Pass,
attend the banquet in the Jade Palace,
and ascend the soaring peaks of the Primordial Heaven’s
Jade Capital’s towering terrace and Nine-Bend Chambers.
There, the Supreme Perfected Elder and the Most High Great Dao Lord
bestowed the Three Heavens’ Orthodox Dharma,
commanding the Six Heavens’ might,
receiving the Nine Crimson Flying Essence Chapters,
and donning the flowing gold phoenix seal.
His rank ascended to the Purple Dawn.

Thus, the August Supreme Master’s numinous radiance and resplendent visage,
his golden countenance and joyful mien,
were crowned with dharma robes.
Upon his head he wore the seven-hued crown of Purple Script and Flying Frost,
attended by ten billion immortal maidens and countless immortals.
Flying dragons and venomous beasts guarded his jasper carriage.
Night shone with natural divine candles,
chambers diffused the mist of empty fragrance.
Winds stirred the dark banners,
whirling dances swirled in profusion.
His whistling clear, vast and boundless,
jade tones resonated with the celestial pipes.

Empty chants and soaring hymns,
eight echoes harmonize in response.
Phoenixes cry and phoenixes pipe,
pure melodies play the dark celestial flutes.
Mysterious essence curves reflect,
the Three Dawns pause their canopies.
Myriad Perfected offer rites of celebration,
none but revere and rely upon him.

He upholds the divine precincts of the Nine Provinces,
roams the boundless, desolate halls,
rectifies the destiny of the Three and Five,
rescues and transforms the calamities of the Tang succession.
He governs the Two Modes within the Dark Diagram,
unites the legacy of the August Supreme.

In tranquil recitation within the jasper carriage,
he gazes downward, contemplating the profound.
Lush and verdant, the Three Passes,
hidden verses unfold their cadence.
In unison they chant the Dark Portals,
illuminating the model that elicits praise.
Empty tones race one another,
cavernous wisdom shines brilliantly,
stirring the Eight Winds to swift motion,
seizing the streaming lightning to radiate essence.

He summons the Six Jia within the Five Phases,
commands the martial legions of Heavenly Soldiers.
He seals the Five Peaks to await his chariot,
issues thunderous proclamations to shake the numinous.
Transforming the dance of Heaven upon the divine continent,
revolving the Seven Turns within the wondrous court.
He invokes the Void and None to cleanse himself,
ingests jade talismans to ascend in form.
He casts the celestial patterns upon sun and moon,
directs the Seven Qi through the Dipper stars.

Thus, drifting across the Nine Realms,
the Noble Scions share his carriage,
the Directors of Destiny align their wheels,
roaming and feasting in the Purple Dawn,
encompassing the Cavernous Abyss,
governing all immortals.
From Heaven downward, none fail to receive his charge
through the Dao of the Seven Transformations.

Wondrous indeed, the Dao of the Seven Turns and Seven Transformations.
The August Supreme Purple Dawn Lord received it from the Nine Heavens’ Parents,
cultivated and perfected the Dao,
and transmitted it to the August Supreme Lord of the Dark Heaven.
The August Supreme Lord transmitted it to the Jade Lads of the Three Heavens,
the Jade Lads of the Three Heavens transmitted it to the Purple Ultimate Perfected Primordial Lord,
the Purple Ultimate Perfected Primordial Lord transmitted it to the Heavenly Thearch,
the Heavenly Thearch transmitted it to the Upper Prime Lord of the Southern Culmen,
the Upper Prime Lord of the Southern Culmen transmitted it to the Heavenly Thearch of the Grand Tenuity,
the Heavenly Thearch of the Grand Tenuity transmitted it to the Later Sage Lord of the Golden Portals,
the Later Sage Lord of the Golden Portals transmitted it to the Azure Lad of the Grand Minister,
forming a lineage of Perfected Ministers,
each transmission enduring ten thousand kalpas.

The Lesser Existence Heavenly King later compiled one copy,
sealing it within the mountains of the Western Regions.
Those who obtain it all welcome the Sage Lord to the Upper Clarity Palace,
providing twenty-one Jade Lads and twenty-one Jade Maidens each,
to safeguard the numinous texts
and protect the bodies of those who possess the scriptures.

The Dao of the Seven Turns of the August Supreme,
written on crimson slips and in purple script,
is concealed within the Jade Chamber of the Purple Heaven Primordial Terrace,
granted only to those who have already attained Perfection,
never taught to beginners.

All who receive the *Thirty-Nine Chapters of the Cavernous Perfection, the Feminine One Jade Seal, the Great Existence Wondrous Scripture*,
who unbind knots and disperse stagnation,
who deliver the Seven Mysteries,
yet do not know the method of the Seven Turns,
are not permitted to recite from the Jade Canon.

The verses of the Seven Turns,
all are melodies of the Divine Continent,
tones of the Loftiest,
resonating through Heaven and Earth,
interspersed among the Three Dawns,
revolving left and turning right,
converging at the Cavernous Gates,
transforming Five into Two,
corresponding above to the Seven Primes,
turning Three into Five,
weaving through the Celestial Pass.

Its Dao is most wondrous,
hence it is called the Dance of Heaven.
Reciting one chapter,
its clarity pervades without interruption;
seven turns and eight recitations,
the Three Luminaries unite in Perfection;
the Five Elders fix the registers,
the Directors of Destiny alter the years;
dissolving long-standing knots,
severing the roots of the womb;
opening the Nine Ancestors above,
reversing to return as Womb Immortals;
commanding a thousand demons,
binding ten thousand demons to the body;
cultivating it ten thousand times,
one ascends to the Purple Dawn.

From the *Scripture of the Divine Continent’s Seven Transformations and the Dance of Heaven*,
*Chapter on Ascending the Jade Palace*,
*Inner Incantation of the Grand Thearch, First*.

In a quiet chamber, sit alone facing east, knock the teeth nine times, and with eyes closed, recite the hidden incantation:

*"Vast and numinous Primordial Azure,
Lesser Yang Master of Radiance,
Nine qi return to the liver,
granting my hun-soul peace.
Should any dare transgress,
shatter them with the Flowing Bells.
The Jade Register of the Supreme Thearch—
my name ascends to Great Clarity."*

Conclude, then close the breath for nine cycles, swallowing saliva nine times to finish.

**Second Inner Incantation of the Heavenly Thearch**
Face south, close the eyes, knock the teeth three times, and recite the hidden spell:

*"Palace of Crimson Peaks,
where High Perfected Ones abide.
Three qi return to the heart,
this is my Cinnabar Prime.
Lift my purified body,
directly memorializing to be heard.
In the Verdant Script of the Grand Tenuity—
my name is inscribed among the Divine Immortals."*

Conclude, then hold the breath for three cycles, swallowing saliva three times to finish.

**Third Inner Incantation of the Upper Prime Lord of the Southern Culmen**
Face due west, close the eyes, knock the teeth seven times, and recite the hidden spell:

*"Primal Simplicity pervades the Cavernous Float,
divine abode of Heavenly Perfected Ones.
Seven qi guard the diaphragm,
dwelling with the spirit in unity.
Limpid sincerity, luminous as stone,
roaming and ascending the Mysterious Void.
In White Jade and Golden Script—
the True Writ of the Nine Thearchs.
Let me soar as an immortal,
my name of death already expunged."*

Conclude, then close the breath for seven cycles, swallowing saliva seven times to finish.

**Fourth Inner Incantation of the Thearch of the Grand Tenuity**
Face directly toward the stellar position governing the current year’s fate, close the eyes, knock the teeth twelve times, and recite the hidden spell:

*"Yellow Prime of the Central Thearch,
spirit of my root destiny.
One qi attends the spleen,
enabling me to attain the True.
Yielding to things, they incline—
a thousand spirits come to serve.
In the Mysterious Register of the Venerable Lord—
my name is inscribed among the Divine Immortals.
Long life and enduring vision,
coexisting with Heaven."*

Conclude, then hold the breath for one cycle, swallowing saliva twelve times to finish.

**Fifth Inner Incantation of the Sagely Thearch**
Face north, close the eyes, knock the teeth five times, and recite the hidden spell:

*"Mysterious Prime of the Eight Poles,
mechanism of the Supreme On High.
Five qi defend the kidneys,
tortoise and jade interlocking.
Inscribed on Jade Tablets—
my years equal the Two Modes.
The Supreme Thearch of the Highest Sovereign,
steadfast and unerring.
Commanding the Six Jia,
summoning the Eight Potencies."*

Conclude, then hold the breath for five cycles, swallowing saliva five times to finish.

**Sixth Inner Incantation of the Host of Perfected**
Face east again, visualize the qi of the Five Directions, and when complete, swallow saliva nine times and knock the teeth.

Conclude, then face north and bow twice, reciting the hidden prayer:

*"Reverently I address the Four Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate and Great Pole,
entreating the visualization of the Five Directions, Five Thearchs, and Five Numinous Spirits.
Inscribed in emerald script,
they mount the chariot of the Ten Heavens.
Ten thousand demons restrain their qi,
all evil spirits sever their smoke.
May I be granted an audience,
able to converse with them."*

Conclude, then concentrate the mind in refined contemplation.

The Supreme Lord says: *"Those who wish to cultivate the methods of scriptural practices, to visualize the Perfected and guard the One, must first unblock the Three Palaces, illuminate the Nine Orifices, and harmonize the Five Viscera. Without this preparation, the spirits and qi will not rejoice, the true numina will not descend, and one’s refined contemplation will be in vain, yielding no benefit to self-nourishment. Those of sincere aspiration should diligently practice these matters. After reciting the Five Directions’ hidden incantations, return to visualization—when the qi’s governance is harmonized, the inner spirits will delight, and their responsive manifestations will appear clearly, without obstruction."*

Those who earnestly pursue this will surely attain the supreme and wondrous methods of Divine Immortality, for such teachings are not transmitted to the unworthy.

For all who cultivate the Dao of long life and the method of ascending at dawn, purity, fasting, and ardent devotion must come first. Thus, the learning of the Perfected—who gaze upon clouds and mist to summon descent, or contemplate the formless to evoke resonance—how could it be false or deluded? The Way of Heaven is profoundly silent, its vastness unfathomable. Yet if you possess the heart, where else could it reside but within you? Truly, through sincerity and steadfastness, holding fast to the True, the Dao does not lie far off—it is but a matter of years. When you align with qi, the Dao will descend. This is the Supreme Lord’s wondrous secret; those who attain it become Divine Immortals.

In learning, one must proceed from the lower to the higher, following the proper sequence without omission, lest one violate the celestial statutes. Scriptures are of three ranks, and the Dao has Three Perfected.

The **Inner Writings of the Three Sovereigns**, the **Celestial Script of Great Characters**, the **Records of the Nine Heavens**, and the **Way of Yellow and White**—these allow one to rein the reins of the Mysterious Empyrean and wander the Five Peaks, and thus belong to the lowest rank.

The **Numinous Treasure’s Cavern Mystery**, coeval with the Primordial Beginning, profound and abstruse, sharing the same wondrous origin—its pure fasts and fragrant orchids, the Five Invocations illuminating the Mysterious, liberate the seven ancestors and dissolve the roots of transgression. It also summons Perfected Ones to descend and soar into the Grand Clarity, constituting the middle rank’s wondrousness, yielding earthbound immortals of the lower realms.

The **Upper Clarity’s Daoist Scriptures** and the **Hidden Writings of the Great Elixir**—comprising three hundred sacred names and nine thousand jade instructions—are the foremost titles of the Upper Perfected and the inner chapters of the Jade Thearch. Those who attain them are inscribed on the Jade Tablets, their names recorded in the Azure Palace, ascending at dawn to ascend to the Thearch’s Hall. These are the secrets of the highest rank, concealed in the Nine Heavens above, within the Palace of Great Existence.

In learning, one must progress from the lower rank to the Jade Clarity. The Dao possesses Three Marvels:

The **First Marvel**: the *Thirty-Nine Chapters of the Perfect Writ of the Great Cavern*;
The **Second Marvel**: the *Precious Scripture of the Feminine One*;
The **Third Marvel**: the *Supreme Lord’s Numinous and Primordial Cavern Mystery, Wondrous Scripture of Great Existence*.

These are transmitted only to those who have already become Perfected Ones, not to beginners. If by chance one encounters the opportunity to see their titles, one must not rashly peruse their sacred texts. One should first refine one’s practice through study before advancing toward the True. The Dao is all-encompassing; none who practice it fail to become immortals. Learners should carefully adhere to these words and not neglect them. Those who study the Dao without first mastering the statutes will never succeed. Statutes exist to regulate transgressions; knowing them, one may reform, and naturally align with the Perfected.

The **Statutes of the Supreme Perfected** comprise nine ranks, each with twelve articles.
The **Statutes of the Nine Perfected** comprise three ranks, each with nine articles.
The **Luminous Statutes of the Four Poles** comprise four ranks, each with twenty-four articles.
These prescribe the measures for light and grave transgressions and blessings, and thus learners should first study them. These statutes may also circulate independently, and beginners need not possess all the scriptures.

The *Jade Chapters of the Supreme Lord’s Numinous and Primordial Great Existence* and the *Luminous Statutes of the Nine Perfected* are transmitted only to those whose bone-phase aligns with the True. Following the precedent of the Supreme Thearch’s era, these texts were transmitted once every ten thousand kalpas. The Three Heavens established the norm: within seven thousand years, three transmissions are permitted; within seven hundred years, if a suitable recipient appears, three transmissions are also permitted. According to the statutes, one must present three taels of gold, a hundred feet of purple silk, twenty-seven feet of blue silk, five taels of red thread, a catty of aloeswood, and a tael of cinnabar. One must then visit the master to present the offerings for a hundred days—or thirty days—swearing an oath before the Nine Heavens, the Great Numinous of the Northern Thearch, and the myriad Perfected who govern the Jade Bureau of Immortality, pledging as a covenant. One must vow to keep the sacred texts secret, never to recklessly disclose them or reveal the numinous Perfected, lest one violate the covenant and transgress the statutes. Such offenses will bring calamity upon the nine ancestors, condemning the errant soul to be tortured and bound in hell for ten thousand kalpas without reprieve, the body enslaved and the form maimed, forever barred from immortality.

Those who receive the *Numinous and Primordial Cavern Mystery* must transmit it within the prescribed time limit; beyond that, one may not again reveal its titles to propagate the Three Marvels. The wondrousness of the *Numinous and Primordial Scripture* must be impressed upon later learners, urging those who aspire to diligence to heed the luminous statutes.

The **Nine Mysterious Thearchs of the Latter Saints**, the **Celestial Kings of the Nine Empyreans**, the **Upper Ministers**, the **Azure Lad**, and the **Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate** bow their heads and respectfully inquire of the **Supreme Heavenly Worthy, the Utmost Perfected**: *"The supreme methods are lofty and transcendent, their mystery profound and limpid, interweaving the myriad things. Rooted in quiescence and emptiness, their wondrous arising stirs the Mysterious, transforming through the Three Vehicles, pervading kalpas beyond measure—how could their boundlessness be constrained by luminous statutes?"*

The Supreme Lord says: *"Well said, your words. Those of later generations, unless they are scions of the Jade Clarity born of spontaneity itself, are all conceived in turbid qi and tainted by the clamor of defilement. Their conduct is not purely formed, their nature not single-mindedly good. Though they may yearn for the profound and recondite, their hearts ever turn away from me. Their every action deviates, and none fail to commit transgressions. Transgressions arise externally, diminishing life internally. Those who study under such conditions—how far they stray from the True! If the Three Bureaus record their faults and the Dark Bureau confronts them, extending punishment to the seven ancestors and heaping sins upon the self—those who commit such transgressions, even if they awaken in the Mysterious Capital, will face the system of retribution and the great transformations of the numinous. Yet redemption is permitted: by following the statutes, one may expiate sins, and thus the time of attaining the True will surely draw near."*

Scholars of learning who lack such discipline engage in vain exertions of concentrated thought, gaining nothing from their arduous contemplation. Therefore, the Nine Perfected of the Three Grades and the Radiant Chapters of the Supreme Pole Perfected One were revealed in retreat. The *Supreme Clarity Scripture of the Pristine Numinous and Vast Wondrous* was reverently received, its Nine Perfected Regulations and Disciplines concealed within golden treasuries and jade coffers. Guarded by three thousand jade lads and jade maidens, they attend the numinous text, scattering incense in the empty courtyard. Flying dragons and venomous beasts, colossal serpents a thousand fathoms long, brandish their claws along cloud-wreathed ramparts, standing vigil at the Jade Pass.

Thus, every three months, the Ten Heavens’ Great Sages and the Nine Palaces’ Perfected Immortals ascend without fail to the Mysterious Palace, receiving the luminous regulations and paying homage to the numinous text.

The High Minister, Lord Azure Lad, declared: “Those whose bones are of gold and marrow of jade, whose names are enrolled in the Azure Palace, having obtained this scripture and secretly put it into practice, thereby align their rites of reception with the supreme canon. Its application and measures yield merit equal to the Perfected, redeeming sins, dispelling long-standing calamities, and unraveling all knots. The seven ancestral lineages of the Mysterious rejoice, while the practitioner ascends to feast in the Jade Palace.”

Here ends the *Supreme Secret Essentials*, Scroll Ninety-Five.
*Supreme Secret Essentials*, Scroll Ninety-Six.

**Jade Clarity’s Supreme Ranks**

The *Jade Clarity’s Lofty Peach, Stern Soaring Dragon, Net Heaven’s Observance of the Numinous, Hidden Writ of the Golden Mystery’s Inner Text* is borne by the Nine Elder Immortals of the Immortal Metropolis. To practice the Way of divine transcendence, inscribe it in vermilion upon a white tablet and place it in the West, thereby extinguishing the great demon-king of the White Emperor’s court in the West and summoning the immortal officials of that direction. After twelve years of practice, the White Radiance’s Primordial Numinous Seven Sages and the Golden Numinous Lords will manifest in bodily form, dispatching immortal officials to procure the numinous medicines of spontaneity. Further, inscribe in cinnabar upon white silk and wear it upon the body; when traversing the Western Paradise’s Blessed Hall and the Abyssal Prosperity’s realm, the great demon-king will gird himself and bow in reverence, welcoming the immortal officials and their retinue into the Western Marchmount. There, they shall bestow the feathered canopy of pristine clouds, and after twelve years, one shall soar to the Jade Clarity Palace.

The *Jade Clarity’s Azure Empyrean, Empty Song’s Remnant Dawn, Nine Poles’ Hidden Writ of the Golden Mystery’s Inner Text* is borne by the Jade Clarity’s Lofty Primordial Lord. To practice the Way of divine transcendence, inscribe it in black upon a cinnabar tablet and place it in the South, thereby diminishing the great demon-king of the Red Emperor’s court in the South and summoning the immortal officials of that direction. After eighteen years of practice, the Cavern Yang’s Cinnabar Numinous True Radiance Lord will manifest in bodily form, dispatching immortal officials to procure the numinous medicines of spontaneity. Further, inscribe in black upon crimson silk and wear it upon the body; when traversing the Southern realm of Wanli City and the Abandoned Worthies’ world, the great demon-king will gird himself and bow in reverence, welcoming the immortal officials and their retinue into the Southern Marchmount. There, one shall obtain the Southern Culmen’s treasure writ and the feathered canopy of cinnabar clouds, and after eighteen years, soar to the Jade Clarity Palace.

The *Jade Clarity’s Vast Expanse, Towering Mansion, Obscured Heaven’s Overlapping Radiance, Root-Spiraling Hidden Writ of the Golden Mystery’s Inner Text* is received by the Nine Heavens’ Perfected Kings. To practice the Way of divine transcendence, inscribe it in yellow upon a black tablet and place it in the North, thereby extinguishing the great demon-king’s court in the North and summoning the immortal officials of that direction. After fifteen years, the Northern Culmen’s Mysterious Supreme Jade Perfected Lord will bestow the Highest Treasure Writ, dispatching fifty immortal officials. Further, inscribe in yellow upon black silk and wear it upon the body; when traversing the Northern realm of Yu-zhi’s Wilds and the world of purity, the myriad numina will gird themselves, and the demon-king will bow in reverence, welcoming the immortal officials and their retinue into the Northern Marchmount. There, they shall bestow the feathered canopy of mysterious clouds, and one shall soar to the Jade Clarity Palace.

The *Jade Clarity’s Upholding Blade, Canopy of Flowers, Floating Net Heaven’s Mysterious Radiance, Level Dawn’s Hidden Writ of the Golden Mystery’s Inner Text* is received by the Three Primordials of the Great Simplicity from the Celestial King of Primordial Beginning. To practice the Way of divine transcendence, inscribe it in purple upon a yellow tablet and place it in the Northwest, thereby extinguishing the great demon-king of the Luminous Emperor’s court and summoning the immortal officials of the Western Blessed Virtue’s Wilds and the Yanxian world. After twelve years, the Jade Maidens of the Upper Palace will descend to the practitioner’s chamber, imparting the Way of divine perfection. Further, inscribe in purple upon yellow silk and wear it upon the body; when traversing the Yanxian world in the Northwest, the myriad numina will gird themselves, and the demon-king will bow in reverence, welcoming the practitioner to ascend upon the feathered canopy of flying clouds and wander the Jade Clarity Palace.

The *Jade Clarity’s Complete Flow, Grand Basin’s Initial Silence, Convergent Radiance’s Dawn Mandate, Hidden Writ of the Golden Mystery’s Inner Text* is received by the Great Emperor of Fusang from the Perfected King of the Grand Empyrean. To practice the Way of divine transcendence, inscribe it in yellow upon a blue-green tablet and place it in the Southeast, thereby extinguishing the great demon-king of the August Emperor’s court and summoning the immortal officials of the Southeast’s Primordial Blessed Field and the Yudi world of Worthies. After fifteen years, twenty Jade Maidens will be dispatched to serve the practitioner, procuring the numinous medicines of spontaneity. Further, inscribe in yellow upon green silk and wear it upon the body; when traversing the world of Worthies, the myriad numina will gird themselves, and the demon-king will bow in reverence, welcoming the practitioner to ascend upon the feathered canopy of green clouds and soar to the Jade Clarity Palace.

The *Jade Clarity’s Soaring Countenance, Nurturing Luxuriance, Adversarial Sands, Heaven’s Aligned Radiance, Mysterious Dawn’s Hidden Writ of the Golden Mystery’s Inner Text* is received by the Queen Mother of the West from the Supreme Master of the Northern Culmen. To practice the Way of divine transcendence, inscribe it in blue-green upon a purple tablet and place it in the Northeast, thereby extinguishing the great demon-king of the Azure Emperor’s court and summoning the immortal officials of the Northeast’s Blessed Assembly and the Chang’an world of the Azure Emperor. After ten years, eighteen Immortal Lads will be dispatched to serve the practitioner, procuring the numinous medicines of spontaneity and the Highest Flying Mystery’s feathered regalia. Further, inscribe in blue-green upon raw purple silk and wear it upon the body; when traversing the Chang’an world in the Northeast, the myriad numina will gird themselves, and the demon-king will bow in reverence, welcoming the practitioner to ascend upon the feathered canopy of purple clouds and soar to the Jade Clarity Palace.

Excerpted from the *Cavern Perfection’s Highest Golden Mystery’s Feathered Regalia Hidden Writ*.

**Yang Terrace’s Numinous Life Jade Talisman**
For all who practice the Way to seek transcendence, contemplate the divine and invoke the Perfected, repent sins and dissolve transgressions, and aspire to the grace of the Yang Terrace’s Perfected Ones, immortal officials, and Jade Maidens, inscribe this writ in black ink on the day of Winter’s Advent, face north, and ingest seven talismans. Thereupon, the immortal officials and Jade Maidens shall inscribe one’s name in the immortal register and engrave it upon the golden tablets. After eight years of practice without fail in a single precept, the Perfected Ones shall dispatch eight Jade Lads. Through contemplation of the Perfected and the resonance of feeling, the Perfected Ones will manifest in bodily form, bestowing the sevenfold radiance’s chariot to soar to the Jade Clarity.

**Cavern Perfection’s Nine Vermilion Mottled Talismans**
On the day of the Vernal Equinox, the Lord of Mount Tai in the Eastern Marchmount regularly presents to the Highest Thearch a memorial listing the names of Perfected Immortals who have attained the Way and those newly initiated. To practice the Way of flying transcendence, on that day at sunrise, bathe, fast, burn incense, and enter the chamber. Face east and contemplate the Lord of Mount Tai in the Eastern Marchmount, whose surname is Mysterious Mound and whose given name is Mu Lu. His head bears the Three Treasures’ Ninefold Radiant Night Crown; he wears a skirt of azure feathered regalia and a nine-colored mottled robe, girded with the Highest Sovereign’s Mandate Spirit Talisman. He rides a chariot of azure clouds drawn by nine-colored blue-green dragons, accompanied by twelve immortal officials, bearing the five sacred mushrooms. Turning northeast, he ascends to the boundless heights of the Jade Clarity Heaven, circling within the Azure Clouds of the Mysterious Void. Strike the teeth nine times and intone in the heart: “Today is the supreme seasonal rite; the Eight Vows renew. May the divine canopy of melody turn and descend to my realm, heed my entreaties, and memorialize my supplications. May I ascend to the jade tablets, my name inscribed in the Purple Register. May the Dao Lord turn his radiance upon me, that I attain the rank of Highest Immortal.”

When this is complete, visualize the Lord of Mount Tai descending in his cloud chariot, verdant qi billowing thickly to fill the chamber. The Lord stands amidst the emerald mist, holding a green bamboo slip, inscribing my name upon its pages. Softly intone the incantation:

"Jade Perfected wanders in radiance, illuminating the eastern quarter.
Riding dragons and chariots, soaring through the great void.
Turning the melody of the divine, descending to my chamber.
Green yang announces the beginning; may my highest vows unfold.
Receive my supplications, erase transgressions and record merits.
Engrave my name on the green slip, present it to the August Emperor.
The Western Tortoise binds the register; the Eastern Flower carves the inscription.
Five numina lend their wings; the Eight Emperors shine as one.
Driving *jia* and *yi*, emerging from wood and entering metal.
Six *ding* spirits attend; jade maidens lend their support.
Commanding mountains and summoning seas, restraining dragons and serpents.
Whistling winds and summoning rains—nothing does not instantly obey.
Heavenly demons submit to trial; myriad spirits pay reverence.
Transforming my form and altering my countenance, ascending to the Jade Palace.
May I enjoy the offerings of Mount Tai, preserving eternity without end."

When finished, raise your head and swallow the nine breaths to conclude. Practicing this for nine years, the Lord of Mount Tai will manifest before you, descending in clouds of emerald qi, bestowing nine divine youths and natural spirit mushrooms, granting knowledge of all affairs within ten thousand *li* of the eastern lands. After eighteen years, you will attain dragon chariots, soaring through the void to ascend to the Jade Clarity Heaven.

The Lord of Mount Heng of the Southern Marchmount, on the summer solstice, presents the register of perfected immortals who have attained the Dao and those newly embarking on the path, reporting to the August Emperor on High, recording and verifying their names, distinguishing merits and transgressions. To cultivate the Way of Flying Immortals, at midday of that day, bathe and purify yourself, enter the chamber, burn incense, and face south to visualize the Lord of Mount Heng of the Southern Marchmount, whose surname is Yan and personal name Yangguang. He wears the Eight Brilliances Jeweled Radiance Jade Crown, a crimson brocade flying skirt, and a divine-light scarlet-patterned robe, girded with the Seal of Spirit Confinement and Demon Subjugation. He rides a chariot of crimson clouds, accompanied by twelve immortal officials of the Southern Marchmount, all mounted on flying phoenixes, bearing divine mushrooms. Turning southeast, he ascends to the boundless heights of the Jade Clarity Heaven, circling within the crimson clouds of the empty void. Strike the teeth three times and intone in the heart: “Today is the most auspicious of days, a propitious morning answering the perfected. May the universal vows descend; may the Mysterious Heaven renew. I beseech the Dao Lord to dispatch the flying chariot and feathered canopy of the perfected immortals to descend upon me, that my name be spoken in the Upper Clarity and bound in the register of the Eastern Flower.”

When this is complete, visualize the Lord of Mount Heng descending in his crimson cloud chariot to your chamber, vermilion qi swelling to fill the room. The Lord stands amidst the scarlet mist, holding a red bamboo slip, inscribing my name upon its pages. Softly intone the incantation:

"Vermilion yang rides the dawn, wandering the nine heavens.
Crimson chariot and flying canopy, resplendent in the vastness of rosy clouds.
Turning the melody to descend and illuminate, overseeing my earnest heart.
May my highest vows, once uttered, move even the unseen.
Gazing upward to the numinous balance, form and spirit commune.
Inscribe my name on the cinnabar terrace, bind the characters of Southern Jade.
Six *bing* spirits guard the perfected; riding *ding* to enter the whirlwind.
Commanding mountains and sealing seas, restraining the myriad demons.
A thousand spirits submit and flee; all malevolent forces disperse.
As the Southern Marchmount presides, the Three Origins summon.
Descending in crimson chariots, ascending to the imperial court.
Dual luminaries unite in power, transcending the later heavens."

When finished, raise your head and swallow the three breaths to conclude. Practicing this for nine years, the Lord of Mount Heng will bestow upon you sacred scriptures, assign eight immortal officials, and send down divine mushrooms and wondrous substances, granting knowledge of all affairs within ten thousand *li* of the southern lands. After eighteen years, you will attain the chariot of crimson clouds, soaring through the great void to ascend to the Jade Clarity Heaven.

The Lord of Mount Hua of the Western Marchmount, on the autumnal equinox, presents the register of perfected immortals who have attained the Dao and those newly embarking on the path, reporting to the August Emperor on High, recording and verifying their names, distinguishing merits and transgressions. To cultivate the Way of Flying Immortals, at the *bu* hour of that day, bathe and maintain purity, enter the chamber, burn incense, and face west to visualize the Lord of Mount Hua, whose surname is Haoqiu and personal name Yuancang. He wears the Six Origins Divine Flight Crown, a white brocade flying skirt, and a plain silk robe, girded with the Intertwined Numinous White Sash. He rides a chariot of white clouds, accompanied by twelve immortal officials of the Western Marchmount, all mounted on twelve white tigers, bearing seven-colored banners. Turning southwest, he ascends to the boundless heights of the Upper Clarity Heaven, circling within the white clouds of the empty void. Strike the teeth seven times and intone in the heart: “I vow to become a flying immortal, ascending to the Upper Clarity, entering Mount Hua to share the numinous power of the Emperor. I beseech the Dao Lord to descend my true form and bestow immortality upon me, inscribing my mysterious name.”

When this is complete, visualize the Lord of Mount Hua descending in his white cloud chariot to your chamber, white qi shimmering to fill the room. The Lord stands amidst the pale mist, holding a white bamboo slip, inscribing my name upon its pages. Softly intone the incantation:

"Golden gates gleam brightly; white clouds tower majestically.
Four convergences unite the perfected; eight breaths weave the net.
Reporting to the Jade Dawn, the imperial numen ascends in rosy clouds.
Turning the divine to descend, casting its gaze upon my dwelling.
Record me on the white slip, inscribe my name in the Western Flower.
Seven perfected immortals govern; restraining and commanding the hordes of demons.
Upholding the august might, commanding mountains and rivers.
Summoning clouds and descending rains, the dragon chariot swiftly passes.
Conveying me through the flying void, ascending to the numinous peak.
May my wishes be instantly fulfilled; may what I sever be immediately destroyed.
A thousand transformations, myriad changes, penetrating the radiance of the mysterious clouds."

When finished, raise your head and swallow the seven breaths to conclude. Practicing this for nine years, the Lord of Mount Hua will bestow upon you the medicines of the immortals, assigning seven divine youths. After nine years, you will gain knowledge of all affairs, auspicious and ominous, within ten thousand *li* of the western lands. After eighteen years, you will attain the chariot of white clouds, soaring through the great void to ascend to the Jade Clarity Palace.

The Lord of Mount Song of the Central Marchmount, on the days of *wu-chen*, *wu-xu*, *ji-wei*, and *ji-chou* in the third, sixth, ninth, and twelfth months, presents the register of perfected immortals who have attained the Dao and those newly embarking on the path, reporting to the August Emperor on High, recording and verifying their names, distinguishing merits and transgressions.

To practice the Way of Flying Immortals, on the appointed day, after midday, bathe and purify yourself, enter the chamber, burn incense, and face the four seasons, meditating upon the Lord of the Central Marchmount, whose surname is *Jiao* and whose personal name is *Pusheng*. Don the Jade Crown of the Yellow Dawn of the Middle Prime, wear a yellow brocade flying skirt, drape a black-and-yellow patterned robe, and gird yourself with the Yellow Divine Seal of the Central August. Mount the yellow radiance of the flying chariot, accompanied by twelve immortal officials of the Central Marchmount, all riding flying phosphors, each holding a twelve-jointed black-and-yellow banner. Turn toward the southwest and ascend to the boundless heights of the Jade Clarity Palace, roaming amidst the emptiness within the yellow clouds of the void. Strike the teeth twelve times and recite with focused intent:

*"Heaven hangs its highest vow,
I receive its grace.
Contemplating emptiness, the numinous descends,
Subtle thoughts summon immortality.
Lord of the Central Marchmount,
Bind me to your celestial chariot.
Let me soar and ascend,
Rising to the Golden Gate."*

Conclude, then visualize the Lord of Mount Song descending to your chamber in a flying chariot of yellow radiance, the chamber filled with a surging yellow *qi* that envelops all within. The Lord, within the yellow *qi*, holds a yellow bamboo slip and inscribes your name upon its pages. Softly intone the incantation:

*"August spirit of the Central Mystery,
The Dao veils the purple heavens.
Three unite as one,
Emptiness conjoins to transcendence.
The register of learners safeguards the record,
Securing destiny and extending years.
Inscribe my name in the Eastern Radiance,
Record me among the immortals of the Central Qin.
Five numina shine in repose,
Making my Way resplendent.
Emerging from emptiness, entering subtlety,
Penetrating the Nine Mysteries.
Body born of water and fire,
Transforming into a thousand million luminous forms.
Treading the void, stepping through emptiness,
Soaring without hindrance."*

Conclude, then raise your head and swallow twelve breaths of *qi*.

After nine years of cultivation, you shall converse face-to-face with the Lord of the Central Marchmount, who will descend for you in a flying chariot drawn by yellow dragons, bestow upon you the rank of immortal official, and endow your body with the substances of spontaneity. After eighteen years of practice, the Dao is perfected, and you ascend as a flying immortal to the Jade Purity.

The above is from *The Hidden Scripture of the Eight Daoist Ways and Jade Radiance*.

The **Three Primordials’ Nine Perfected Yang Talismans**, written in gold, bear secret characters:
The **Upper Supervising Celestial Soul Essence Secret Sound Inner Taboo Jade Pendant of Primordial Yang** governs the inner spirits of the lower cinnabar field. Inscribe it in blue on white silk and wear it on the body; also transcribe it on white paper and ingest it on the eight seasonal turning points of your natal destiny. Inwardly contemplate the true essence within the cinnabar field. After three years, you shall behold the true form. The Nine Heavens’ Chancellor records your name in the celestial register, allowing you to meet the Nine Heavens’ Father and Mother. The Thearch descends in form, and the Eight Radiant Ones ascend together with you to the Jade Purity.

The **Dou-Shu Celestial Soul Essence Secret Sound Inner Taboo Jade Pendant of Grand Yang** governs the inner spirits of the Upper True Ones in the Cavern of Yang. Inscribe it in vermilion on white silk and wear it on the body; also transcribe it on white paper and ingest it on the eight seasonal turning points of your natal destiny. Inwardly contemplate the Upper True Ones of the Cavern of Yang. After three years of unbroken practice, you shall behold the true form with five heads and one body. The inner spirits of the Nine Heavens record your name in the Southern Terrace. The Thearch descends to your chamber, refining the hun and restraining the po, transforming the eight spirit-luminants. After eighteen years, your flying form ascends through the Nine Empyreans to the Jade Purity.

The above is from *The Supreme Scripture of the Great Ultimate in Golden Script*.

The Ninety-Sixth Scroll of *The Supreme Essentials* concludes
The Ninety-Seventh Scroll of *The Supreme Essentials*: Jade Purity Section, Lower Rank

**Method for Recalling the Spirits, Soaring through the Empyreans, and Ascending to Summon the Five Stars**

The Dao of recalling the spirits and nurturing the elixir, ascending to summon the Five Stars, guards the Seven Mysteries above and dissolves the mortal form below, harmonizing the myriad transformations and establishing the ascent to the Mysterious Principle. Bathe, burn incense, enter the chamber, and purify with a fast. Practice this method, and the Five Viscera shall radiate brightness; the Seven Orifices shall become luminous. The spirits fill the Crimson Palace; the form ascends to the Five Stars. This is the most wondrous method—transmitted only to the true.

It is said that knowing the Dao is easy, but practicing the method is difficult. For this difficult-to-cultivate Dao, how can it not be kept secret?

On the days of *jiazi*, *jiawu*, *yiyou*, *yimao*, *jichou*, *jiwei*, *wuchen*, and *wuxu*, bathe, purify with a fast, enter the chamber, sit facing outward at will, close the eyes, clasp the hands over the heart, and inwardly visualize:

First, the Azure Thearch of the East, whose taboo name is *Tongming* and style *Gaiqing*, wearing a cyan turban, cyan robe, cyan cap, cyan shoes, and bearing the insignia *Tongguang Yangxia*. Enter my body. Then visualize the Four Perfected within the liver, named *Qingming Jun* with the style *Minglun Tongzi*, constantly filling my liver, guarding the gate beneath the membrane of my stomach’s orifice, sealing off the qi of death. For me, they descend the Azure Essence, Azure Water, and Jade Mushroom. Thereupon, visualize the radiant essence of Jupiter, draw it in through the mouth, and swallow ninety times. Let the azure qi fill the liver’s palace to its utmost. Practice this for nine years, and nine Azure Jade Maidens of the Eastern Essentials shall attend at your side.

Next, visualize the Vermilion Thearch of the South, whose taboo name is *Taiyang* and style *Youlin*, wearing a red turban, red robe, red cap, red shoes, and bearing the insignia *Silang Zhubi*. Enter my body. Then visualize the Primordial Cinnabar Thearch within the Crimson Palace, named *Shenyun Zhu* with the style *Zinan*, also called *Shengshang Bo* and *Shiyun Ju*, constantly guarding my Crimson Palace, sealing the gate of my skull to sever the path of dead qi. For me, they descend the Cinnabar Essence, Vermilion Water, and Jade Mushroom. Thereupon, visualize the radiant essence of Mars, draw it in through the mouth, and swallow eighty times. Let the vermilion qi suffuse the Crimson Palace. Practice this for nine years, and eight Vermilion Jade Maidens of the Southern Essentials shall serve at your side.

Next, visualize the White Thearch of the West, whose taboo name is *Tongyin* and style *Yuanqi*, wearing a white turban, white robe, white cap, plain shoes, and bearing the insignia *Haoling Fuxi*. Enter my body. Then visualize the Six Perfected within the lungs, named *Shangyuan Suyu Jun* with the style *Liangnan*, the Central Youth constantly filling my lungs, guarding my Twelve Pass Gates to sever the path of dead qi. For me, they descend the White Mushroom, White Water, and Jade Essence Elixir. Thereupon, visualize the radiant essence of Venus, draw it in through the mouth, and swallow sixty times. Let the stellar qi fill the lung’s palace. Practice this for nine years, and six White Jade Maidens of the Supreme Simplicity shall attend at your side.

Next, visualize the Black Thearch of the North, whose taboo name is *Tongshen* and style *Zigui*, wearing a dark turban, dark robe, dark cap, dark shoes, and bearing the insignia *Yuzhen Xiaofeng*. Enter my body. Then visualize the Seven Perfected within the kidneys, named *Xuanyang Jun* with the style *Mingguang Sheng*, constantly filling my two kidneys, guarding the Earthly Palace of my back and bones to seal the path of dead qi. For me, they descend the Dark Yin Elixir, Nine-Fluid Mushroom, and Mysterious Water. Thereupon, visualize the radiant essence of Mercury, draw it in through the mouth, and swallow fifty times. Let the stellar qi fill the two kidneys. Practice this for nine years, and five Dark Jade Maidens of the Supreme Mystery shall attend at your side.

Next, visualize the Yellow Thearch of the Center, whose taboo name is *Wanfu* and style *Dacang*, wearing a yellow turban, yellow robe, yellow cap, yellow shoes, and bearing the insignia *Zhongyuan Bawen Yumen*. Enter my body. Then visualize the Five Perfected within the spleen, named *Yangguang Jun* with the style *Taichang Zi*, constantly filling my spleen, guarding the gate of my root’s extremity to sever the path of dead qi. For me, they bring the Yellow Water, Moonflower, Jade Embryo, and Elixir Mushroom. Thereupon, visualize the radiant essence of Saturn, draw it in through the mouth, and swallow twelve times. Let the qi fill the spleen’s palace. Practice this for nine years, and twelve Yellow Jade Maidens of the Supreme Simplicity shall attend at your side.

Next, visualize the Primordial Father of the Upper Mystery, named *Gaotong Sheng* with the style *Zuohui Ming*, and the Primordial Mother of the Lower Mystery, named *Shuhuo Wang* with the style *Youhui Guang*. These two spirits guard the root of my natal destiny, sealing the source of my dead qi. For me, they bring the Yang Mushroom and Yin Essence, nourishing my body. Visualize the radiance of the Two Luminants of the Sun and Moon, illuminating my singular form. Draw in the light and color through the mouth, swallowing thirty-six times. Let the luminous qi fill the Cinnabar Field Palace below the navel. Practice this for nine years, and your face shall bear a golden countenance; your eyes shall emit flowing light. You shall command the Six *Jia* and summon the Six *Ding*, fulfilling every desire, and the Perfected shall visit your chamber.

Upon completing the visualization of the Five Thearchs and the Two Luminants’ true spirits, recite the incantation:

The Five Stars entwine and bind,
their light flowing with inner brightness.
The Two Luminants soar with radiant clouds,
irrigating the Five Essences.
The true spirits fill and store,
long preserving the Yellow Peace.
The Great One’s mighty plan
transforms the embryo and recalls infancy.
The liver and lungs knit their blossoms;
the heart and kidneys fill to abundance.
The spleen guards the Central Mystery,
and the Five Mushrooms receive life.
The precious light of the Sun and Moon
merges with the Thearch.
Soaring through the void,
ascend to pay homage in the Jade Purity.

Next, visualize the Three Perfected of Essence and Blood, named *Yuansheng Jun* with the style *Huangning Zi*, constantly filling the source beneath my two orifices and bone joints. The Two Perfected, named *Jianyu Jun* with the style *Ningyu Zhu*, fill my Great Granary Palace and the mouths of the Five Intestines. The One Perfected within the heart, named *Tianjing Ye Jun* with the style *Feisheng Shangying*, fills the mouths of the Four Extremities within my chest. The Nine Primordial Perfected: the male, named *Juzhi* with the style *Sanyang*, guards the gate of *Fuchen* in my left ear and the soul of the August One; the female, named *Shanggui* with the style *Dizi*, fills the gate of *Fuchen* in my right ear. The Purple Simplicity Left Primordial Lord, named *Yiyu Wuren* with the style *Anlai Shang*, fills the realm of my head and face.

The Yellow Simplicity Central Primordial Lord, named *Yuanhua Huangren* with the style *Taizhang Shang*, fills the realm of my chest and abdomen. The White Simplicity Right Primordial Lord, named *Qiming Xiaoren* with the style *Jinmen Shang*, fills the realm of my lower gates.

The Director of Destinies within the Sun, named *Jiesheng*, fills my left hand. The Peach Lord within the Moon, named *Fangying*, fills my right hand.

The Primordial White Qi Lord of the Womb, named *Wuxuan Zi* with the style *Yushang Sheng*, and the Supreme One’s Essence-Soul, named *Xuangui Zi* with the style *Shengchang*, these two spirits fill the root of my throat above the Five Viscera.

The Azure Qi Lord of the Throat’s Core, named *Anyan Chang* with the style *Hehe Ying*, and the Primordial Lord’s Essence-Soul, named *Baogutong* with the style *Mingfu*, these two spirits fill the region above the Great Stomach below the Five Viscera.

The Black Qi Lord of the Joints, named *Fulaisheng* with the style *Jingshang Men*, and the Imperial Perfected Essence-Soul, named *Youtai Yu* with the style *Guanshang Sheng*, these two spirits fill the mouths of my Nine Intestines and below the Hidden Source.

The Yellow Qi Lord of the Womb, named *Zuming Che* with the style *Shenwuji*, and the Heavenly Emperor’s Essence-Soul, named *Liweizang* with the style *Fazhu*, these two spirits fill the root of my two orifices within the lesser abdomen.

The Red Qi Lord of the Blood, named *Hunli Zi* with the style *Shubaojian*, and the Director of Destinies’ Essence-Soul, named *Faniu Zi* with the style *Qingxuan*, these two spirits fill the blood of my hundred joints and below the severed nodes.

The Supreme Primordial Father Lord, named *Gaotong Sheng* with the style *Zuohui Ming*, and the Lower Primordial Mysterious Mother, named *Shuhuo Wang* with the style *Youhui Guang*, the August Supreme One, named *Chongming Kong* with the style *Youliao Wu*, the Nine August Honored Ones, named *Mingzhen* with the style *Zhongdi Sheng*, the Supreme Emperor’s Essence-Soul, named *Yangtang Yu* with the style *Baling*, the Nine Gates’ Soul, named *Lühui Dao* with the style *Xueming*, and the Heavenly Register’s Imperial Soul, named *Zhaowu A* with the style *Guangshen*—these seven spirits fill the root of my original destiny, seal the gates of my death’s path, and through visualization and invocation, all the Perfected from head to navel shine clearly. Thus, the Golden Liquid flows in circuits, the Jade Florescence illumines the soul, the divine nectar overflows within the hidden intestines, and the Imperial Qi suffuses the Nine Gates. The seven ancestors are released from the Three Wretched Realms, reborn in the Southern Palace, the Spirit of Life is established within this body, and the true qi is spread to secure the years.

When finished, knock the teeth thirty-nine times and invoke:
*“Qi arises from the formless; congealed qi gives birth to spirit.”*

The yang qi offers itself outward, the yin qi ascends within. The two symbols invert and intertwine, conjoining the primordial spirit. The inner Perfected fill and guard, the nine apertures receive life. Preserve the hun-soul, secure the po-soul, and the ten thousand spirits settle in peace. Safeguard my Three Passes, let the radiant mushrooms fill them to abundance. Ascend with me, together we ascend to Jade Purity.

When finished, swallow qi thirty-nine times to fill the thirty-nine portals. The qi moistens and permeates, flowing throughout the body. If one can cast off burdens, untether from worldly dust, calm the heart and level the intent, clearly behold the empty chamber, gaze inward in visualization, fill the spirit and secure the soul, cut off the death-qi at the nine portals, and fill the life-palace at the Passes—revolving in visualization and invocation, as if speaking face to face—then after three years of day and night, the true spirit will manifest in form. Radiant splendor returns to the root, decayed teeth regrow, the five viscera bind their networks, and the inner self is replenished to fullness. One may command the Six Jia spirits, dispatch the Six Ding, summon guests from the Nine Empyreans, and invite the divine chariot of the Three Primes. Spirit soars and form ascends, rising in broad daylight to the morning court.

This is the divine treasure of the Highest Perfected, named *Inner Character*, filling the human body within, circulating the qi of the Nine Heavens to secure the six viscera’s mechanisms. The myriad essences transform and arise, all depending on the spirit. When the spirit is full, life flourishes; when the spirit departs, death follows. With diligent heart and accumulated resonance, one may uplift the body’s form to ascend to the Mysterious Palace. In the pursuit of immortality, if one does not know the inner names of form and spirit, nor how to fill and seal the portals of death, how can one hope for life? Those who cultivate this Way must not tread upon defilement, consume the five pungent foods, or offend the upright qi of their nature—else the spirit will depart. They know the allure of rich delicacies for the palate and the glory of rank and emolument for the body, yet do not perceive that such delicacies are axes that wound life, and that extravagant rank and splendor are the sources that drain the true. Thus, the divine beings love seclusion and dwell in stillness, never revealing their forms amid the winds of the world. Can those who cultivate life afford not to be cautious?

The Highest Sage and Imperial Lord says: To inscribe your name in the Upper Clarity, on the golden script and jade registers of the flying ascent to the Upper Clarity Palace, you must on the second day of the second month write in green ink the ten sounds of the jade register on white paper, face due east, and ingest it. Knock the teeth nine times and softly intone:

*"Yinyuan, Mysterious Numen, inheritor of the ancient void’s law.
Bone and form align with the chart, jade register and golden script.
The River’s Chariot binds the self, the five spirits shine forth.
Next, celebrate the Two Primes, the Mysterious Perfected descend to the abode.
Name inscribed in Upper Clarity, granted the flying chariot.
Endless enjoyment, blessings and love in surplus."*

When finished, swallow qi eight times and bow eight times toward the Upper Clarity Palace of the Eight August Divine Lords.

Practice this for nine years, and you will receive the jade register of Upper Clarity, inscribed and carved, ascending in the cinnabar cloud-chariot to the Jade Purity Palace.

The Highest Sage and Imperial Lord says: Those with jade bones and cinnabar script, whose names are listed in the Imperial Chart, may behold the Mysterious Records of the Seven Sages. Those with golden marrow and purple treasuries, whose names are inscribed on golden tablets, may behold the hidden texts within. Those with divine marvels and rare hairs, purple wombs and jade networks, whose names are marked in Upper Clarity, may behold the upper chapters of the white slips. Those with flowing essence and purple radiance, inner illumination and outer entwinement, golden treasuries and jade countenances, whose names are written in Jade Emptiness, may behold the green register’s texts. Those with divine stalwarts aligned with the chart, jade embryos and purple voids, whose names are inscribed in Eastern Florescence, may behold the texts of the Seven Injuries.

Without such stalwarts, the sacred scrolls cannot be rashly unfurled, nor the treasure texts casually viewed. Those who behold these texts are of a mysterious essence aligned with immortality. After nine years of cultivation, they may attain flight through the Mysterious Void and ascend to Jade Purity.

**Five Bells Ascending the Void, Guarding the Immortal’s Upper Talisman, named Fire Bell**

At the inception of the Great Tenuity Heavenly Lord’s reception of qi, when the mysterious symbols first divided, he ascended the Terrace of Ninefold Mysterious Void-Birth. The divine officials of the Five Emperors guarded the eight directions, the five talismans shimmered in empty radiance, now present, now absent, amid the misty Phoenix Terrace and the winding chambers of the jade halls. After seven thousand years, their script appeared. Its flowing light illumined the Nine Empyreans, its text blazed resplendent in Jade Purity.

Cast to the left, it becomes the Flowing Gold Fire Bell; shaken to the right, it becomes the Vast and Lofty Seven Primes. It subjugates the demons of the utmost heavens, its might spreads through the distant courts of the Nine Expanses. The ultimate and wondrous Way is subtle and profound, difficult to attain.

The Heavenly Lord purified himself in the Jade Chamber of the Great Void’s Mysterious Terrace, within the Golden Flower Room of the Jade Hall. Attended by maidens and Perfected, the five-colored divine officials, ten billion myriad beings, flying beasts and poisonous dragons flanked the gates, while giant serpents a thousand fathoms long guarded the walls. Phoenixes sang and dragons roared, a hundred sounds echoed through the halls, their majesty resounding in the vast court. Lions roared, divine songs were blown, jade tones flowed in brilliance. Divine consorts harmonized in song, jade maidens plucked and strummed the strings. Then the Central Yellow Elder Lord and the Four Perfected of the Great Ultimate were invited. They set out the nectar of flowing radiance, the fruits of hard jade, red trees with white seeds, hidden mushrooms and parted knots, and a profusion of fragrant blossoms.

After ninety days, the Tortoise Mother held the brush, the Great One dusted the mat, the Heavenly Consort attended with incense, and Jade Splendor composed the text. They inscribed it on white jade slips in golden script and entrusted it to the Left Duke of the Immortal Capital, sealing it in a cloud-brocade pouch with a jade clasp. It was then transmitted to the Central Yellow Elder Lord. The Lord, adhering to the covenant, received the five talismans, bowed his head, and withdrew. Immediately, he summoned the Nine Numinous Flowing Radiance Cloud-Chariot, fifty thousand five-colored divine officials, and flying azure-feathered dragon-cloaks, ascending to the Golden Gate and Jade Purity Palace.

**Inner Visualization to Shake Might: The Great Spell of Divine Wisdom for the Flowing Gold Fire Bell**

Wear the Flowing Gold Fire Bell. When traveling far or near, passing through perilous passes, bandits, illnesses, calamities, or harm, visualize the true light to guard yourself and open a path of ten thousand leagues. At the start of your journey, face the direction and knock the teeth fourteen times. Swallow qi thirty-six times, then visualize the destination’s forms—mountains, forests, grasses, trees, people, birds, beasts, and spirits—all clearly and distinctly, coming to pay homage to your body. Envision the Northern Dipper’s seven stars covering your head. Then visualize your left eye as a shooting star, your right eye as swift lightning, their radiance blazing and surging ninety thousand leagues away. See the path to your destination open along the light, mountains, forests, grasses, trees, people’s dwellings, soldiers, bandits, and ghostly qi all dissolved without a trace, the four roads suddenly clear.

Then recite the incantation:

"Front opens, rear closes,
Heaven levels, earth rises.
Divine lords set forth,
Four roads stretch wide.
Let heaven and earth
Become my bridge.
Before and behind, left and right,
All eight directions penetrate through.

My left casts a shooting star,
My right flashes swift lightning.
Fire flows ten thousand leagues—
What demon dares stand before me!
The Great One escorts me,
Ten thousand spirits come to greet.
Wherever I go, wherever I face,
All is auspicious and good.

Riding clouds, driving emptiness,
I ascend to the great void."

When finished, draw back the essence of both eyes, each returning to its palace. Inhale seven breaths of qi from the left, then seven from the right and swallow them. Thus, you may brave peril and traverse danger, subdue ghosts and strike down soldiers—none will fail to respond, all will scatter like echoes.

This method is most wondrous; do not transmit it carelessly. Pass it only by word of mouth, and guard it with utmost clarity!

The Five Emperors’ Flowing Bells and Five Talismans command the demons of the highest heavens, summon and bind the spirits of the five directions. Above, they correspond to the five stars and the descent of the Seven Origins; below, they align with the nine orifices and seven luminances of the human body. They pervade heaven and earth, leaving nothing unconnected, no darkness unprobed, no detail unseen. When the talisman is visualized, its light appears; when cast, its might shakes the world.

If you wear them and receive the master’s words, when in the human realm you encounter a place of evil ghosts, perform the Great Invocation of Shaking Might. Face north, hold your breath for twelve cycles, and envision the qi of the five directions covering your body inside and out, so that all becomes dark and nothing is seen. Then knock your left teeth thirty-six times, swallow the qi of the five directions—three breaths for each—and let the qi fully enter your body. Visualize the light of your two eyes’ youths like shooting stars, blazing and falling across the five directions.

Recite the incantation:

"Heavenly Origin’s Seven Essences,
Five Emperors’ Flowing Bells.
Radiant lightning flashes,
Like stars rushing through the sky.
Illuminating the ten directions,
Revealing ghosts’ true forms.
What petty demon
Dares face my gate of life!
The Supreme has decreed:
Slay without mercy.
Sever livers, split bellies,
Exterminate ghostly essence.
Thousands upon thousands crushed,
Myriads upon myriads toppled.
Divine might utters the spell,
Binding without cease."

Then swallow qi thirty-six times to conclude. With this single incantation, the divine officials of the five directions will protect your life and gather the vital qi of all spirits in the vicinity, binding them to appear before you. Three recitations will extinguish the lineage of ghostly qi.

When entering the Five Peaks or traversing mountains and rivers, braving perilous heights, knock your left teeth thirty-six times a hundred paces before reaching the place. If going to the Eastern Peak, visualize the Azure Emperor, Lord Xilin Zhu, with his retinue of nine thousand dead guarding your front and rear, and azure mist covering your body. If going to the Southern Peak, visualize the Vermilion Emperor, Lord Danxuan Zi, with his retinue of eight thousand guarding your front and rear, and crimson clouds covering your body. If going to the Western Peak, visualize the White Emperor, Lord Shaohao Ling, with his retinue of six thousand guarding your front and rear, and white clouds covering your body. If going to the Northern Peak, visualize the Black Emperor, Lord Xuanming Hao, with his retinue of five thousand guarding your front and rear, and black clouds covering your body. If going to the Central Peak, visualize the Yellow Emperor, Lord Zhizhong Yuan, with his retinue of twelve thousand guarding your front and rear, and yellow qi covering your body.

Recite the incantation:

"Radiant spirit of Qian Heaven,
Seven dawns’ mysterious essence.
Five Dipper’s flowering canopy
Enwraps my form.
Five-colored flying coverings
Merge and intertwine.
My body bears the Seven Origins,
Flowing golden fire bells.
Radiance flashes boundlessly,
Reaching the darkest heavens.
Divine officials of the Five Emperors,
Drive and command the heavenly soldiers.
For me, subdue and restrain
The mountain and river spirits, the thousand ghosts and ten thousand spirits.
All bind their heads,
Presenting their true forms,
Slain before, executed behind—
No capture ceases."

With this single incantation, heavenly demons vanish without trace, and ten thousand spirits come to pay homage. When traveling the Five Peaks and traversing mountains and rivers, you will suffer no trials or perils. The immortals of the Five Peaks will personally present the Five Mushrooms and Five Flowers to nourish your body.

If amidst soldiers and bandits, beneath hanging blades, or in dire straits, knock your right teeth twelve times, visualize the Northern Dipper covering your body, its dark light shining through and enveloping you entirely. Knock your left teeth twelve times, envision your liver as Jupiter, emerging from your left lung as Venus, from your right heart as Mars, from your front as Mercury, from your rear spleen as Saturn, and from your chest, so the five stars’ essence coils around your front and rear. Your body resides within the Dipper’s bowl, beneath the five stars. Next, visualize the divine officials of the Five Emperors guarding your left and right.

Recite the incantation:

"Heaven is my roof,
Earth is my bed.
The Five Peaks and rivers
Are my bridges.
Mysterious Dipper’s primordial essence
Tailors my robes.
I hide within the Seven Origins,
In the land of flowing fire.
Those who ferry me: Taiyi Wuyou,
Those who pass me: Baiyuan Wuying.
Disaster cannot touch me,
Weapons cannot harm me.
Let my body ascend
To the Golden Gate, the capital of the Nine Elders."

Thus, in moments of distress, you will attain liberation.

Prepare fifty feet of five-colored brocade to petition the immortal officials of the Five Emperors. Five taels of purple gold as a pledge to the five directions. Five catties of agarwood to ascend to the Three Origins Palace. One catty of true pearls as a covenant of cinnabar. One inscribed knife to sever the path of deathly qi. Seven gold pearls to offer and invite the essence of the Seven Origins. Seventy feet of crimson silk as a token of blazing light.

For those who receive the talismanic scriptures, present precious pledges to the master, purify yourself for three days, bathe, burn incense, and expose the talismans and scriptures on a high altar overnight. The next morning, ascend the altar together to report to the Northern Emperor, initiate the covenant of the talismanic scriptures, and transmit them to the disciple. After ascending the altar to make the vow, do not recklessly reveal the text or lightly disclose the scriptures. Your body will bear the punishment of the wind blade.

Should a disciple uninitiated yet unfurl the scroll, calamity shall strike the Seven Mysteries, and the body shall be maimed, the eyes blinded. The statutes of the Four Poles forbid the reckless disclosure of scriptures; the laws of the Supreme Perfection bar those without covenant or pledge. Unless one’s name is inscribed in gold and jade, none may behold or witness these texts. Seekers of immortality who bear not the Five Talismans upon their person shall find no protection from the immortal officials of the Five Peaks; the registers of the Three Bureaus shall not erase their names from the ledgers of death. Dwelling in mountain caves, they shall be undone by the demonic workers of the Nine Heavens; venturing among men, they shall not escape the blades of magistrates and soldiers. Yet those who bear the talismans may tread the heavens and traverse the abyss, roaming boundlessly in all directions, moving as they will. By meditating upon the true spirits, they return to their original palace, where the Five Mushrooms sprout of themselves, and their bodies radiate jade-like light. Immortal officials stand guard, the Three Origins attend their chamber, and they ride the clouds, steering the void to ascend to the Jade Purity of the Highest Heaven.

—From the *Scripture of the Cavern Perfection: The Purple Ascension of the Radiant Divine Primordial Transformation*

Should one encounter a person with the head of a dragon and the body of a phoenix, or one with the body of a phoenix and nine heads like crows, know that this is the descent of the palace of the Left Governance of the Primordial Heavenly King of the Origin, the True One of the Luminous Void, upon the disciple’s form—a sign that the Dao is nearing fulfillment. Speak not of this. Strike the teeth nine times, swallow the qi thirty-two times, and secretly recite the incantation:

The Two Ways flow in order,
The Origin lingers in cycles.
