The Mysterious True shines bright,
The Nine Numinous scatter wide.
Gaze unceasing, boundless,
Descend upon me with radiance.
Above, part the crimson light,
Dissolve stagnation, open the heart,
To ride the flying clouds,
And soar into the Purple Tenuity.

When finished, bow thrice in the heart and cease. Practicing this for three hundred days, one shall behold the true form of the Origin, receive the celestial writings of the Nine Heavens, and fly to the Jade Purity.

—From the *Scripture of the Cavern Perfection: The Jade Tallies of the Three Origins*

The Central Great Yellow Jade Talisman of the Myriad Origins: Should a disciple seek the presence of the Jade Controller of the Yellow Emperor, on the day of the Grand Year corresponding to one’s birth, face the year-star and write in red upon yellow paper to ingest it, or write in red upon yellow silk to wear it. After nine years, the Jade Controller shall erase the disciple’s record of death, transfer their name to the palace of life, and dispatch a chariot of yellow mist to welcome the disciple’s body, ascending to the Jade Purity Palace.

The *Fourfold Luminous Statutes of the Great Mystery Capital* state: The *Azure Essentials* in purple script and the *Golden Root* among the multitude of scriptures are the self-generated chapters of the True Kings of the Nine Heavens, received by the Jade Emperor of the Nine Yang Primordial Sovereign. Sealed in the Seven Treasures Jade Terrace of the Mysterious Numinous Nine Heavens, they are guarded by thirty hundred jade maidens, transmitted once in ten thousand kalpas. The Azure Essentials Emperor Lord, the Supreme Void Sovereign of the Primordial Numinous Dao, the Grand Simplicity High Numinous Cavern Radiance Lord, and the Southern Culmen Supreme Origin Lord—these myriad emperors commanded that one scripture be sealed upon Mount Wangwu. Should one possess a body of gold and bones of jade, their name inscribed in the imperial registers, and within seven hundred years encounter such a person, they may, upon assessing their virtue, transmit it thrice. The transmitter and receiver shall each offer one gold fish and one jade dragon, one hundred feet of purple silk, and forty feet of azure silk. Master and disciple shall fast together for one hundred days, then transmit the scripture after making a covenant. Twenty-four jade maidens and twenty-four jade lads shall be assigned to protect the disciple’s body. After one hundred days of cultivation, they shall attain communion with the numinous and summon the true. After nine years, they shall ride the clouds to fly to the Jade Purity.

Should one violate the precepts and prohibitions thrice, they shall be barred from attaining immortality; should they violate them five times, their seven generations of ancestors and their own person shall be subjected to trial, while the Three Officials of the Left and Right shall condemn them to the knife mountains and fire realms, the Twenty-Four Peaks, and after ten thousand kalpas, they may only return to serve as lesser ghosts bearing stones. The *Lüwen* of the Left Palace of Xuandu must be received with clarity and reverence.

The Supreme Jade Dawn commands the Banner Lord of Demon-Spirits to restrain the Demon-Spirit King of the Eastern Azure Emperor, that all may safeguard the Perfected Master Wang of Such-and-Such Peak, whose body is true and aligned with immortality. Bowing in obeisance, they dispatch the Feathered Chariots of the Eastern Peak’s immortals to receive his person, ascending to the Purple Phoenix Terrace of the Jade Purity Palace, as decreed by the Nine Heavens.
*Inscribed in white on azure silk.*

The Supreme Jade Dawn commands the Banner Lord of Demon-Spirits to restrain the Demon-Spirit King of the Southern Vermilion Emperor, that all may safeguard the Perfected Master Wang of Such-and-Such Peak, whose body is true and aligned with immortality. Bowing in obeisance, they dispatch the Feathered Chariots of the Southern Peak’s immortals to receive his person, ascending to the Purple Phoenix Terrace of the Jade Purity Palace, as decreed by the Nine Heavens.
*Inscribed in black on crimson silk.*

The Supreme Jade Dawn commands the Banner Lord of Demon-Spirits to restrain the Demon-Spirit King of the Western White Emperor, that all may safeguard the Perfected Master Wang of Such-and-Such Peak, whose body is true and aligned with immortality. Bowing in obeisance, they dispatch the Feathered Chariots of the Western Peak’s immortals to receive his person, ascending to the Purple Phoenix Terrace of the Jade Purity Palace, as decreed by the Nine Heavens.
*Inscribed in vermilion on white silk.*

The Supreme Jade Dawn commands the Banner Lord of Demon-Spirits to restrain the Demon-Spirit King of the Northern Black Emperor, that all may safeguard the Perfected Master Wang of Such-and-Such Peak, whose body is true and aligned with immortality. Bowing in obeisance, they dispatch the Feathered Chariots of the Northern Peak’s immortals to receive his person, ascending to the Purple Phoenix Terrace of the Jade Purity Palace, as decreed by the Nine Heavens.
*Inscribed in yellow on black silk.*

The Supreme Jade Dawn commands the Banner Lord of Demon-Spirits to restrain the Demon-Spirit King of the Central Yellow Emperor, that all may safeguard the Perfected Master Wang of Such-and-Such Peak, whose body is true and aligned with immortality. Bowing in obeisance, they dispatch the Feathered Chariots of the Central Peak’s immortals to receive his person, ascending to the Purple Phoenix Terrace of the Jade Purity Palace, as decreed by the Nine Heavens.
*Inscribed in azure on yellow silk.*

*Excerpted from the* Lüwen *of the* Dongzhen Taiyuan Zuogong Nüqing Sanji Sandu Libao Jing.

The Nine Heavens’ Venerable and the Three Heavens’ Jade Lads, in the first year of the celestial cycle, at the hour of *chen* when the Northern Dipper shifts its pivot, the Three Origins align in radiance, the Nine Emperors return to truth, and ascend to the Jade Mansion of the Supreme Void in the Purple Emptiness Heaven. The *Three-Nine Plain Speech* unlocks the numinous pass; the Jade Essence True Formula governs life’s enduring principle. Tranquil and vast, pure and unbounded, the Jade Decree illumines the void, the jade tones soar beyond the clouds. Fragrant winds stir without cease, wisdom’s chant resounds afar. Its fragrance flows into profound mysteries, its qi crowns the divine whirlwind. The Jade Seal commands all, and the ten thousand immortals come to court. This is the wondrous transformation of primordial antiquity, enduring through ten thousand kalpas without decay. Compose the true formula to guide contemplation, test the seeker’s heart with diligence. Should one’s golden name be inscribed in the Eastern Florescence and their verdant sobriquet in the Purple Court, receiving this wondrous scripture, they shall ascend to the Jade Purity.
*Excerpted from the* Three-Nine Plain Speech Jade Essence True Formula.

The Scripture of the Supreme Master of the Purple Dawn
The Divine Continent lies north of the Celestial Pass, with the sun and moon revolving to its south, the Seven Stars turning at its center. By day, the Eight Wefts revolve leftward; by night, the Seven Warps turn rightward. As the Seven Stars complete their circuit, the celestial radiance returns to the numinous. This is the court where the Supreme Purple Dawn receives transformation. By cultivating the Seven Revolutions, one ascends to the Jade Purity. For the Way of the Seven Revolutions, on the first and fifteenth days of each month and the eight solar terms, one must fast, enter the chamber at noon, face east, and recite the Seven Revolutions’ chapter eight times. At midnight, face north and recite it seven more times, totaling fifteen revolutions in a day and night. This aligns above with the Celestial Pass, revolving the Three Luminaries; within, it orders the body, unblocks the passages, and secures the spirit; below, it subdues the myriad demons, swiftly extinguishes the thousand spirits, harmonizing the revolutions and aligning the Three and Five. Those who fail in this Way shall die and enter the dark underworld. Through earnest cultivation and arduous devotion, one may ride the flying wheel, ascend to the Purple Dawn, and wander in the Jade Purity.

The Fifth Chapter of the Supreme Great Dao Lord’s Scripture
The *Jade Chapter of the Divine Continent* states:
The radiance transforms the Nine Dark Gates,
The Jade Dawn circles the Purple Essence.
Within, it illumines the abyssal palaces,
Riding the void to the Fourfold Luminosity.
The Dharma Wheel completes three cycles,
Seven transformations return to the formless.
The Great One inspects the celestial demons,
The revolving chapter examines the thousand spirits.
Left, the whistling penetrates the subtle mystery;
Right, the chant overturns the Nine Heavens.
Order descends upon the Eight Wastes,
The sweeping gaze commands the divine soldiers.
It rescues from the seven ancestors’ tribulations,
Transcends to the Immortal Emperor’s court.
The Controller of Destiny safeguards the original register,
The Eastern Palace inscribes the jade name.
The returning light enters the Mud-Pill Palace,
The five viscera flourish with splendor.
The radiant scene bears the round pearl,
Securing the soul to preserve kalpic years.
Above, one feasts in the Nine Empyrean’s halls,
Serene and ascending to the Jade Purity.
*Excerpted from the* Divine Continent’s Seven Revolutions and Seven Transformations Dance of Heaven Scripture.

In the autumnal months, practice the Way while contemplating the spirits to summon the numinous. Inscribe in yellow on white paper, face west, and ingest it. After a hundred days, one attains communion with the numinous; after a thousand days, one beholds the spirits. The Supreme Perfected descend, and one meets the immortal countenance. Six Jade Maidens of the Primordial Void are dispatched to refine the golden essence of the solar radiance and forge the mushroom luster. Also, inscribe in white on azure silk and place it to the west of one’s seat or sleeping mat, wrapping it in white silk. After a hundred days, the White Elder descends to the chamber, and the White Emperor’s officials and guardian spirits of the divine script protect the practitioner’s body. After six years, the Three Primordial Cloud Chariots descend to cover one’s person, who then ascends in form to the Great Void, flying to the Jade Purity.

The Western Florescence Supreme Void Sovereign Lord’s Primordial Qi of the Supreme August One has a personal name and style, with a form sixty million *zhang* in height. In the autumnal months, he wears a crown adorned with the Three Luminaries’ Jade Flower Pearl, robes of the natural numinous script, a sash bearing the Nine Heavens’ Demon-Restraining Banner, and a belt with the Interlocking Gold Solar Essence Sword. Seated upon a plain cloud, he holds a golden talisman, its brilliance resplendent, illuminating the Supreme Purity. Amidst the plain clouds and the depths of the Eight Darknesses, he contemplates returning to a length of six *cun* and six *fen*.

In the winter months, the Western Florescence Supreme Void Sovereign Lord transforms into a form with the head of a tiger and the body of a man, clad in a seven-colored tiger robe, its patterns resplendent and variegated. Amidst the white clouds above the Supreme Purity, he contemplates returning to his true form.

In the spring months, the Western Florescence Supreme Void Sovereign Lord transforms into a straight-standing figure, his color like yellow gold, his neck bearing a circular radiance. He wears a robe of thirty-two strips in nine colors, its brilliance penetrating and illuminating the ten directions. Amidst the purple clouds above the Jade Purity, he contemplates returning to his true form.

In the summer months, the Western Florescence Supreme Void Sovereign Lord transforms into a dual radiance of red and white, its hue turbid and lustrous like jade essence, illuminating the Supreme Purity. This is the reflux of the Western Florescence’s *qi*, whereupon he receives the refined essence of the Supreme August One, contemplating his return to the true form.

To practice the Way of the Western Florescence, one should enter the chamber on the day of the autumnal equinox, face west, and bow six times in homage to the Supreme Void Sovereign Lord. Then turn north, click the teeth nine times, and contemplate the Supreme Void Sovereign Lord following the four seasons, his form and luminous presence residing in the Jade Purity’s Sound-and-Light Palace, within the Eightfold Enclosure Prefecture’s Fourfold Radiance Village of the Utmost Subtlety. As the true form revolves downward to reflect, it enters the rear gate of the adept’s chest. Then recite the incantation:

*"Western Florescence unfurls its numen,
Golden Gate gleams with essence.
Refined through four transformations,
This is called the Jade Purity.
Divine and true conjoin in harmony,
Joy flows and fortune arises.
Qi spreads and the hun-soul rests,
Spirit guards and the po-soul is serene.
The Great One safeguards the record,
The Controller of Destiny inscribes the name.
The root of the womb is extinguished,
The stomach’s tubes flourish in splendor.
Ever to enjoy primordial auspiciousness,
The Three Luminaries share one’s lifespan."*

When finished, inhale six breaths of *qi* and cease.

Practicing this Way for nine years, the Western Florescence’s curved radiance descends, divine and true forms alight, penetrating the void and attaining the subtle. Transformations are instantaneously accomplished; one may sit in death or stand in life, flying to the Jade Purity.

For those seeking the Way of Immortality, on the winter solstice at noon, enter the chamber, face north, and recline or sit as one wishes. Close the eyes and inwardly contemplate the Mystic Radiance Lady of the Moon, recalling her surname and personal name. Her form is five *cun* and five *fen* in length, her hair bound in a cloud-like topknot, clad in a dark brocade flying skirt. She holds moonlight in her mouth, which descends into the adept’s heart. In an instant, the moonlight scatters into yellow *qi*, enveloping the adept’s body. The Lady, within the moon, gathers from the Azure Florescence Grove and scatters it amidst the yellow *qi*. She exhales the red *qi* of yang essence to bathe the adept’s form, from within to without. The yellow and red *qi* intertwine, illuminating the entire body. The Lady bestows upon the adept six vermilion characters in purple script. Then draw in the yellow *qi* thirty-two times, the yang essence twenty-four times, and cease. Click the teeth twenty-four times and recite the incantation while looking upward:

*"Mystic Yin’s frigid pool,
Flowing springs in vast courtyards.
Flying blossoms scatter their radiance,
Exhaling yellow and inhaling essence.
One qi entwines and coils,
Jade mushrooms sprout in the void.
Jade maidens sip fragrance,
The Lady wings her numen.
Orchid pools surge in torrents,
Flowing yellow in boundless depths.
The heavens universally receive their glow,
Descending to bathe my form.
Restore youth and refine the countenance,
To white hair knotting into black.
Purple characters in the Eastern Palace,
Vermilion script on green tablets.
Winged steeds and feathered canopies,
Four Perfected Ones guide the chariot.
Bearing me to ascend together,
All arrive at the Jade Purity."*

Cease, then inhale *qi* thirty-two times and swallow saliva twenty-four times. Ingest the purple-script vermilion characters.

Practicing this Way for eight years, the Lady bestows upon the adept the Bright Moon’s Pendants and the Way of the Vermilion Characters, enabling flight through the Mystic Void and ascent to the Jade Purity.

The above purple-script vermilion characters and the Moon’s Hidden Sounds are all inscribed in the Azure Void Grove of the moon’s southern realm, forming natural script. The Eightfold Simplicity Perfected Ones and the various celestial beings all gather and ingest these purple-script vermilion characters on the summer solstice. Those who ingest these six characters will share the same lifespan as the Eightfold Simplicity, their necks bearing circular radiance to illuminate the ten directions. These sounds are most secret. The August Eightfold Simplicity Perfected Ones inscribed these sounds in the *Eightfold Simplicity Jade Chapters*, thus making this a sublime and wondrous scripture. To lightly divulge these numinous sounds is to condemn one’s seven ancestors to servitude, bound to the Knife Mountain, their bodies scourged by the wind’s blades, never again to attain immortality.

One should inscribe these characters in vermilion on white paper on the summer solstice at midnight and ingest them. Click the teeth twelve times and softly recite the incantation:

*"Yang essence’s cinnabar pool,
Flowing fire and surging winds.
Golden chariots wing the void,
Mystic radiance brushes the heavens.
Eight azure ones gather orchids,
Scattering fragrance in the Jade Court.
Azure groves droop willows,
Wind stirs the jade branches.
Vermilion script and purple writings,
Containing blossoming splendor.
Flowing fragrance bathes the ford,
Universally moistening without bound.
Attaining the Mystic Radiance,
Sharing the light of the Purple Empyrean."*

When finished, inhale *qi* twenty-four times and cease. Also, wear the vermilion-script purple writings upon the head. After three years, the sun and moon’s mystic radiance will illuminate the adept’s form, and the Moon Radiance Lady will bestow true scriptures, granting six jade maidens. To lightly transmit these to the unworthy is to condemn one’s seven ancestors to servitude, never to be redeemed for ten thousand kalpas.

Secretly cultivating for eight years, the cloud chariots will descend, and one will ascend to heaven in broad daylight, flying to the Jade Purity.

For all scholars who study and ingest the Way of the Sun and Moon, on the autumnal equinox at the *bu* hour, take three *ge* of dragon fat (dragon bone is also excellent), and inscribe in azure the Ninefold Refined Dragon Radiance Talisman on white paper. Combine and cast them into clear water, face east, and bathe. Before the basin, click the teeth twenty-four times and softly recite the incantation as on the vernal equinox. When finished, inhale *qi* nine times and cease. Return to the chamber, burn incense, grind the dragon bone into powder, and dust the body. Rub the hands together to anoint the face and entire body. Lie with the head to the east, click the teeth nine times, close the eyes, clench the fists, and contemplate the sun’s purple *qi* descending in layers to envelop the body. Envision oneself within the sun’s radiance, the sun’s radiance revolving the body upward to the Hall of Vast Cold, within the Well of the East, beneath the High Ringing Tree. Contemplate the Vermilion Numen Lesser Yang Perfected One, recalling his surname and given name. His form is nine *cun* in length, clad in a flying robe of azure feathers, his head crowned with a diadem of penetrating essence and luminous radiance. He exhales green *qi* to bathe the adept’s body. From a vessel of lapis lazuli, he offers the jade sap of the Azure Mushroom to anoint the adept’s form, feeding him the blossoms of the three *qi*. Perceiving their sweet fragrance, the body feels as though bathed in warm rain. Then inhale *qi* ninety times and softly recite the incantation.

Within the Jade Gate and Orchid Chamber, the sun’s radiance soars on high. The Three Flowers knit their splendor, wondrous light brushing the dawn. Primal Simplicity returns to truth, its winding streams irrigating the Jade Fountain. The form dwells in the Hall of Vast Cold, rainbows reflecting upon the vermilion carriage. The paulownia-gut exhales essence, the Eastern Well refines the soul. The Five Thearchs’ crowns and sashes transform the visage into golden countenance. Cheeks serene and bright, one becomes a Jade Immortal. The Vermilion Numen Lesser Yang enables my spontaneity. Golden wings adorn and array, feathered robes gleam at dawn. Soaring aloft through the void, one sips from the sun’s root. The body mirrors water essence, radiance rejoicing in the dragon carriage. The feathered chariot arrives to welcome, ascending to stand before the Jade Emperor.

Upon completion, ingest the Ninefold-Refined Dragon Radiance talisman, swallow *qi* ninety times, and swallow saliva twenty-four times.

Whenever cultivating this Dao, at evening repose, from the day of Autumn’s Beginning to Winter’s Beginning, with both hands grasp the two shoulders thirty-two times each. The sun rests within the left shoulder’s well, the moon within the right shoulder’s well, their twin lights illuminating and enveloping the body. Knock the teeth twelve times and recite the incantation:

*Left sun, right moon,
Twin radiance oversee the numinous.
At dusk rest in Lesser Yang,
At dawn ascend to Jade Purity.
The Three Hun guard the chamber,
The Seven Po unite in form.
Myriad spirits assist and flank,
With radiance equal and aligned.*

Upon completion, lie down. Practicing this for eight years, the entire body becomes luminous, the face emanating the essence of azure brilliance. One speaks in unison with Lesser Yang, descending green carriages, soaring through the mysterious void, ascending to Jade Purity.

Within the Palace of Vast Cold grows the Azure Flower Grove, towering four thousand *zhang*, its branches spanning one thousand two hundred *li*, its garden two hundred forty *li* in circumference. Its leaves resemble bamboo yet are crimson, its blossoms resemble mirrors yet gleam, its fruit resembles plums yet bears no pit—this is the Crimson Tree with Cinnabar Fruit. Consuming its leaves grants ten thousand years of life; consuming its blossoms, one shares the sun’s numinosity; consuming its fruit, one feasts and wanders in Jade Purity.

Above perches the Golden-Winged Bird, its wings fanning rain across the realm. Below lies the Vast Cold’s Pool, where naturally arises the Ninefold-Refined Vast Fountain, five thousand *li* in depth and breadth. The Supreme Perfected Thearchs and Lofty Immortal Perfected Ones all ascend to the Palace of Vast Cold on Winter’s Beginning, plucking azure blossoms to anoint themselves, approaching the Vast Cold’s Pool to bathe in the Vast Fountain and refine their truth.

All later adepts who achieve the Dao and whose seven generations of ancestors are due to ascend to the celestial halls must pass through the Palace of Vast Cold, enter the Ninefold-Refined Pool, undergo refinement, and then ascend to heaven. After completing the refinement, they may consume the blossoms and fruit of the Azure Grove. The Golden-Winged Birds weave their feathered robes into garments for flying immortals, bestowing them upon those who undergo refinement, to ascend to the Upper Palace of Jade Purity.

Here ends the *Supreme Secret Essentials*, Scroll Ninety-Seven, excerpted from the *Original Beginning’s Transformations and Veritable Perfected Upper Scripture*.

**Supreme Secret Essentials, Scroll Ninety-Eight**
**Chapter on Ascending the Nine Heavens**

In the second month, receive the qi of the Unarrogant Joyous Heaven. On the fifth day at dawn, the fifteenth at noon, and the twenty-fifth at midnight—three days in the month, three times each—bathe in fragrant waters, enter the chamber, and burn incense. Bow nine times to the Northwest toward the Primordial Father, then three times to the Southeast toward the Mysterious Mother. Return to sit upright facing the moon’s position, knock the teeth thirty-six times, close the eyes, and visualize invoking the Heavenly King of Unarrogant Joy, whose surname is *Ning* and whose taboo name is *Fuhuo*. He wears a nine-colored robe patterned with flying frost and cloud motifs, and a crown of Azure Blossom and the Essence of Jupiter. He rides a chariot of white deer and cinnabar clouds, accompanied by twenty-six Jade Immortals from the Upper Palace, descending into the Purple Tenuity Palace within your body. Visualize a canopy of azure cloud-qi raining down upon your form.

After a long while, draw the cloud-qi into the mouth and swallow it nine times, then softly recite the incantation:
*"Threefold union forms the warp,
Three numina harmonize in peace.
Nine Perfected flow downward,
Sun and moon spread their wings.
Seven stars cast mysterious radiance,
Five lodges revolve their canopy.
Three Passes shine brightly,
Myriad spirits wear their sashes.
Nine apertures purify and open,
Six palaces receive their irrigation.
Inner flourishing, outer ease,
Penetrating vision without bounds.
Long preserve heaven and earth,
Eternally partake of the Four Greatnesses."*

Conclude by swallowing the qi nine times and the saliva nine times. Practicing this for three years, the liver’s network will bind with purple threads, jade splendor will arise within, and inner and outer clarity will merge. You will perceive the yet-unmanifest in reverse, and after nine years, the numinous will descend, allowing you to ascend and fly to the Nine Heavens.

In the third month, receive the qi of the Tranquil Heaven. On the sixth day at dawn, the sixteenth at noon, and the twenty-sixth at midnight—three days in the month, three times each—bathe in fragrant waters, enter the chamber, and burn incense. Bow nine times to the Northwest toward the Primordial Father, then three times to the Southeast toward the Mysterious Mother. Return to sit upright facing the moon’s position, knock the teeth thirty-six times, close the eyes, and visualize invoking the Heavenly King of Tranquility, whose surname is *Jin* and whose taboo name is *Pendi*. He wears a seven-colored robe woven with dragon patterns and permeating light, and a crown of Yin Essence and night’s radiance. He rides the Eightfold Radiance Flying Wheel, accompanied by twelve Jade Immortals, descending into the Longevity Palace within your body. Visualize a dense canopy of verdant cloud-qi enveloping your form.

After a long while, draw the cloud-qi into the mouth and swallow it nine times, then softly recite the incantation:
*"The Supreme Dao is profound and obscure,
Mysterious qi subtly divides..."*

Nine and Five unfold their currents,
Eight Convergences command the Gate of Life.
In the Cinnabar Palace dwells the Red Child,
receiving qi from the Lord Emperor.
Peach-Longevity’s register of life
is presented before the Three Origins.
All Perfected Ones oversee and reflect,
refining the treasury of the hun-soul and po-soul.
Within, it gleams fresh; without, it radiates light,
spirit guarding the hidden passes.
Eight Radiant Scenes flank the body,
Nine Qi descend in clouds.
Soaring through the Mysterious Void,
ascending to the Emperor’s Gate.
Conclude by swallowing qi nine times.

After three years of this practice,
the gall transforms into jade frost,
purple mist congeals within,
the nine apertures absorb numinous power,
and one may converse with the Red Child.
After nine years, one obtains the ability to ride the dark cloud and purple canopy,
ascending to the Nine Heavens.

—From the *Scripture of the Upper Transformation of Embryonic Essence in the Nine Elixirs of Cavernous Perfection*

The Five Whites’ Flying Essence Cavern-Heaven Numinous Talisman:
On the day of the Beginning of Summer, write it in cinnabar on bamboo membrane,
and ingest it at dawn facing south.
After one year, one’s vision penetrates a thousand miles;
after three years, one naturally knows the divine immortals;
after nine years, one clearly perceives the Nine Heavens,
pays homage to the Nine Heavens,
communes with the numinous,
and soars through the Nine Heavens.

—From the *Eight Whites Cavern-Perfection Scripture*

The secret name of the Talisman of the Celestial Soul of Doushu Heaven, inscribed on a Jade Pendant of the Great Yang:
This is the qi of the Great Yang of Doushu Heaven,
governing the inner spirits of the Upper Perfected in the Cavern-Yang Palace.
Write it in cinnabar on white silk and wear it on the body,
or write it on white paper and ingest it on the eight solar terms of one’s life-destiny.
Internally visualize the Upper Perfected of the Cavern-Yang Palace without fail for three years,
and one will behold the true form of the five-headed, single-bodied inner spirit.
One’s name is recorded in the Nine Heavens,
and the Lord Emperor of the Southern Terrace descends to one’s bedchamber,
refining the hun-soul and restraining the po-soul,
transforming the eight spirits of radiance.
After eighteen years, one’s form flies through the Nine Empyreans.

The secret name of the Talisman of the Celestial Soul of Bujiaole Heaven, inscribed on a Jade Pendant of the Upper Yang:
This is the qi of the Upper Yang of Bujiaole Heaven,
governing the inner spirits of the Central Perfected in the Crimson Palace.
Write it in cinnabar on white silk and wear it on the body,
or write it on white paper and ingest it on the eight solar terms of one’s life-destiny.
Internally visualize the Central Perfected of the Crimson Palace without fail for three years,
and one will see the true form—
or behold a nine-headed spirit in human guise—
who bestows upon one a cinnabar-jade tablet.
One’s rank is inscribed as Master of the Southern Marchmount,
overseeing the myriad qi and consolidating spirit to preserve perfection.
After eighteen years, the Three Origins descend,
welcoming one with a flying wheel to ascend to the Nine Heavens.

The secret name of the Talisman of the Celestial Soul of the Immeasurable-Longevity Heaven of Supreme Meditation, inscribed on a Jade Pendant of Yang Brightness:
This is the qi of Yang Brightness of the Immeasurable-Longevity Heaven of Supreme Meditation,
governing the inner spirits of the Central Perfected in the Hall of Light.
Write it in blue-green on white silk and wear it on the body,
or write it on white paper and ingest it on the eight solar terms of one’s life-destiny.
Internally visualize the Central Perfected of the Hall of Light for three years,
and one will behold the true form,
naturally attaining clear knowledge of the sounds of the Nine Heavens above.
One receives the scripture of the Nine Heavens,
the Lord Emperor descends,
the Eight Radiant Scenes uplift one’s form,
and one ascends to the Nine Heavens.

The secret name of the Talisman of the Celestial Soul of Polidahuo Heaven, inscribed on a Jade Pendant of Sprouting Yang:
This is the qi of Sprouting Yang of Polidahuo Heaven,
governing the inner spirits of the Lower Perfected in the Cinnabar Field Palace below the navel.
Write it in yellow on white silk and wear it on the body,
or write it on white paper and ingest it on the eight solar terms of one’s life-destiny.
Internally visualize the Lower Perfected of the Cinnabar Field Palace for three years,
and one will clearly perceive the true form face-to-face.
The Three Origins descend,
refining and transforming form and spirit.
The Three Divisions and Eight Radiant Scenes convey one to ascend as an immortal,
soaring through the Great Void,
ascending to the Nine Heavens.

—From the *Nine Yang Talismans of Cavernous Perfection*

The Thirty-Six Sounds of the Nine Earths of the Cavernous Abyss.

The First Rampart: Earth of Lustrous Hue
Its Correct Sound is Earth Sovereign, surnamed Qin, personal name Xiaojingchun;
Its Conduct Sound is Earth Sovereign, surnamed Huang, personal name Changshangfu;
Its Wandering Sound is Earth Sovereign, surnamed Qing, personal name Xuanfuji;
Its Sanskrit Sound is Earth Sovereign, surnamed Fei, personal name Zhongchenhuang.
These four Earth Sovereigns of the first rampart’s earth,
bearing the four directions of the earth’s expanse—boundless, infinite, without edge, without color, and without qi.
Thus the two sovereigns of the first rampart,
on the day of the Beginning of Spring, ride chariots of Azure Dragon,
grasping nine-colored banners,
accompanied by nine thousand riders of the Great Scaled Ones from the palace of the Azure Thearch Hulao,
ascend to the Immeasurable Heaven of Yudan,
to present the names of those earthly immortals who have attained the Dao and advanced in study to the Four Heavenly Kings.
For those who cultivate the supreme method,
on the day of the Beginning of Spring at dawn, enter the chamber,
face east, and with azure brush write the inner sounds of the Earth Sovereigns on white paper and ingest it.
Knock the teeth nine times,
and visualize the surnames and personal names of the four Earth Sovereigns,
all clad in azure feathered skirts,
their heads crowned with the Nine Origins Penetrating Heaven coronet.
Riding the Azure Dragon Feather Chariot,
they soar upward to ascend the Immeasurable Heaven.
Recite the incantation softly:
*"Azure Yang announces ascent,
Earth Sovereigns witness the dawn.
Governing the Four Offices,
pervading the myriad immortals.
The Heavenly Elder records the decree,
supreme vows are laid bare.
Diligent in supreme vows,
attaining the Dao without partiality.
Inscribed on the Emperor’s tablet,
names carved in jade chapters.
Nine ramparts erase traces,
soaring in jasper chariots of radiance.
Equal to the Four Sovereigns,
eternally safeguarding the Primal Heaven."*
Conclude by facing east, bowing from the heart nine times, and swallowing qi nine times.
Thus the Earth Sovereigns will inscribe one’s name in the Nine Heavens,
the Nine Earths will erase one’s traces,
the Nine Yin Earth Offices will provide protection,
and the Hulao Controller will welcome one.
After thirty-six years, one will ride a flying canopy of azure feathers,
ascending to the Immeasurable Heaven of Yudan.

---

The Second Rampart: Earth of Unyielding Hue
Its Correct Sound is Earth Sovereign, surnamed Cheng, personal name Shenfuguang;
Its Conduct Sound is Earth Sovereign, surnamed Yu, personal name Huangmusheng;
Its Wandering Sound is Earth Sovereign, surnamed Xuan, personal name Qiandewei;
Its Sanskrit Sound is Earth Sovereign, surnamed Chang, personal name Huangmeng.
These four Earth Sovereigns of the second rampart’s earth,
bearing the four directions of the earth’s expanse—boundless, infinite, without edge, without color, and without qi.
Thus the Earth Sovereigns of the second rampart,
on the day of the Spring Equinox, ride clouds of yellow and azure,
with twelve Dark Turtles grasping the Nine Origins talismans of the Divine Thearch,
accompanied by eight thousand flying armored riders from the palace of the Azure Thearch Hulao,
ascend to the Supreme Good Immeasurable Longevity Heaven of Meditative Bliss,
to present the names of those earthly immortals who have attained the Dao and advanced in study to the Four Heavenly Kings.
For those who study the supreme method,
on the day of the Spring Equinox at dawn, enter the chamber,
face east, and with azure brush write the inner sounds of the Earth Sovereigns on yellow paper and ingest it.
Knock the teeth nine times,
and visualize the surnames and personal names of the four Earth Sovereigns,
all clad in yellow brocade flying skirts,
their heads crowned with the Level Heaven coronet.
Riding the yellow and azure cloud chariot,
with twelve Dark Turtles grasping the Nine Heavens’ talismans,
accompanied by the flying armored riders of the Azure Thearch Hulao,
they ascend to the Supreme Good Immeasurable Longevity Heaven of Meditative Bliss.
Recite the incantation softly:
*"The Three Ways move in circulation,
seasonal nodes arrive without end.
Overseeing all earthly immortals,
their names ascend to the Thearch.
The Heavenly Elder records the decree,
Earth Sovereigns note the script.
On this auspicious day,
my Dao is fully apportioned.
Traces vanish in the Nine Yin,
soaring in clouds of pure radiance.
The Four Qi harmonize as one,
the sovereigns and people unite as a flock."*
Conclude by again facing east, bowing from the heart eight times, and swallowing qi eight times.
After thirty-six years of practice, one will ride the chariot of flying clouds,
ascending to the Supreme Good Immeasurable Longevity Heaven of Meditative Bliss.

---

The Third Rampart: Earth of Stone-Fat Luster
Its Correct Sound is Earth Sovereign, surnamed Zhang, personal name Weishenbao;
Its Conduct Sound is Earth Sovereign, surnamed Zhou, personal name Boshangren;
Its Wandering Sound is Earth Sovereign, surnamed Zhu, personal name Mingchezi;
Its Sanskrit Sound is Earth Sovereign, surnamed Yu, personal name Wenjingshi.
These four Earth Sovereigns of the third rampart’s earth,
bearing the four directions of the earth’s expanse—boundless, infinite, without edge, without color, and without qi.
Thus the Earth Sovereigns of the third rampart,
on the day of the Beginning of Summer, ride clouds of crimson rosy mist,
with twelve Phoenixes grasping five-colored regalia,
accompanied by eight thousand flying martial riders from the palace of the Yue Elder,
ascend to the Xuyan Heaven,
to present the names of those earthly immortals who have attained the Dao and advanced in study to the Four Heavenly Kings.
For those who study the supreme method,
on the day of the Beginning of Summer after the meal, enter the chamber,
face south, and with vermilion brush write the inner sounds of the Earth Sovereigns on white paper and ingest it.
Knock the teeth nine times,
and visualize the surnames and personal names of the four Earth Sovereigns,
all clad in crimson-patterned flying skirts,
their heads crowned with the Infinite Advancing Worthies coronet.
Riding the crimson rosy mist clouds,
with twelve Phoenixes grasping five-colored regalia,
they soar upward to ascend the Xuyan Heaven.
Recite the incantation softly:
*"The Four Qi gather at the center,
the Eight Limits converge in audience."*

At the auspicious dawn when the sun stands at the zenith,
the nine ramparts raise their finials.
Holding the registers, they command the immortals,
ascending to the Purple Empyrean.
Their names inscribed in the imperial writ,
they fill the ranks of the celestial bureaucracy.
They ride the crimson radiance,
soaring freely upon the whirlwind.
Their years equal the Three Luminaries,
boundless as the heavens, undecaying.

Conclude by facing south, bowing from the heart eight times, and swallowing qi eight times.

Practicing this for thirty-six years, one attains □ and rides the flying cloud-chariot to ascend to the Xuyan Heaven.

The Fourth Rampart, the Moistening Earth of the Liquid Marsh:
- **Correct Tone Earth Sovereign**, surname Jia, personal name Yun Zigao;
- **Walking Tone Earth Sovereign**, surname Xie, personal name Boyuan Wu;
- **Roaming Tone Earth Sovereign**, surname Ji, personal name Fufengche;
- **Sanskrit Tone Earth Sovereign**, surname Xing, personal name Jizhengfang.

The lands of these four ramparts, governed by the Four-Tone Earth Sovereigns, bear the four extremities of the earthly realm—boundless, infinite, without edge, without end, and of formless qi.

Thus, the Earth Sovereigns of the Fourth Rampart, on the day of the Summer Solstice, ride the crimson rosy cloud-chariot, with twelve Vermilion Birds grasping the banners of the Life-Demon, followed by eight thousand flying warrior-riders led by the Yue Lao immortal officials, ascending to the Jiran Heaven to report the names of those earthly immortals who have attained the Dao and advanced in study to the Four Heavenly Kings.

For those who study the supreme method, on the day of the Summer Solstice at noon, enter the chamber, face south, and with vermilion brush write the inner sounds of the Earth Sovereigns on yellow paper and ingest it. Knock the teeth nine times, and visualize the surnames and personal names of the four Earth Sovereigns, all clad in green-patterned skirts, their heads crowned with the Far-Roving coronet. Riding the crimson rosy cloud-chariot, with twelve Vermilion Birds grasping the banners of the Life-Demon, they soar upward to ascend the Jiran Heaven.

Recite the incantation softly:
*"Heaven is clear, earth is limpid,
the nine lands flourish in mystery.
The Four Movements govern the dawn,
ascending to join the Purple Heaven.
Wandering the flying chariot,
feasting in radiance without interval.
The Eight Assemblies converge in celebration,
the Jade Void unfolds its array.
The August Elders inscribe the names,
the Heavenly Kings compose the records.
The Nine Ramparts erase death,
the Registrar of Destinies extends the years.
The body enters the Flowery Dawn,
eternally preserving the status of Upper Immortal."*

Conclude by facing south and bowing from the heart eight times.

Practicing this for thirty-six years, one attains the crimson cloud-chariot to ascend to the Jiran Heaven.

The Fifth Rampart, the Golden Chestnut Marsh:
- **Correct Tone Earth Sovereign**, surname Hua, personal name Yan Qiming;
- **Walking Tone Earth Sovereign**, surname Huang, personal name Ling Worong;
- **Roaming Tone Earth Sovereign**, surname Yun, personal name Shen Wuyuan;
- **Sanskrit Tone Earth Sovereign**, surname Meng, personal name Tong Baguang.

The lands of these five ramparts, governed by the Four-Tone Earth Sovereigns, bear the four extremities of the earthly realm—boundless, infinite, without edge, without end, and of formless qi.

Thus, the Earth Sovereigns of the Fifth Rampart, on the day of the Beginning of Autumn, ride the white cloud-chariot, with twelve White Tigers grasping the Nine Primordial Life Talismans, followed by six thousand flying lightning-riders led by the Five Elder Immortal Officials, ascending to the Bujiaole Heaven to report the names of those earthly immortals who have attained the Dao and advanced in study to the Four Heavenly Kings.

For those who study the supreme method, on the day of the Beginning of Autumn at dusk, enter the chamber, face west, and with white brush write the inner sounds of the Earth Sovereigns on blue paper and ingest it. Knock the teeth nine times, and visualize the surnames and personal names of the four Earth Sovereigns, all clad in plain silk flying skirts, their heads crowned with the Nine Primordial Radiant Treasure Coronet. Riding the white jade cloud-chariot, with twelve White Tigers grasping the Nine Primordial Life Talismans, they soar upward to ascend the Bujiaole Heaven.

Recite the incantation softly:
*"The Nine Heavens and Four Movements,
the Brahma-net announces to the August Ones.
The Primordial Radiance governs destiny,
recorded by the Heavenly Kings.
Inscribed on the imperial tablets,
presented to the Azure Palace.
The Nine Yin extinguish the corpse,
the body soars to the Flowery Chamber.
Eternally preserving the status of Upper Immortal,
the Three Dawns shine in unison."*

Conclude by facing west, bowing from the heart six times, and swallowing qi six times.

Practicing this for thirty-six years, one attains the white jade cloud-chariot to ascend to the Bujiaole Heaven.

The Sixth Rampart, the Iron Marsh of the Adamantine Earth:
- **Correct Tone Earth Sovereign**, surname Ji, personal name Shang Shaojun;
- **Walking Tone Earth Sovereign**, surname Fan, personal name Lai Li’an;
- **Roaming Tone Earth Sovereign**, surname Chang, personal name Li Jiwu;
- **Sanskrit Tone Earth Sovereign**, surname Wang, personal name Siniurong.

The lands of these six ramparts, governed by the Four-Tone Earth Sovereigns, bear the four reaches of the earthly realm—boundless, infinite, without edge, without end, and of formless qi.

Thus, the Earth Sovereigns of the Sixth Rampart, on the day of the Autumn Equinox, ride the white cloud flying chariot, with twelve White Tigers grasping the nine-colored banners of the Spirit-Commanders, followed by six thousand flying tiger-riders led by the Five Elder Immortal Officials, ascending to the Huayingsheng Heaven to report the names of those earthly immortals who have attained the Dao and advanced in study to the Four Heavenly Kings.

For those who study the supreme method, on the day of the Autumn Equinox at dusk, enter the chamber, face west, and with white brush write the inner sounds of the Earth Sovereigns on blue paper and ingest it. Knock the teeth nine times, and visualize the surnames and personal names of the four Earth Sovereigns, all clad in plain brocade flying skirts, their heads crowned with the Infinite Advancing Worthies coronet. Riding the white cloud flying chariot, with twelve White Tigers grasping the nine-colored banners of the Spirit-Commanders, they soar upward to ascend the Huayingsheng Heaven.

Recite the incantation softly:
*"The White Earth of the Nine Ramparts,
its qi connects to the Supreme Subtlety.
The August Elders attend the dawn,
soaring in radiance, wandering in cycles.
The vermilion tablets arrayed in display,
the Eight Flowers scatter their brilliance.
Ascending to enter the imperial court,
pushing open the jade portals.
The Five Vows converge in mystery,
descending to bestow feathered robes.
The Eight Radiant Ones unite in perfection,
the form attains ascension and flight.
Destiny shares the span of heaven and earth,
eternally preserving the dual poles."*

One attains the white jade cloud-chariot to ascend to the Huayingsheng Heaven.

The Seventh Rampart, the Marsh of Water’s Command:
- **Correct Tone Earth Sovereign**, surname Tang, personal name Chusheng Ying;
- **Walking Tone Earth Sovereign**, surname Hao, personal name Zheng Fatu;
- **Roaming Tone Earth Sovereign**, surname Han, personal name Gaofuche;
- **Sanskrit Tone Earth Sovereign**, surname Jing, personal name Zhonglongshou.

The lands of these seven ramparts, governed by the Four-Tone Earth Sovereigns, bear the four extremities of the earthly realm—boundless, infinite, without edge, without end, and of formless qi.

Thus, the Earth Sovereigns of the Seventh Rampart, on the day of the Beginning of Winter, ride the dark cloud flying chariot, with twenty-four Black Tortoises grasping the five-colored banners of Life and Spirit, followed by five thousand soaring celestial riders led by the Qiang Elder Immortal Officials, ascending to the Fanbao Heaven to report the names of those earthly immortals who have attained the Dao and advanced in study to the Four Heavenly Kings.

Whenever practicing the superior method, one must enter the chamber at the *zi* hour on the day of the Beginning of Winter, face north, and inscribe in ink the inner sounds of the Earth Sovereigns upon white paper to ingest. Strike the teeth nine times, and visualize the four Earth Sovereigns’ surnames and personal names, all clad in black-cloud robes with dark patterns and flying hems, their heads crowned with the *Wuji Jinxian* coronets. They ride the dark-cloud flying chariot, with twenty-four Black Tortoises bearing the five-colored banners of Life and Spirit, soaring upward to ascend to the Fanbao Heaven. The subtle incantation reads:

> The two *qi* intertwine, the spirit returns to the courtyard.
> The Three Origins govern rightly; the Earth Sovereign commands the numinous.
> Cloud chariot and feathered canopy ascend to the lofty clarity.
> Great vows unfold; I merge with the formless.
> The nine ramparts erase traces; celestial perfected ones inscribe names.
> The Mysterious Diagram is complete; the title *Huaqing* is bestowed.
> Attaining the flying radiance, I transform and enter the imperial court.

Upon completion, bow in the heart five times and swallow *qi* five times to conclude. Practicing this for thirty-six years, one may ride the black-cloud chariot to ascend to the Fanbao Heaven.

The Eighth Rampart’s Great Wind Marsh Land is governed by:
- **Upright Tone Earth Sovereign**, surname Ge, personal name Xuanshengxian;
- **Sanskrit Tone Earth Sovereign**, surname Hua, personal name Maoyunchang;
- **Wandering Tone Earth Sovereign**, surname Yang, personal name Zhendongxuan;
- **Sanskrit Tone Earth Sovereign**, surname Zhou, personal name Shangjingyuan.

The lands of these eight ramparts, governed by the Four-Tone Earth Sovereigns, bear the four extremities of the earthly realm—boundless, infinite, without edge, without end, and of formless *qi*.

Thus, the Earth Sovereigns of the Eighth Rampart, on the day of the Beginning of Winter, ride the black-cloud flying chariot, with five-colored flying *lin* beasts grasping the nine-colored regalia, followed by five thousand soaring celestial riders led by the Qiang Elder Immortal Officials, ascending to the Fanmojiayi Heaven to report the names of those earthly immortals who have attained the Dao and advanced in study to the Four Heavenly Kings.

Whenever practicing the superior method, one must enter the chamber at the *zi* hour on the day of the Winter Solstice, face north, and inscribe in ink the inner sounds of the Earth Sovereigns upon white paper to ingest. Strike the teeth nine times, and visualize the four Earth Sovereigns’ surnames and personal names, all clad in dark-cloud brocade robes, their heads crowned with the *Tongtian* treasure coronets. They ride the black-cloud feathered chariot, with five-colored flying *lin* beasts grasping the nine-colored regalia, ascending to the Fanmojiayi Heaven. The subtle incantation reads:

> Heaven unfolds, earth arrays; the nine images emulate the mysterious.
> Four measures rise and fall; the eight *qi* renew in clarity.
> The Earth Sovereigns record and select; the Jade Emperor confirms the perfected.
> Names inscribed on the celestial charts; I attain transcendence.
> Soaring through the Great Void, the radiance moves naturally.
> In harmony with the numinous, in unity with *qi*, I endure forever.
> Three transformations, nine transmutations, ascending into the imperial dawn.

Upon completion, bow in the heart four times and swallow *qi* four times to conclude. Practicing this for thirty-six years, one may ride the dark-numinous chariot to ascend to the Fanmojiayi Heaven.

The Ninth Rampart’s Formless Netherworld Land is governed by:
- **Upright Tone Earth Sovereign**, surname Ji, personal name Wushangxuan;
- **Sanskrit Tone Earth Sovereign**, surname Dou, personal name Lingwuhao;
- **Wandering Tone Earth Sovereign**, surname Zhao, personal name Shangboxuan;
- **Sanskrit Tone Earth Sovereign**, surname Chen, personal name Qinwubo.

The lands of this ninth rampart extend to the profound abyss and fathomless source, netherworlds of heaven and earth, governing and restraining all without fall—boundless, unbounded, without edge, without end, all of netherworld *qi*.

Thus, the Earth Sovereigns of the Ninth Rampart, on the first day of the third month, the second day of the sixth month, the third day of the ninth month, and the fourth day of the twelfth month—four times yearly—ride the five-colored cloud chariot, with nine-colored flying dragons grasping the Central Origin’s life-numinous talismans, followed by twelve thousand radiant feathered riders led by the Cang Elder Immortal Officials, ascending to the Polidahuo Heaven to report the names of those who have studied the Dao and attained immortality across the nine lands to the Four Heavenly Kings.

Whenever practicing the superior method, one must enter the chamber at the *ri* hour on the appointed day, face the Year-Star, and inscribe in yellow ink the inner sounds of the four Earth Sovereigns upon white paper to ingest. Strike the teeth twelve times, and visualize the four Earth Sovereigns’ surnames and personal names, clad in dark-yellow five-colored robes, their heads crowned with the *Jiuyuan Tongtian* treasure coronets, their feet shod in five-colored lion-patterned shoes, grasping the life-preserving talismans of the tattooed body. They ride the yellow-hued flying chariot, accompanied by thirty-six Jade Maidens of the Five Thearchs, soaring upward to ascend to the Polidahuo Heaven. The subtle incantation reads:

> The two images revolve in cycles; the nine essences penetrate the numinous.
> The August Elders respond to the talismans, ascending the void to enter clarity.
> Fourfold thoroughfares, eightfold pathways; flying rosy clouds and purple jades.
> Ascending the Golden Flower, I attend the imperial numen.
> Inscribed in the immortal records, names etched in the Azure Palace.
> On the day of attaining the Dao, I am registered; the title *Seven Numinous* is conferred.
> The nine ramparts erase the corpse; the Eastern Well refines the form.
> The Three Origins descend the perfected; my Dao is now luminous.
> Attaining the flying radiance, I ascend to the Jade Court.

Upon completion, bow in the heart nine times and swallow *qi* twelve times to conclude. Practicing this for thirty-six years, one may ride the yellow-hued flying chariot to ascend to the Polidahuo Heaven.

*—Excerpted from the *Dongzhen Waiguo Fangpin Jing***

The Nine Heavens’ *Poling Taixiao Yinsheng Shangjing* talisman is inscribed upon golden tablets within the iridescent yin radiance, serving as the pivot of the Nine Heavens’ gates and the canopy of the Supreme Clarity. Without this script, there would be no alternation of day and night; without this script in the Great Void, there would be no Supreme Clarity. Thus, the Primordial Beginning inscribed the script upon golden tablets, naming it the *Supreme Clarity Golden Characters and Jade Script*. Its sounds are the inner names of the celestial *po*. Practicing its Dao and ingesting its script, after nine years, the Soul-Numinous Imperial Lords and the Nine Heavens’ Chancellors will descend in a white *luan*-cloud chariot to one’s chamber, bestowing the divine Dao of the Three Departments and Eight Radiant Ones, enabling one to traverse the void, ascend to the Nine Heavens, and soar through the skies.

*—Excerpted from the *Dongzhen Taiji Jinzi Yuwen Jiutian Yinfu***

*Wushang Biyao*, Scroll 98, concludes.
*Wushang Biyao*, Scroll 99.

On the Day of Vernal Equinox, the Celestial Emperor of the Grand Tenuity ascends to the Most High Jade Sovereign, where, during the feast of roaming and revelry, the first radiant day of practicing the Dao and receiving immortality begins.

On that day, follow the method above: at midnight, face east and click the teeth nine times. Visualize clouds of dark azure, yellow, and black swirling toward the northeast, then silently intone:

*Celestial Emperor of the Grand Tenuity, I beseech you to turn your divine chariot and descend into my body, inscribe my name upon the Imperial Register, and bestow upon me the Dao of divine immortality.*

Afterward, envision the Elder Lord of the First Radiance, Laozi the Dao Lord of the Mysterious Tenuity Palace in the Azure Yang Upper Mansion of the East—whose surname is Yu and whose personal name is Youwan, whose form stands nine inches tall, clad in a sash of purple and azure, crowned with the Nine-Hued Heaven-Piercing Treasure Diadem, shod in nine-hued shoes, and bearing the Talisman of Commanding Spirits—accompanied by thirty-six Immortal Lads of the Great Yang, riding the Eight Radiance Chariot drawn by azure clouds, with a team of verdant dragons, descending to govern within the Hall of Light of your body.

Then silently invoke:

*First Radiance of the Supreme Origin, summon the numinous and summon the perfected.*

Receiving the qi and commanding the seasons, following the canonical rites of the Imperial Ancestors.
Returning essence to the Mysterious Canopy, ascending to feast in the Jade Dawn.
The returning spirits descend, securing and stabilizing my body.
Preserving essence and refining qi, the five viscera become pure and radiant.
Purple qi flows and illumines, penetratingly mastering the spirits.
Attending the Flying Radiance, ascending to feast in the Jasper Pavilion.
Complete, then swallow the nine qi upward.

This is the Way of the First Radiance. Practicing it for eight years, the flying wheels of dark clouds will come to welcome the practitioner’s body, ascending to the Grand Clarity.

On the day of the Beginning of Summer, the Supreme Perfected of the Grand Ultimate and the Three Primordial Perfected ascend to the Purple Tenuity Palace to roam and feast—this is the day for practicing the Radiant Way and receiving immortality. On that day, at dawn facing southeast, knock the teeth nine times, then envision three-colored clouds of purple, azure, and yellow revolving from the northwest. Silently invoke:

*Supreme Perfected of the Grand Ultimate, Three Primordial Perfected, I beseech you to return your divine chariot, descend into my chamber, inscribe my name upon the Jade Register, and make me a divine immortal.*

Complete, then envision within the Lesser Yang Upper Mansion of the Southeast, in the Grand Tenuity Palace, the Boundless Jade Radiance of the Mysterious Radiance, the Dao Lord whose surname is Wang and whose personal name is Wuying. His form stands eight inches and eight fen tall, clad in a sash of cinnabar brocade, crowned with the Boundless Advancing Worthies Jade Diadem, shod in nine-hued shoes, and bearing the Talisman of Summoning Spirits. He rides the Mysterious Radiance Green Chariot drawn by a five-colored cloud carriage, with a team of phoenixes, accompanied by thirty-nine Flying Immortal Lads of the Numinous, descending to govern within the Grotto Chamber of your body.

Then silently invoke:

*Mysterious Radiance of the Supreme Numinous, attending the feast of the eight qi.*
*Creating the radiance of the nine mysteries, soaring boundlessly.*
*The returning perfected descend, dissolving my karmic obstructions.*
*Charioted by the Azure Dragon, shaded by the Purple Canopy.*
*Attaining the Eight Radiance, ascending to the celestial heights.*

Complete, then swallow the eight qi upward and cease.

Practicing this Mysterious Radiance Way for eight years, the three-colored clouds of purple and white, with the Mysterious Radiance Green Chariot, will come to welcome the practitioner’s body, ascending to the Grand Clarity.

On the Summer Solstice, the Great Emperor Lord of Fusang ascends to the Grand Tenuity Palace to roam and feast—this is the day for practicing the Void Radiance Way and receiving immortality. On that day, following the above method, at dawn facing south, knock the teeth eight times, then envision three-colored clouds of red, white, and azure revolving from the southeast. Silently invoke:

*Great Emperor Lord of Fusang, I beseech you to return your divine radiance, descend to gaze upon my body, record my name in the Eastern Florescence, and grant me the ascent upon flying mist.*

Complete, then facing south, envision within the Grand Yang Upper Mansion, in the Purple Tenuity Palace, the Void Radiance Grand Marshal, the Primordial Ancestor Dao Lord whose surname is Xuan and whose personal name is Boshi. His form stands eight inches and eight fen tall, clad in a sash of crimson brocade and cinnabar, crowned with the Heaven-Illuminating Jade Diadem, shod in nine-hued shoes, and bearing the Talisman of Subduing Demons. He rides the Eightfold Radiance Chariot of Luminous Clarity drawn by a red cloud carriage, with a team of phoenixes, accompanied by thirty-six Jade Lads of the Cinnabar Numinous Upper Palace, descending to govern within the Central Cinnabar Field of your body.

Then silently invoke:

*Void Radiance initiates the clouds, riding the qi in revolving return.*
*Swiftly charioted by the Eight Ways, luminous radiance emits its majesty.*
*Descend into my chamber, illumining my cinnabar splendor.*
*Seizing demons and mastering spirits, the ten thousand numina are all subdued.*
*Enabling me to penetrate the mysterious, flying in unison with the radiance.*

Complete, then swallow the eight qi upward and cease.

Practicing this Void Radiance Way for eight years, the Eightfold Radiance Chariot of Luminous Clarity will come to welcome the practitioner’s body, ascending to the Grand Clarity.

On the day of the Beginning of Autumn, the Supreme Perfected of the Grand Simplicity and the White Emperor Lord ascend to the Jade Heaven and the Mysterious August High Perfected—this is the day for practicing the Primordial Radiance Way and receiving immortality. On that day, at dawn facing southwest, knock the teeth twelve times, then envision three-colored clouds of white, red, and purple revolving from the southwest. Silently invoke:

*Supreme Perfected of the Grand Simplicity, I beseech you to return your divine radiance, descend into my body, memorialize my name in the Jade Heaven, and make me a perfected person.*

Complete, then envision within the Lesser Yin Upper Mansion of the Southwest, in the Palace of the Numinous Tenuity Yang, the Primordial Radiance Great Unity Flame Heaven Dao Lord whose surname is Huang and whose personal name is Yunzhu. His form stands seven inches and one fen tall, clad in a sash of dark yellow and white, crowned with the Seven Treasures Advancing Worthies Diadem, shod in nine-hued shoes, and bearing the Staff of Commanding Spirits. He rides the Desolate Jade Litter drawn by a five-colored purple cloud carriage with a vermilion canopy, with a team of six dragons, accompanied by twenty-four Immortal Lads of the Yellow Simplicity Upper Palace, descending to govern within the Lower Cinnabar Field of your body.

Then silently invoke:

*Primordial Radiance Supreme Perfected, Eight Ways of the Mysterious Numinous.*
*Above governing the Yellow Thearch, below governing my form.*
*Revolving the divine litter, flowing and illumining the Purple Clarity.*
*Circulating and mastering qi, the Three and Five shine resplendently.*
*Controlling spirits and seizing demons, my Way penetrates the mysterious.*
*Eternally preserving the Supreme Radiance, flying immortal and everlasting.*

Complete, then swallow the seven qi upward and cease.

Practicing this Primordial Radiance Way for eight years, the Desolate Jade Litter will come to welcome the practitioner’s body, ascending to the Grand Clarity.

On the Autumnal Equinox, the Supreme Perfected of the Southern Culmen and the Red Emperor Lord ascend to the Terrace of Soaring Winds to visit the Nine Numinous Ladies, roaming and feasting—this is the day for practicing the Luminous Radiance Way and receiving immortality. On that day, following the above method, at dawn facing west, knock the teeth twelve times, then envision three-colored clouds of azure, yellow, and red revolving from the southwest. Silently invoke:

*Supreme Perfected of the Southern Culmen, August Emperor Lord of the Supreme Sovereign, I beseech you to return your divine radiance, descend into my chamber, bestow the Jade Register, memorialize to the Nine Numinous Ladies, grant me the ascent upon the Flying Radiance, and enter the formless.*

Complete, then envision within the Grand Yin Upper Mansion of the due West, in the Palace of the Essence Tenuity Dui, the Luminous Radiance Grand Harmony Dao Lord whose surname is Hao and whose personal name is Renyi. His form stands six inches and eight fen tall, clad in a sash of white-patterned numinous simplicity, crowned with the Boundless Treasure Heaven Diadem, shod in nine-hued shoes, and bearing the Jade Talisman of Measuring Life and Preserving Existence. He rides the Crimson-Jade Green Litter drawn by a white numinous carriage, with a team of white tigers, accompanied by twenty-two Jade Lads of the White Mystery, descending to govern within the Flowery Canopy of your body.

Then silently invoke:

*Luminous Radiance, Dao Patriarch, governing and unifying the Nine Heavens.*

Encompassing the Purple Empyrean, swiftly traversing the Eight Mists.
Pause the jade retinue, descend into my body.
Unseal with luminosity, bestow the Golden Perfection.
Vast and open, summoning the numinous—no delay in this form.
Attain the soaring radiance, ascend to feast in the dawn of the Empyrean.

When complete, swallow the seven qi upward and cease.

Practicing this Way of Luminous Radiance for eight years will summon the Crimson-Jade Green Litter to welcome your body, ascending to the Grand Clarity.

On the day of the Beginning of Winter, the Supreme Clarity Perfected, the Thearch-Emperor, and the August Ancestor ascend to the Highest Nine Heavens before the Jade Emperor, the time of their feasting and wandering, the day of practicing the Dao of Luminous Radiance to receive immortality. On that day, at dawn, face the northwest and knock the teeth nine times. Gaze upward and envision green, purple, and azure clouds swirling from the southwest. Then silently intone:

*Supreme Clarity Perfected, Thearch-Emperor, August Ancestor, beseech your divine carriage to descend into my chamber, bestow the jade inscription of my name, and memorialize the Supreme Clarity. May I attain the soaring radiance and ascend into the formless.*

When complete, envision within the Grand Yin Upper Mansion of the northwest, in the Palace of Clarity and Tenuity, the Grand Harmony Dao Lord of the Luminous Register of the Cavernous Radiance, whose surname is Xuan and whose personal name is Yuanfu. His form stands five inches and eight fen tall, clad in a sash of profound yellow, crowned with the Nine Profundities Flying Dawn Jade Diadem, shod in five-hued shoes, and bearing the Statutes of Subduing and Slaying. He rides the Dark Radiance Eight-Rayed Vermilion Litter drawn by a purple-cloud carriage, with a team of dark warriors, accompanied by twenty-four Celestial Lads of the Grand Profundity, descending to govern within the Chamber of Destiny in your body.

Then silently invoke:

*Cavernous Radiance, Thearch and Venerable, Profound Spirit of the Yin.
Riding the auroras, driving the dragons, attaining the flying mists.
Above, wandering the Jade Clarity; below, governing the Grand Profundity.
Turn and descend your purple litter, enter into my body.
May I ride the Eight Radiances and stand equal to the Perfected.*

When complete, swallow the five qi upward and cease.

Practicing this Way of Cavernous Radiance for eight years will summon the Dark Radiance Eight-Rayed Vermilion Litter to welcome your body, ascending to the Grand Clarity.

On the day of the Winter Solstice, the Jade Consort of the Grand Empyrean and the Supreme Perfected of the Grand Void ascend to the Palace of the Grand August before the Heavenly Emperor of the Grand Tenuity, the time of their feasting and wandering, the day of practicing the Dao of Clarity and Radiance to receive immortality. On that day, at dawn, face due north and knock the teeth twelve times. Gaze upward and envision vermilion, azure, and yellow clouds swirling from the northeast. Then silently intone:

*Jade Consort of the Grand Empyrean, Supreme Perfected of the Grand Void, beseech your divine carriage to descend into my chamber, establish my jade name, and memorialize the Grand Empyrean. May I become a Perfected and wander, feasting in the Upper Palace.*

When complete, envision within the Grand Yin Upper Mansion of the north, in the Palace of the Dao and Tenuity, the Eastern Remonstrance Grand Harmony Dao Lord whose surname is Wang and whose personal name is Yinjing. His form stands five inches and eight fen tall, clad in a sash of five-hued profound clouds, crowned with the Profound Dawn Treasure Diadem, shod in five-hued lion shoes, and bearing the Scepter of Summoning the Numinous. He rides the Meandering Jade Litter drawn by a brocade-cloud carriage of qi, pearls, and jade, with a team of dark phoenixes with black pinions, accompanied by thirty-six Celestial Lads of the Grand Profundity Upper Palace, descending to govern within the Profound Valley Palace of your body.

Then silently invoke:

Pure radiance, Primordial Perfection—one in spirit with the Origin.
Receiving transformation from the Nine Primes, you contain the crimson infant’s qi.
The Meandering Jade Litter ascends into the Purple Clarity,
its wheels turning through the eight solar nodes, traversing the celestial warp.
Erase my primal register; safeguard my southern birth.
Then, riding the soaring radiance, I grasp the reins of the green-wheel carriage.

When complete, raise the head and swallow the five qi to stillness.

Practicing this Way of Pure Radiance for eight years will summon the Meandering Jade Litter to descend and welcome your body, ascending into the Grand Clarity.

*(From the* **Cavern-Real Gold Perfection Jade Radiance Eightfold Soaring Scripture***)*

The **Brahma-Treasure Celestial Soul Essence Secret-Sound Inner Taboo Jade Pendant Uniting Yang Talisman**—this is the *Brahma-Treasure Celestial Uniting Yang Qi*, governing the Perfected Inner Spirits of the Palace of Ultimate Yin. Inscribe it in yellow on white silk and wear it on the body; also transcribe it on white paper and ingest it on the eight solar nodes of your life-destiny. Inwardly contemplate the Perfected Ones within the Palace of Ultimate Yin for three years, and upon careful verification, you will behold the true spirits. The Mysterious Mother of the Nine Heavens will bestow upon you the *Nine Heavens’ Supreme Writ* and the *Eightfold Refined Mushroom Essence*, attaining the Way of Spontaneity. At noon, you will soar through the sky and ascend into the Grand Clarity.
